channel.title: Tarot Tribe - Beyond Worlds | Blog Talk Radio Feed
channel.description: Welcome Tarot Lovers! Enter Beyond Worlds ~ Your friendly Tarot community, powered by Tarot! Find your way back here by going to www.TarotTribe.com or download us on iTunes. All archived shows are listed at http://www.donnaleigh.com/bwshowlisting.htm. Are you a reader who wants to go deeper? Our job is making good readers great: we focus heavily on tarot education for the serious reader. We thank The Tarot Community for voting Beyond Worlds hosts as "Tarosophists of the year 2010," for "outstanding contribution to Tarot throughout the year." Those voting referred to the show as "dynamic, refreshing, innovative, constantly curious, educational and meaningful." Your Tarot Tribe, Beyond Worlds has "consistently produced an educational, wide-ranging, contemporary, relevant, fun, accessible, professional and well-produced online radio show for Tarot." We also received "Best Tarot Podcast of 2010" and "Best Tarot Podcast of 2011" from Theresa Reed, The Tarot Lady, at www.tarotlady.com (Thank you!). Join us and meet the world's premiere tarot thinkers, doers, creators, leaders, and publishers along with metaphysical teacher "greats" who help you tap into a deeper level with your own readings. Go deeper into your deck than you ever thought possible. Grab some tea, a soft chair, your favorite deck, and kick back with us. Beyond Worlds: "The voice of Tarot." THE DIAL IN NUMBER for Beyond Worlds is always the same: Call us at (646) 200-0765. Got feedback? E-mail us at TarotTribe@gmail.com. Special thanks to Ciro Marchetti for our beautiful, other-worldly banner.

item.title: Advanced Lenormand Techniques with Rana George - May 20,2012
item.description:
HANDOUT: donnaleigh.com/ranageorge.htm Rana George will take your Lenormand readings to the next level. How do you do fast questions? When is the Grand Tableau appropriate for a reading and when is it not effective? How can you make your deck work best for you? Rana comes from a long lineage of psychics from the Mediterranean region.When Rana was 10 years old, an old friend of the family, a great seer & psychic from the order of La Croix Rose in France, gave her mother a deck of cards known as Lenormand. A short while after that Rana began manifesting an interest in the cards, and provided readings for friends, family, & those close to her in the neighborhood. With the guidance of her family and especially her mothers counseling & support, Rana learned to use her gifts to help others." For close to 30 years Rana has been a teacher, a mentor, and a card reader for many clients and students. She was instrumental in the creation of the Pixies Astounding Lenormand Deck, a deck meant to bridge the gap between Lenormand and tarot. She is also a consultant to several other decks in progress, including Ciro Marchettis upcoming Lenormand deck. Learn more about Rana at ranageorge.com.

Rana George | Lenormand | advanced | class | cards

item.title: Lenomand Intro Class with Melissa Hill - May 19,2012
item.description:
HANDOUT: donnaleigh.com/melissahill.htm Get your Lenormand shoes on tonight! Lenormand expert Melissa Hill will be working with us to tell us about the Lenormand Deck and system! Melissa Jo Hill is the Sassy Sibyl - diviner of the great and mysterious universe, wearer of very tall boots. She has ten years expe­ri­ence in trans­for­ma­tive tarot con­sul­ta­tions and has been read­ing cards half her life. Melissa has published two Lenormand decks - the Melissa Lenormand and the Postmark Lenormand, and tutors new and experienced card readers in Lenormand theory, fortune telling and professionalism. She lives upstate New York with her two children. Melissa offers a downloadable, self-paced Lenormand video course at her website: http://lenormand.info.

item.title: Tarology Film: The Crew Joins Us to Share Secrets - May 13,2012
item.description:
HANDOUT AT: www.donnaleigh.com/tarology.htm Tonight, Georgie and DL will be joined by Enrique Enriquez, Chris Deleo, and Kimberlie Naughton, who created the first feature-lenght documentary film on the Tarot, called Tarology! Enrique puts the Marseille Tarot into the beautiful context of poetry and stories, revealing the profound effect these stories can have on our lives. In the film, you will follow Enrique through the streets of New York City as he demonstrates the poetic language of the Marseilles. In addition to learning about the experience of working with the Marseilles Tarot with Enrique Enriquez, the film features interviews with Rachel Pollack, Mary Greer, Sasha Graham, Dan Pelletier, Shawn Nacol, Sasha Graham, Wald Amberstone, and yours truly, DL! The film is now available for pre-orders. They expect to begin shipping early June, 2012. Please take a moment and visit the site to find out how you can order the DVD and take advantage of free international shipping. http://tarologyfilm.com/

item.title: Alchemical Tarot Book - Robert Place - Apr 22,2012
item.description:
Robert Place recently finished the book to accompany his popular Alchemical Tarot. Join us to hear many of the secrets embedded in the cards, and what type of gems you will find in this insightful, upcoming book on Alchemy. Well talk about some of the specific cards in his Alchemical Tarot deck and how the book can guide you to understanding their message. Robert M. Place is a world renowned Tarot scholar, illustrator, and author, the designer and author of The Alchemical Tarot The Angels Tarot The Tarot of the Saints The Buddha Tarot The Vampire Tarot The Tarot of the Sevenfold Mystery the author of The Tarot: History, Symbolism, and Divination, Astrology and Divination Shamanism Magic and Alchemy The Fools Journey: The History, Art, & Symbolism of the Tarot To learn more about Robert Place, visit his website at http://thealchemicalegg.com.

item.title: Meditation Moment #7 -Chanah Liora - Card Entering/Answering - Apr 19,2012
item.description:
Chanah Liorah Wizenberg of WiseWomanTarot.com joins us to share a personal tarot meditation technnique. Enter a single card and find some deep answers in the quiet of exploration. Chanah explains how to set up your meditative space and enter the card to seek an answer. Includes some discussion on psychic sensitivity and upbringing.

item.description:
Tarot Author and Deck Creator Barbara Moore shares her creative technique for using tarot to create a meditative theme, and she blends in scents to make the experience even more powerful. item.title: Part 2: Boundaries for Readers - Apr 01,2012
item.description:
April marks the 3rd year anniversary of your Tarot Tribe, Beyond Worlds! Celebrate with us this weekend, as we air Part 2 of our Boundaries for Readers. Join tarot panelists Georgianna Boehnke, Diane Wilkes, James Wells, Sharon Brown, & Theresa Reed. In this panel discussion, our topics include: * How to deal with clients who have strong boundary issues (dont offer feedback or answer questions or give input) * Boundaries with peers: when plagiarism happens, what do you do? * What do to when people expect more of you than you can give (clients and professional peers) *What cards represent issue with boundaries? * James offers a remarkable list of contemplative questions to help you define your own personal boundaries. Did you miss Part 1 of this topic? Click here to catch up.

item.title: Alchemy with Robert Place - Mar 25,2012
item.description:
Tarot Historian Robert Place joins Your Tarot Tribe, Beyond Worlds again, this time to talk about Alchemy, what it is, and how it is intertwined with Tarot, and alchemys Egypitan origin. Can tarot and Egyptian origins actually somehow intersect? Well see and you can decide. Robert M. Place is a world renowned Tarot scholar, illustrator, and author, the designer and author of The Alchemical Tarot The Angels Tarot The Tarot of the Saints The Buddha Tarot The Vampire Tarot The Tarot of the Sevenfold Mystery the author of The Tarot: History, Symbolism, and Divination, Astrology and Divination Shamanism Magic and Alchemy And His Latest Book The Fools Journey: The History, Art, & Symbolism of the Tarot To learn more about Robert Place, visit his website at http://thealchemicalegg.com.

item.title: Toni Gilbert and Archetypes - Mar 18,2012
item.description:
We talk about "archetypes" in the tarot deck, but what exactly IS an archetype? Gaining the ability to see the archetypes in everyday living is a spiritual journey, a pilgrimage to your authentic self. Learning to integrate principles of human development and self-actualization can promote healing and personal growth. Discover healing and step-by-step directions to help you see archetypal traits and scenarios. You will learn to integrate transpersonal psychology, neuroscience, and philosophy to observe and use Archetypal information. Toni Gilbert is a holistic nurse and transpersonal counselor. For over twenty years, Toni Gilbert has used insight-producing modalities such as Tarot, astrology, dream interpretation, and other shamanic tools to enhance her life and her alternative nursing practice. Learn more about Toni Gilbert, ADN, MA at: www.tonigilbert.com

item.title: Robert Place & The Life of Pamela Coleman Smith - Mar 11,2012
item.description:
Tarot Historian Robert Place joins Your Tarot Tribe, Beyond Worlds again, this time to share the remarkable life of Pamela Coleman Smith. Pamela Coleman Smith created the tarot deck as many of us know it today, working with Arthur Edward Waite to create the Rider-Waite-Smith tarot deck, the best-selling tarot deck in the world, and the one after which most other decks are designed. Robert M. Place is a world renowned Tarot scholar, illustrator, and author, the designer and author of The Alchemical Tarot The Angels Tarot The Tarot of the Saints The Buddha Tarot The Vampire Tarot The Tarot of the Sevenfold Mystery the author of The Tarot: History, Symbolism, and Divination, Astrology and Divination Shamanism Magic and Alchemy And His Latest Book The Fools Journey: The History, Art, & Symbolism of the Tarot To learn more about Robert Place, visit his website at http://thealchemicalegg.com.

item.title: Roxi Sim - Workbook for Pearls of Wisdom Deck - Mar 05,2012
item.description:
HANDOUT: donnaleigh.com/roxi.htm The Pearls of Wisdom Tarot workbook contains an addition to the information about the symbolism of her deck, with meditations & healing art projects as well. Painting the Pearls of Wisdom Tarot, a deck dedicated to her late son & mother, was a 7 year art therapy session for Roxi. Prior to getting sick, Roxi had studied art therapy and Jung & was headed for a masters when she took ill. Instead of a masters thesis in counseling, the Pearls of Wisdom Tarot was born. Now 11 years later Roxi is offering a Workbook/Journal for the Tarot Deck. The Pearls of Wisdom Tarot as been dubbed "A Masters course in the Esoteric" Well, the Workbook/Journal is the PHD! A course that reveals the meanings behind the unique symbolism used in her deck; has meditations that put you into the cards; includes healing art projects that uplift and journal exercises that make your journey through the Pearls of Wisdom Tarot uniquely your own. www.roxiartwork.com Webinar: http://globalspiritualstudies.com/shop/presentations/tarot/roxi-sim-the-pearls-of-wisdom-tarot-a-healing-experience/ Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/pages/Pearls-of-Wisdom-Tarot/ Twitter @RoxiArtWork

item.title: Richard Shadowfox: Tarot Deck of Heroes, 2013 Tarot Deck - Feb 27,2012
item.description:
Handout: http://www.donnaleigh.com/shadowfox.htm Tonight well talk about the tarot decks of Richard Shadowfox! Richard ShadowFox learned Tarot in college through the studies of Carl Jung, but that was entirely without context, and didn’t promote practical application. That came later. Over the last 11 years, Richard has completed the Legends of Rock Tarot, The Minimal E. Stick Tarot, The Tarot Progressive, The Ultimate Tarot, The ShadowFox Tarot, and Tarot Deck of Heroes. He has in progress now, and scheduled for release in 2013, Tarot of the Night, with the Chromillennium Tarot and Feminine Devine Tarot up next. Although he uses modern technology, he is very much a traditionalist with his imagery, in that he likes the original concept of humans, the elements and the normal environments of everyday life. Richard has a degree in Computer Science and has worked for such companies as IBM, and Arthur Andersen, but wanted to be an artist and a writer. As fate would have it, Richad found his opportunity to focus his artistic energies and desires in the late 1990s through the Tarot. To further his appreciation Richard has also read and studied the writings of Rachel Pollack, (his favorite), Mary K. Greer, Robert Place, as well as many others. Learn more about Richard Shadowfox at: http://richardshadowfox.net/

item.title: Meditation Moment - Matt Williams, Guided Tarot Meditations - Feb 20,2012
item.description:
Matt Williams takes us on three beautiful guided meditations: one for a Major Arcana, one for a Court Card, and one for a pip card. Matt Williams is a professional tarot reader and the owner of http://personaltarotwithmatt.com. Though he has been interested in the paranormal and the world of psychic phenomenon for many years, it has just been in the last few years that he has sought to immerse himself in the personal exploration of these things. In picking up the Tarot, Matt developed an almost immediate connection to the cards and felt as though a gift was being awoken from a life gone by. Throughout his growth with the Tarot, Matt has sought to expand the natural psychic and healing gifts that we are all born with by studying Reiki and psychic mediumship as well. These skills are added to the readings that Matt gives to provide those he works with an insightful and healing experience. Matt is also the author of Tarot Thoughts Blog at http://personaltarotwithmatt.com/blog. His writing has been featured in Tarosophist International as well. Tuesday nights at 7 pm Central, Matt hosts the Akasha Temple Radio production, “Personal Tarot Radio” at http://www.blogtalkradio.com/akashatemple. To find out more about Matt, visit http://personaltarotwithmatt.com or http://www.facebook.com/personaltarotor follow him on Twitter @personaltarot.

item.title: Meditation Moment - Physical Yoga ThruTarot withTheresa Reed - Feb 20,2012
item.description:
Physical Yoga Through Tarot, by Theresa Reed Todays Meditation Moment features the wisdom of Theresa Reed, The Tarot Lady. Theresa guides us on how to incorporate yoga into tarot, and how to make tarot a physical part of our daily movements and activities. Theresa has been a practicing yogini for about 15 years and a yoga teacher for eight years. You can learn more about her yoga practice at http://innerdivinityyoga.com, and more about her tarot work at http://thetarotlady.com.

item.title: James Wanless & The Sustain Yourself Cards - Feb 13,2012
item.description:
Handout: http://tinyurl.com/sustaincards James Wanless, PhD is likely best known for his Voyager Tarot Deck, on of the most popular tarot decks today and considered a classic in our field. Tonight we talk about his new deck, the Sustain Yourself Cards! With his magical blend of personal charisma, humor and pragmatic enthusiasm, James is thought of as a “corporate shaman” and an internationally known authority on intuition. He speaks and trains throughout the world with leaders and companies with the creative right-brain processes in his book, Intuition@Work. joins us tonight with his new Sustain Yourself Cards! Dr. Wanless new Sustain Yourself Cards are 101 colorful photomontage cards sorted into five domains - Elemental, Mineral, Plant, Animal, and Human . Dr. Wanless’ books include Way of the Great Oracle, Strategic Intuition for the 21st Century, Intuition@Work, New Age Tarot, and Wheel of Tarot: a New Revolution. He teaches the online correspondence courses “Way of the Seeker” and "Way of the Seer," and his columns appear in alternative newspapers nationwide. Learn more about the Sustain Yourself Cards at http://sustainyourselfcards.com

item.title: Boundaries for Readers -- Special Panel Discussion - Feb 06,2012
item.description:
Join us tonight for a special panel discussion with multiple professional tarotists as we talk about "boundaries for readers." Panelists include Georgianna Boehnke, Diane Wilkes, James Wells, Sharon Brown, Theresa Reed, & Marcy Currier. Discussion topics will include: When your reading is criticized When the wrong types of clients are attracted to you Expectation of free readings that infringes upon a real or implied friendship Asking readers to interpret cards youve laid out or other readings done by someone else Clients who overdo readings (psychic addiction?) When uncomfortable topics or questions arise, how to professionally respond Bartering ~ some people will expect us to barter even when our policies clearly state we wont do so. When there are too many follow-up questions on email readings -- how to handle this Payment boundaries ~ While some have a hardship story and ask for a reading now to be paid for later, When a client complains your fees are too high When you have to let go of (or literally "fire" a client) To hear part 2 of this topic, CLICK HERE.

item.title: Ciro Marchetti: Gilded Royale & Oracle of Visions - Jan 30,2012
item.description:
Handout: http://tinyurl.com/gildedroyale We are proud to warmly welcome back Ciro Marchetti, who is releasing an updated, realism-enriched version of his Gilded Tarot, the new Gilded Royale Tarot! Tonight, youll see some of Ciros cards unveiled for the very first time in public. Join us to learn about the secrets in the imagery, and see how these gorgeous new cards read. Ciro will also be discussing his Oracle of Visions deck. Lets try some readings together! Learn more about Ciro at www.CiroMarchetti.com See more images from the deck and purchase these decks at: http://www.ciromarchetti.com/ciromarchetti/Gilded_Tarot_-_Royale. htmlhttp://www.ciromarchetti.com/ciromarchetti/Oracle_of_Visions.html

item.title: Cat's Eye Tarot with Debra Givin - Jan 23,2012
item.description:
HANDOUT: donnaleigh.com/catseyetarot.htmhttp://donnaleigh.com/catseyetarot.htm Were proud to welcome Debra Givin of the Cats Eye Tarot, published by U.S. Games. Dr. Debra Givin is a graduate of the Washington State University College of Veterinary Medicine and has been practicing in Maine since 1982. She started an feline exclusive practice in 1988. Appreciation for this wonderful species has continued to grow over the years. Her current interests include behavior and individual feline temperament types, environmental enrichment and prevention of obesity, and finally the restoration of cats to the god-like status they held in ancient Egypt. Dr. Givin has received instruction in the subtle art of Feline communication from Quicken, Bradlee and Fergie with whom she shares her home. She and her man Keith enjoy sea kayaking, golf, and cross country skiing. Watercolor painting, the tarot, tatting, photography, sewing period correct 1860s clothing and renovating their old house fill the remaining daylight hours. Dr. Givin has created an exquisite tarot deck that captures the personality of the feline in her deck, Cats Eye Tarot. Join us tonight as we take a walk with the cats and read her beautiful cards.... Learn more about the Cats Eye Tarot at: http://www.catdocmaine.com/tarotcats.html

item.title: Stories and Tarot with James Ricklef & more... - Jan 08,2012
item.description:
HANDOUT: tinyurl.com/tarotmasters James Ricklef joins us with Katrina Wynne and Mike Hernandez to talk about stories and tarot. Lets learn together and do some interactive techniques together and pull out some tarot cards on stories. James has a new version available of his book, Tarot Tells the Tale, titled "Tarot Reading Explained." James book is now available through CreateSpace.com and will very soon be on Amazon. See: https://www.createspace.com/3697140 Learn more about James at www.jamesricklef.com Katrina Wynnes gift in working with clients using the Tarot is enhanced by years of experience as a psychotherapist, training in the healing arts, and her calling as a spiritual guide. She blends her intuition and knowledge with her client’s to reveal the energy at work and the lesson in the reading. Sometimes,she says she feels like a spiritual midwife, helping new life to be born! Learn about Katrina Wynne athttp://TarotCounseling.orghttp://TarotSpirituality.orghttp://MySacredJourney.org and about Mike Hernandez atwww.JustEnoughTarot.com

item.title: HiC Luttmers - Tarot Oils and Rituals - Dec 05,2011
item.description:
HANDOUT: tinyurl.com/hicrituals HiC is a Tarot Conversationalist and Ritualist who has been working with the Tarot for over 12 years. His readings have been described as “a tarot reading, therapy session and life coaching session all in one.” He uses the Tarot as a catalyst for the intuitive process to help bring information, insight, enlightenment and empowerment to his clients. HiC’s goal with each client is that they leave a reading feeling empowered with what they need to create the future they want for themselves rather than simply predicting what that future might be. As a Ritualist, HiC helps a an individual or group in co-creating a process to bring about a desired change or result in themselves or their lives using techniques and materials from various magical and spiritual disciplines. HiC offers readings in person, by phone, email, or via Skype/webcam. You can reach HiC through his website at www.tarotbyhic.net or email him at hic@tarotbyhic.net

item.title: Dreams & Tarot with Stacy LaRosa - Nov 28,2011
item.description:
Stacy LaRosa has had vivid, beautiful, terrifying and prophetic dreams all her life & began doing her own tarot reading & dream interpreting business in March of 2009. By adding tarot after the decoding of the dreams, the dreamer now knew not just what the meaning to the dream was about, but steps to take in waking life to ease the anxiety causing those dreams. Dreams & tarot are two separate languages. Both are based in symbols, but are very different. If the dream message is not being received, these dreams will continue to occur, sometimes the exact same one or a variation on the same theme till the dreamer finally gets it. Unveil the mystery behind the symbols, relate it to waking life situations, then do a tarot spread to help the dreamer find a way out of their troubles and move forward in life Learn more about Stacy at www.TarotElements.com. Stacys Dream Interpretation Blog tinyurl.com/stacydream Stacys Dream Interpretation Spread: www.tarotelements.com/tarot-spreads/dream-interpretation-spread/

item.title: The Kingdom Within Tarot - Nov 21,2011
item.description:
Handout: tinyurl.com/kingdomtarot Let’s investigate the Tarot’s vast correlations between the ancient systems of astrology and Qabalah, incorporating the collective archetypes of humanity and the fundamental myths that infuse our spiritual traditions! As we dig deep into the Tarot, we will use the new deck (The Kingdom Within Tarot) and book (The Alchemy of Tarot) written by Juno Lucina and illustrated by Shannon ThornFeather to delve further. Lets walk through the cards together as we do two readings together—a spiritual pathworking spread called “The Hero’s Journey”, exploring all the vital applications of the Tarot to our lives.

item.description:
Please note the earlier time of this show: 1 pm ET. Handout HERE or at tinyurl.com/racheljewelry We are grateful to have Rachel Pollack return with our Tribe, and this time she will be talking about creativity with Tarot. Many of you may have heard about (or may have) Rachels amazing beaded neck pieces. She names them after tarot cards and will be talking about pulliing the energy of tarot into creative works like this. She also has a brand new book out, Soul Forest: Twenty Four Tarot Writings, published by Tarot Media Company. item.title: Marie White & The Mary-el Tarot - Nov 14,2011
item.description:
HANDOUT: donnaleigh.com/mariewhite.htm Marie White, creator of the Mary-El Tarot joins us to talk about her incredible deck. Marie White was compelled to create art from a very early age and thought of it as something akin to breathing or water. She grew up with a pencil in hand recording the substance of dreams, visions, nature, and the human form. In 1997 her love of mysticism, symbolism, words, and art collided naturally and she began the Mary-el Tarot which ended up taking over a decade to complete. Her favorite medium is oil paint used in a method called grisaille, a technique also favored by the old masters where thin layers of color are slowly built up bringing out the natural depth and luminosity of the paint. Born and raised in Southern California, she presently lives with her three children in the sultry piedmont forest of North Carolina where she can paint under the rolling thunder and the moving shadows of trees. Learn more about the Mary-el tarot at http://mary-el.com.

item.title: Carolyn Cushing -Different Decks for Different Needs - Nov 07,2011
item.description:
Handout: tinyurl.com/differentdecks Different Decks for Different Needs “Why do we have all these kids?” asks George Bailey in It’s a Wonderful Life before he is awakened to his own necessary and special place in his community. Is there similar question for the Tarot family, “Why do we have all these decks?” Perhaps each deck, too, has a wonderful gift, a unique perspective to offer. Carolyn Cushing from Art of Change Tarot will join us to talk about findings from a survey of the Tarot community about decks that offer special insights into questions such as those related to love, work, and spiritual issues as well as all purpose decks. She’ll also share a process she developed for using the Gaian Tarot to inspire your sacred/contemplative practice as an example of how to make a match between a deck and a seeker’s need. Warning: This call will make you want to go out and buy more decks!

item.description:
We are honored to have Koneta Bailey of www.newpathstarot.com join us to share one of her favorite books in tarot through this audio book review, Tarot Outside the Box! Take a listen and see what she found within this book.... This audio review lands this book in our Tarot Book Hall of Fame! Thank you, Koneta, for this beautiful review. Do you have a favorite tarot book that youd like to review? Contact us at tarottribe@gmail.com. What book do you think should be in the Tarot Book Hall of Fame?

item.title: Paris Finley - Energy Balances (& Imbalances) of Cards. - Oct 23,2011
item.description:
HANDOUT: CLICK HERE Paris Finley of www.TarotbyParis.com will be joining us for a remarkable tutorial on energy balances and extremes of cards. While well be working with the Major Arcana cards, this technique can be used for any card in the deck. This technique will enhance your readings, and wait until you see what it can do to your one-card readings! Join us for as we watch the cards do some wild balancing acts.... PARIS FINLEY is a writer, a retired teacher, and a lifelong student of the Tarot. He is a member of the Massachusetts Tarot Society and the Gaian Tarot Circle. His favorite decks are the Alchemical Tarot, the Gaian Tarot, and the traditional Tarot de Marseille. Visit his website at www.tarotbyparis.com

item.title: Meditation Moment - Paris Finley, Making an Easel, and Trees - Oct 08,2011
item.description:
Handout: http://tinyurl.com/pariseasel Welcome to our first Beyond Worlds Meditation Moment. These mini podcasts will be sprinkled in between our typical podcasts. With a focus on healing, soothing, and releasing, these meditation techniques will pull in tarot to help you find your soul. Paris Finley of www.TarotByParis.com presents our first meditation preparation technique, a hand-made easel that is easy enough for anyone to make. See how it is created, what it means, how it can be used, and more. Following the meditation moment is a "behind the meditation curtain" discussion about people and things in tarot that we find inspiring. All our Meditation Moments will be organized at www.Donnaleigh.com under the "Radio Shows" tabs, or go to http://tinyurl.com/meditationmoments We hope you enjoy this new feature on Beyond Worlds.

item.title: The Maiden's Voyage with Pamela Steele - Sep 25,2011
item.description:
Handout: http://tinyurl.com/pamelasteele Pamela Phillips-Steele has 4 decades of art experience & over 30 years tarot reading experience. She has produced a blending of old-school tarot & new-age attitude & a user-friendly extended tarot deck designed for beginning & experienced readers. Developing from a traditional base, Pamela has taken tarot reading to the next level with additional Minor and Major arcana included to produce an 88-card deck. Her vivid new images reveal layers of meaning within each card while triggering the reader’s intuitive process to reach beyond pat meanings & into deeper realizations. The Steele Wizard Tarot deck provides a unique experience in the art of tarot reading. From the Minor Arcana’s detailing of personal experiences to the Major Arcana’s exploration of Spiritual influences this deck helps clarify what is strategic to the summing up of our lives. By exploring the possibilities and examining the choices we make each moment we gain clarity and insight into the unfolding experience of our personal journey. The choices we make today determine the events we experience tomorrow. The Steele Wizard Tarot is a practical divination tool specially designed for such a purpose. Whether a beginner or an experienced professional, this deck will prove to be a valuable tool for spiritual exploration. PaSteele Wizard deck at steelewizard.com

item.title: The Gaian Tarot with Joanna Colbert & James Wells - Sep 11,2011
item.description:
Handout: http://tinyurl.com/gaianspread Joanna Powell Colbert & James Wells join us tonight to work with the Gaian Tarot, now available as a Mass Market edition! Gaian Tarot holds a multicultural, contemporary community of people living sustainably on the land & working to heal Mama Gaia. You’ll recognize yourself in these cards & will be able to envision new, inspiring possibilities for your life. You’ll learn to heal yourself, & to heal the earth as well. Joanna is an artist, writer & teacher of Tarot & earth-centered spirituality. The Gaian Tarot, 9 years in the making, combines Joanna’s love of symbolic, archetypal art with the mysteries of the natural world. James is known for his insightful questions designed to shift & expand life perception. He is a Toronto-based consultant, guide, & facilitator, employing tarot, circle process, motivational listening, komyo reiki, & journal writing. Personal sessions & group experiences. All the images from the deck can be seen online at www.GaianTarot.com. www.GaianSoul.com www.jameswells.wordpress.com/

item.title: Sunday in Shadow with Thalassa (and SF BATS!) - Aug 07,2011
item.description:
After awhile, most Tarot practitioners have encountered "problem cards" that bemuse and stymie in readings, cards that are difficult, daunting or downright cantankerous. Fun fact: they can become your best friends! Well be talking about lessons to be learned from the dark and difficult aspects of the cards, as well reading the both the light and the shadow sides of a card as an alternative to reversals. Well also talk a little bit about the upcoming San Francisco Bay Area Tarot Symposium (SF BATS)! Learn more about Thalassa and BATS at http://dodivination.com/

SF Bats | bay area tarot symposium | thalassa | tarot shadow | donnaleigh

After awhile, most Tarot practitioners have encountered "problem cards" that bemuse and stymie in readings, cards that are difficult, daunting or downright cantankerous. Fun fact: they can become your best friends! Well be talking about lessons to be learned from the dark and difficult aspects of the cards, as well reading the both the light and the shadow sides of a card as an alternative to reversals. Well also talk a little bit about the upcoming San Francisco Bay Area Tarot Symposium (SF BATS)! Learn more about Thalassa and BATS at http://dodivination.com/

item.title: Tarot History (Part 2) with Robert Place - Jul 24,2011
item.description:
There are many myths and legends about the origin of tarot. But where did it actually originate? Tonight, meet the facts as Robert M. Place shares with us the rich history of tarot, in Part 2 of an important 2-Part series. Part 1 can be heard HERE. Robert M. Place is designer, illustrator, & co-author, with Rosemary Ellen Guiley, of: The Alchemical Tarot & The Angels Tarot, and the designer, illustrator, & author of The Tarot of the Saints, The Buddha Tarot, & The Vampire Tarot. He is the author of The Tarot: History, Symbolism, & Divination, which Booklist has said "may be the best book ever written on that deck of cards decorated with mysterious images called the tarot." He also the author of Astrology & Divination, Magic & Alchemy, & Shamanism, & Unexplained Phenomena series. Bob is currently creating his 6th deck, The Tarot of the Sevenfold Mystery. Robert can be reached through his websites: www.thealchemicalegg.com www.alchemicaltarot.com Find products by Robert at: http://tinyurl.com/robertplace

item.title: Tali Goodwin - Resolving Doubts Through Tarot - Jul 18,2011
item.description:
Handout: www.tinyurl.com/taliblog Tali Goodwin is the Marketing Director for Tarot Professionals Ltd and the co-author (with Marcus Katz) of Tarot Flip, Tarot Twist, Tarot Inspire (forthcoming 2011) and two innovative new tarot books for Llewellyn Worldwide, which will be published in 2012. She organises the Tarosophy Tarot Conference in the Lake District of England and writes for Tarosophist International magazine. She is the co-founder of Tarot-Town, the social network for those who simply love Tarot. She has recently launched her unique Tarot Speakeasy blog (www.tarotspeakeasy.com) which is the world’s only time-travelling tarot blog – shifting lingo and slang every few months! This blog is powered by shindigtarot.com, a unique online Tarot service with video-chat and integrated Tarot cards for which Tali provides tarot, media and marketing consultancy. Tali has worked previously in Occupational Therapy (Alzheimer Care) and lives with her partner, Lyn Birkbeck, a leading astrologer and author. Her practice in Reiki has been on-going since 1994. Her passion is the enigma and mystery of Tarot, and giving it a unique voice. Learn more about Tali at : www.tarotspeakeasy.com

item.title: Sex in Tarot - Katrina Wynne, M.A. - Jun 26,2011
item.description:
Handout: www.tinyurl.com/sexintarot With a title like “Sex in Tarot” it might seem like we are just trying to titillate your interest, but the truth is sexual energy and symbolism are integral aspects of Tarot wisdom. Please join us for some serious fun and games while we explore all things sexual with Tarot. Bring your input and questions to the mix for this lively discussion with Katrina during her third delightful guest appearance on Beyond Worlds - Your Tarot Tribe. Katrina Wynne, M.A., known for her unique Tarot Counseling style, brings close to 40 years experience with Tarot combined with 22 years as a metaphysical teacher and professional psychotherapist. She is the creator of the "Tarot History" poster & chart and the "Transformative Tarot Counseling™" booklet. http://TarotCounseling.org http://MySacredJourney.org ~ weblog http://TarotSpirituality.org

item.title: Tarot of Physics with Dan Horn & Corrine Kenner - Jun 25,2011
item.description:
Handout: www.tinyurl.com/tarotofphysics "It should be possible to explain the laws of physics to a barmaid." — Albert Einstein The Tarot of Physics is a hot new self-published tarot deck by Dan Horn and Corrine Kenner, sold exclusively through The Tarot Garden. This deck uses the fascinating wide world of physics to illustrate tarot -– and visa-versa. Each card matches a scientific principle, phenomenon, or law with a corresponding tarot idea. And WOW, what it does to readings! Explanations are provided, helping interpretation and allowing each concept to define the other. The suits are Energy, Space, Time, and Matter. The card backs are laminated to provide durability, but unlaminated on the front to allow for coloring and/or annotating of the images. Youll see your readings in a new "light" and with interpretations that will electrify you! Truly incredible interpretations come through, even if you know zip about physics. Dan will teach us tonight how the cards energetically interact, in a way everyone can understand. Learn more about the deck at www.tarotofphysics.com.

item.title: Class 10 - Beyond Tarot Intensive - Tower and Star - Jun 19,2011
item.description:
Handout: tinyurl.com/towerstar Join us for the 10th in our series of "Beyond Tarot" Intensive Classes as we study in depth two cards of the Major Arcana: The Tower and The Star cards. These classes will feature 4 Beyond Worlds cohosts, and we will journey through the deck together in a fun, interactive class-like format with a modern twist. Cohosted by Georgianna Boehnke, Mike Hernandez, Valerie Sylvester, and Donnaleigh, we also have a cameo later in the show when Pamela Steele joins us to talk about these two cards in her Steele Wizard Tarot. What do they tell us? To see a tidy list of all the Beyond Intensive classes aired so far, go to: http://www.divinewhispers.net/tarotintensive.htm

item.title: Robert Place - Creating Action After Readings - Jun 18,2011
item.description:
Handout: www.divinewhispers.net/robertplace.htm Often in readings, we know what action needs to happen, and the client recognizes this as well, but they will return to the same situtation without change. Today, lets talk about psychoactive space in tarot....creating *action* through readings. Robert M. Place is designer, illustrator, & co-author, with Rosemary Ellen Guiley, of: The Alchemical Tarot & The Angels Tarot, and the designer, illustrator, & author of The Tarot of the Saints, The Buddha Tarot, & The Vampire Tarot. He is the author of The Tarot: History, Symbolism, & Divination, which Booklist has said "may be the best book ever written on that deck of cards decorated with mysterious images called the tarot." He also the author of Astrology & Divination, Magic & Alchemy, & Shamanism, & Unexplained Phenomena series. Bob is currently creating his 6th deck, The Tarot of the Sevenfold Mystery. Robert can be reached through his websites: www.thealchemicalegg.com www.alchemicaltarot.com Find products by Robert at: http://tinyurl.com/robertplace

item.title: Dale Howard - Raise Your Glass! - Jun 12,2011
item.description:
Handout: tinyurl.com/dalehoward Dale Theresa Howard joins us to raise your glass tonight ! Enjoy a tarot spread celebrating you & your journey of self-discovery! Dale has been fascinated with tarot since she got my first reading from Madame Jean on the boardwalk at Salisbury Beach, Massachusetts when she was 12 years old. Dale says, "Madame Jean guided me through rich velvet drapes and shuffled her odd deck effortlessly. She laid down each weathered card & jingled softly as she leaned in closer to share my life, my world in that little room. It was intoxicating. Years later I left a reading feeling disappointed & thought to myself, I’ll bet I could have done better than that – and that’s the day the seed was planted. Since that moment I’ve learned so many things. I’ve learned that I hear the cards differently depending on the client before me, the card’s position on table, the specific image looking up at me. I’ve learned that someone seeing a tarot deck for the first time can provide insight that leaves you awestruck. I’ve learned that the simplest things can be magical. And I’ve learned that the greatest teachers remain lifelong students." Learn more about Dale Howard at www.readingsbydale.com. Dale also helps coordinate the MTS (Massachusetts Tarot Society) http://masstarot.wordpress.com/about/.

item.title: Scott Grossberg & The Vitruvian Square ... in Tarot - Jun 05,2011
item.description:
Handout: www.tinyurl.com/scottsquare Beyond Worlds cohosts Donnaleigh and Ginny Hunt extend a warm welcome back to Scott Grossberg tonight, to talk about his book, The Vitruvian Square. This is what Jerome Finley had to say in his introduction to this book: “ Welcome to “The Vitruvian Square.” Knowing what I know, I envy your position now and I’m thrilled about the incredible journey and path you’re about to step foot upon. The Vitruvian Square is a divination method that can be applied to tarot. By dividing a card into a grid, you will find more information in your reading than ever before possible. How? What do the sections represent?Join us and find out! Scott has released two critically acclaimed books, "The Masks of Tarot" and "Bauta: Betraying the Face of Illusion," in addition to his oracle/divination cards, "The Deck of Shadows." Learn more about Scott Grossberg at: www.thinkingmagically.com and visit his blog at: www.scottgrossberg.wordpress.com

item.title: Reversals! A Class with Psychic Friends Rewind - May 31,2011
item.description:
To reverse or not to reverse...that is the question! Join Mike Hernandez, Theresa Reed, and Storm Cestavani as we delve into the land of Tarot Reversals. What happens to a cards meaning when it is reversed? Hear the possibilities here from 3 of tarots shining stars. The show includes a tarot tip on reading cards for movies and books, television shows and poetry. You can find the Pirates of the Caribbean blog that gives an example of the technique HERE.

item.title: Class 9 - Temperance & The Devil - Beyond Tarot Intensive - May 22,2011
item.description:
Handout: http://tinyurl.com/bwclass9 Join us for the 9th in our series of "Beyond Tarot" Intensive Classes as we study in depth two cards of the Major Arcana: Temperance & The Devil. These classes will feature 4 Beyond Worlds cohosts, and we will journey through the deck together in a fun, interactive class-like format with a modern twist. Cohosted by Georgianna Boehnke, Theresa Reed, Marcia McCord, and Donnaleigh, we also have a cameo later in the show when Johanna G. Sherman joins us to talk about these two cards in her Sacred Rose Tarot. What do they tell us? To see a tidy list of all the Beyond Intensive classes aired so far, go to: http://www.divinewhispers.net/tarotintensive.htm

item.title: Marcus Katz & World Tarot Day - May 21,2011
item.description:
World Tarot Day (www.WorldTarotDay.com) was established by Den Elder, and is celebrated by tarotists around the world! Marcus Katz of Tarot Professionals joins us tonight as we talk about the fun activities you can do to participate in tarots biggest day! Join the worlds largest tarot reading! Head over to the Fools Fair which is a website only appearing during the World Tarot Day. It has a host of activities, special offers and information throughout the day and then vanishes - poof! - until next year! It is at http://www.foolsfair.com. Be the first person in a century to see one of the rarest tarot images in the world ... A. E. Waites SECOND Tarot deck! Marcus will explain more... Have a FREE Tarot Reading on MAY 25th with ShindigTarot.com! If you are reader, do consider registering to offer readings on the day to share your talent. Learn to read and improve your Tarot with a FREE live online course from Marcus Katz, 9pm UK, 4pm EST on May 25th. AND LOTS MORE! Come talk tarot with us and see how you can join in on the tarot fun around the world to push your favorite activity forward into the world: Tarot! WTD activities sheet - download for free at www.worldtarotday.com. Check out into on Marcus forthcoming book HERE. Learn more about Marcus at www.TarotProfessionals.com.

item.title: Major Tom Schick - Getting Along with the Inner Saboteur - May 15,2011
item.description:
Handout: http://tinyurl.com/tomtarot Dan Pelletier co-hosts! Major Tom ~ how we can get along with our Inner Saboteur through tarot. He says, "For most of my life Ive been my own worst enemy & I firmly believe this is the result of too much living in my own head. I firmly believe that tarot has helped me to get out of my own way and begin to truly enjoy the here and now." "For me, the tarot is entirely about getting the information you need to produce the outcomes you desire. The first step to determining your desire is getting to know yourself." Now in its 10th year, Major Tom has published the limited edition Tarot Lovers Calendar as a spiral bound, high quality printed showcase of the most talented artists and writers working with tarot in the world today. He has also created: 1) Major Toms Tarot, composed entirely of photo collage created using Paint Shop Pro. 2) Major Toms Tarot of Marseilles is a deck that demonstrates the Marseilles tradition is alive and well, with an edition published by Schiffer Books. Also check out his monthly Tarot Scopes. Major Toms clients span 5 continents. He is now based in the lovely market town of Framlingham, Suffolk, England, UK and is the leading professional tarot card reader in East Anglia. Learn more at www.MajorTom.biz.

item.title: Kim Huggens - Tarot 101 - May 14,2011
item.description:
Handout: http://tinyurl.com/tarot101 Kim Huggens has been studying the Tarot since the age of 9, and is a professional reader, workshop leader & speaker. She is the author of the book, “Tarot 101: Mastering the Art of Reading the Cards” (Llewellyn, 2010), a homestudy Tarot course that takes the reader from beginner to professional level in 22 integrated lessons. She is the co-author of “Sol Invictus: the God Tarot” (Schiffer Books, 2007) with artist & friend Nic Phillips, a fully-illustrated 78-card deck exploring the many faces of the Divine Masculine through world mythology & the archetypes of the Tarot. The pair are currently working on a companion deck, “Pistis Sophia: the Goddess Tarot”, which can be seen online at: http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=42499059316. Kim gives talks & workshops on Tarot & her other research interests around the UK, & writes articles on various aspects of working with the cards. Kim learned to read the cards best by sitting in pubs & reading for strangers in return for drinks, and thus the deck she has been reading with for the last 11 years is battered, stained, smells and feels a little bit sticky… She wouldn’t have it any other way. http://kimhuggens-tarot.webs.com/

item.title: Enrique Enriquez & Filming Tarot - May 07,2011
item.description:
Handout for tonights class is at: http://tinyurl.com/eenriquez Chris Deleo and producer Kimmie Naughton are creating the first feature length documentary about tarot. The film follows New York City based poet and tarot card reader, Enrique Enriquez. Enrique says he is not a fortune teller... you will not find a hint of mysticism or occult thinking here. Instead, you will experience an artist who uses tarot cards to craft beautiful stories. Join us on a journey through the Marseilles deck as we discuss the upcoming film that features Enrique. Learn more about Enrique at www.enriqueenriquez.org and information on his film documentary can be seen at: http://www.indiegogo.com/Enrique-Enriquez-Project

item.title: Dan Pelletier & Tarot's 12 Step Program - Apr 23,2011
item.description:
Professional Tarotist Dan Pelletier returns to Your Tarot Tribe, Beyond Worlds, to talk about Tarots 12-Step Program (that is really 22 steps). Readers Studio is next week, and tonights show has perfect timing, as this 12-Step Program episode is what Dan presented at last years Lunchn Learn at Readers Studio! Dan Pelletier is the author of "The Process–The Way of the Tarot Reader.” He has written articles appearing in The Association for Tarot Studies Newsletter, Timeless Spirit Magazine, Tarot for Life website newsletter “Seeker’s Journey,” & has interviewed deck creators on the tarotgarden.com website library. He has been reading Tarot for himself & others for close to four decades. Dan is co-owner of The Tarot Garden, a highly respected resource for tarot decks & related information on the Internet. Learn more about The Tarot Garden at www.TarotGarden.com. Dans Audiobook, "The Process," can be purchased at www.TarotConnection.net.

item.title: Zach Wong & The Revelations Tarot - Apr 16,2011
item.description:
Handout: http://tinyurl.com/zachtarot Whether youre new to divination or an experienced professional, working with reversed Tarot cards is always a challenge. After all, the image is upside-down and everything appears, well, reversed. How can you possibly work with such inverted symbols? Zach Wong created the ultimate solution. He presents different symbolism on the bottom part of the card, so it appears upright when the card is inverted. This is like having a 156-card deck while only using 78 cards. Zach created the incredible Revelations Tarot, the deck designed to have pictures upright...even when read as reversals. The reversed pictures show the shifted energy of that reversed card, & make it easy to feel the energy of that card, whether upright or reversed. Zach is an Artist who was born under the sign of fire, and has had a life full of movement by the forces of water. After growing up in the cultural melting pot of Malaysia, migrated to Australia and now resides in cosmopolitan Melbourne. The infusion of Eastern and Western styles are evident in his deck, Revelations Tarot, where styles & elements seep through the line work from his subconscious. The deck, born out of frustration & necessity, aids him in exploring the language of tarot through reflective meditation & lateral exploration. When not fused to the internet at the back of his optic nerve, he works on various digital paintings and artistic projects to keep his idle hands out of trouble. He also has a fondness for cats, cooking and cocktails. Visit his website: www.zachwong.com

revelations tarot | tarot | donnaleigh | zach wong | storm cestavani

After all, the image is upside-down and everything appears, well, reversed. How can you possibly work with such inverted symbols? Zach Wong created the ultimate solution. He presents different symbolism on the bottom part of the card, so it appears upright when the card is inverted. This is like having a 156-card deck while only using 78 cards. Zach created the incredible Revelations Tarot, the deck designed to have pictures upright...even when read as reversals. The reversed pictures show the shifted energy of that reversed card, & make it easy to feel the energy of that card, whether upright or reversed. Zach is an Artist who was born under the sign of fire, and has had a life full of movement by the forces of water. After growing up in the cultural melting pot of Malaysia, migrated to Australia and now resides in cosmopolitan Melbourne. The infusion of Eastern and Western styles are evident in his deck, Revelations Tarot, where styles & elements seep through the line work from his subconscious. The deck, born out of frustration & necessity, aids him in exploring the language of tarot through reflective meditation & lateral exploration. When not fused to the internet at the back of his optic nerve, he works on various digital paintings and artistic projects to keep his idle hands out of trouble. He also has a fondness for cats, cooking and cocktails. Visit his website: www.zachwong.com

item.title: Tarot of the Boroughs with Courtney Weber & George Courtney - Apr 10,2011
item.description:
Handout: http://tinyurl.com/tarotboroughs Courtney Weber is the producer and designer of “Tarot of the Boroughs,” a contemporary, Urban Tarot deck set in New York City with photography by George Courtney. Courtney Weber is a Priestess, writer, Tarot Advisor, performer & activist originally from Portland, OR. She is the HPS of Novices of the Old Ways, a Progressive Wiccan and Pagan group based in New York City and Portland, Oregon. Courtney is a Masters of Divinity Candidate at Union Theological Seminary. Stalk her daily habits at agirlcalledwoo.blogspot.com. George Courtney is a Manhattan-based artist whose subject matters ranges widely from performance artists to landscapes, to headshots and weddings. He feels Courtney’s extensive knowledge of the tarot and his capturing eye will help spread the awareness of the art of the Tarot and reacquaint the world with the beauty of the contemporary American city. George is also a practicing astrologer in New York city and writes a weekly blog called Its Astrology Time http://georgecourtney.blogspot.com/ that focuses on demystifying astrology and showing how the events on earth reflect what is going on in the sky. His photo website is www.flickr.com/photos/georgecfilm and email is georgecfilm@gmail.com www.tarotoftheboroughs.com

item.title: Janet Berres - World Tarot Congress, Remembering Eden Gray, & LOTS more.... - Apr 03,2011
item.description:
Handout: www.divinewhispers.net/janet.htm Janet Berres was the founder and President of the International Tarot Society, from 1996-2003. She created and organized the three World Tarot Congresses in 1997, 1999, and 2002 that changed the face of the tarot community. A professional tarot reader and teacher for over thirty-five years, Janet has taught tarot card reading at Northeastern University, Triton College and Northwestern University, all for their continuing education departments. She co-owned and operated a metaphysical bookstore in Evanston, IL for several years and has been thoroughly immersed in the astrology, pagan and Goddess communities for all of her adult life (and probably past lives too!). Janet's book "Your Guide to the Tarot" is included in Llewellyn's "Tarot Kit for Beginners". She resides in Morton Grove, IL with her two cats, her youngest son, and close enough to her older son and daughter-in-law to babysit for the cutest grandson the Goddess ever made! :-). We'll discuss upcoming and past tarot conferences, have a discussion about about my reading skills (tips for readers), and Janet's tarot collection (she has 1,602 decks!) Also, enjoy Janet's Eden Gray stories (Eden was the first recipient of their Lifetime Acheivement Award). Learn more about Janet at: www.janetberres.com

item.title: Katrina Wynne - Addressing Conflict with Tarot - Apr 02,2011
item.description:
Handout: http://www.divinewhispers.net/conflict.htm Tonight, Katrina Wynne presents Tarot as a Psycho-Spiritual Approach to Addressing Conflict. Tarot is a powerful tool for addressing many aspects of life, including conflict and division. Conflict is when we are stuck in a dualist experience, while the Tarot teaches a message of unity. How can we utilize the wisdom of Tarot next time we are faced with difficulty? Which archetypal image examplars speak to different aspects of conflict or compassion? Please join this dynamic exploration with Katrina on Beyond Worlds – Your Tarot Tribe. Katrina Wynne, M.A., known for her unique Tarot Counseling style, brings almost 40 years experience with Tarot combined with 22 years of teaching and professional consulting to her work. She is the creator of the "Tarot History" poster & chart and the "Transformative Tarot Counseling™" booklet. See her on the web at: http://TarotCounseling.org http://MySacredJourney.org ~ weblog http://TarotSpirituality.org

item.title: Emily Carding & The Tarot of the Sidhe - Mar 27,2011
item.description:
Handout: www.tinyurl.com/BWemily Emily Carding's newest tarot, The Tarot of the Sidhe, has been recently released and has taken the tarot world by storm. Emily will talk about the birth of this deck and share its stories with you. Emily Carding is a self-taught artist, author, Priestess, lyricist, actor, singer and mother! Her inspiration comes from the vibrant mythology of all cultures and the reality of magick and the Otherworld. It is for this reason that she considers herself not a fantasy artist, but a visionary artist, for her art is sourced from the truth and beauty of the inner realms. Emily is becoming most well known for her tarot work, having now created three Tarot decks, and an Oracle deck. These include the groundbreaking Transparent Tarot and the visionary Tarot of the Sidhe. Coming in 2011, from Tarot Media Company, is Emily's majors-only Tarot based on the country of Montenegro,Tarot of the Black Mountain. And Emily is currently working on FAERY CRAFT , due out in 2012 from Llewellyn. Learn more about Emily at: www.childofavalon.com

item.title: Ginny Hunt - Order in the Courts! - Mar 26,2011
item.description:
Handout: www.tinyurl.com/courtcards Ginny Hunt is a professional tarot reader & author of the popular tarot blog “78 Notes To Self: A Tarot Journal.” Drawn to the metaphysical & spiritual all of her life, she finally found her tarot gifts in 2004 and started reading tarot professionally on expert consulting websites & then through her own blog. She has counseled professionally & para-professionally both for teens and battered women. She has written for niche magazines & is currently working on a book on tarot. Interpreting court cards can be tricky. However, court cards are 3-dimensional & are not limited to the traditional, flat, keywords they have assigned to them. Nor are they particularly rooted to any astrological sign, as some assign them. Elemental symbolism adds in the role of their particular station ~ then include some understanding of personalities and flesh them out as real people. How do court cards rank within the deck? We'll find out. We'll talk their placement – where are they facing, who are they looking at, what are they focusing on, which direction do they appear to be going, & what they are facing. Are they giving advice? Are they an outcome? Are they a “situation?” We will also discuss advanced interpretive techniques about “sideways” & “reversed” courts. Ginny is writing a book that includes the material we'll discuss. She also has a series that first aired on Leisa ReFalo's Tarot Connection podcast (www.TarotConnection.net) called “The Tarot Court,” also available for download from iTunes. The court series is also on a player on Ginny's blog and can be accessed in post form on her blog as well. Learn more about Ginny at: www.78notes.blogspot.com/

item.title: Robert Lee Camp - Destiny Cards - Mar 20,2011
item.description:
Robert Camp is an author, teacher & master astrologer. Among his clients, many of whom are well known names in Hollywood, he is known for the accuracy & insight of his personal readings. Robert has performed readings for Glenn Close, Rae Dawn Chong, Woody Harrelson, Mrs. Robin Williams, Aimee Osbourne, Mrs. Dick Van Patten, & Mrs. Merv Griffin as well as many producers. Robert has taught hundreds of seminars & appeared on hundreds of radio & television Dtalk shows across the United States & Canada. DJ's have dubbed him "Mr. Destiny" as he amazes & delights their listening audiences with predictions about their lives & the lives of major celebrities & people in the news. Robert has appeared on over 1500 radio shows and has appeared as a guest on The Marilu Henner Show, The Maury Povich Show and the Roseanne Show. In 1988 Robert discovered an ancient & secret method of determining people’s personal destinies. Using this Book of Destiny system, Robert has made successful predictions about many people in the news including Martha Stewart, Kobe Bryant, David Koresh, Michael Jackson, Ex-president Clinton, Ben Afflect and Jennifer Lopez, and O.J. Simpson. Since then he has written 10 books that reveal the secrets of this ancient science to the public. The most notable of these, Cards of Your Destiny and Love Cards have become very popular & can be obtained in any bookstore in the USA & have sold over 100,000 copies. Through his work, Robert hopes to raise the conscious awareness of people around the world using the tools of Astrology & the Science of the Cards. His company, Seven Thunders Publishing, provides many products and services to help others achieve more personal power & happiness.

item.title: Val Sherill - Yes/No Spreads That Empower - Mar 19,2011
item.description:
Handout: www.tinyurl.com/valscards Val has been studying, exploring, and reading Tarot for over 20 years. As an intuitive reader, she decodes the symbolic message to reveal what the seeker can do to empower themselves in the here and now. She is an assistant manager of the Tarot For Life online community and serves as a mentor for TFL's Readers Group where she assists new readers in finding their unique style and voice. Val fancies herself as the "Tarot Translator." Generally, Val says she dislikes yes/no questions as they seem to eliminate the power of one's free will. When doing live readings, she would help the seeker in rephrasing a yes/no question into something open-ended to deliver a reading that was empowering to the seeker. This worked great when Val had the seeker in front of her (or on the phone, chatroom, instant messenger), but when she started doing email readings, Val found trying to rephrase the question to be extremely time consuming. The final straw, so to speak, was when it took 3 weeks & a number of emails before a "proper" question was formulated. "I decided, then, to re-evaluate my view of yes/no questions and figure out a way to answer them that would be more dynamic rather than sound like the final word on the matter in question. Basically, my motivation for this spread was simply to save time." View Val's websites at: www.tarotforlife.com www.tarottranslator.com

donnaleigh | storm cestavani | val sherill | yes no spread | tarot

She is an assistant manager of the Tarot For Life online community and serves as a mentor for TFL's Readers Group where she assists new readers in finding their unique style and voice. Val fancies herself as the "Tarot Translator." Generally, Val says she dislikes yes/no questions as they seem to eliminate the power of one's free will. When doing live readings, she would help the seeker in rephrasing a yes/no question into something open-ended to deliver a reading that was empowering to the seeker. This worked great when Val had the seeker in front of her (or on the phone, chatroom, instant messenger), but when she started doing email readings, Val found trying to rephrase the question to be extremely time consuming. The final straw, so to speak, was when it took 3 weeks & a number of emails before a "proper" question was formulated. "I decided, then, to re-evaluate my view of yes/no questions and figure out a way to answer them that would be more dynamic rather than sound like the final word on the matter in question. Basically, my motivation for this spread was simply to save time." View Val's websites at: www.tarotforlife.com www.tarottranslator.com

item.title: Marcia McCord and Postcard Tarots - Mar 13,2011
item.description:
Handout: www.tinyurl.com/postcardtarot Those who have seen them have fallen in love with them: The Picture Postcard Tarot, The Victorian Postcard Tarot & The Art Postcard Tarot. And that's just in her spare time. She lives in northern California with her husband, dog and cats. Marcia says it all seems rather ordinary ... but we suggest you decide for yourself: Tonight, meet a gentle deck creator with a powerful trio of tarot decks that will pull at your heartstrings. item.title: The Oracle of Initiation with Melissa Weiss Steele - Mar 07,2011
item.description:
Handout: www.tinyurl.com/oracleinitiation Shape-Shift your Destiny with Melissa Weiss Steele & The Oracle of Initiation. We each have the powerful ability to choose how we respond to challenging times. Turbulence becomes a gift when we learn how to navigate & harness the fierce & fluid transformational energies currently available. The Oracle of Initiation divination deck is a deeply magical & inspiring tool, illuminating the dynamic opportunities available thru shape-shifting your own shadows & complexities. Learn how The Oracle can reveal where you are currently at in your own process of awakening; redefine previous struggles as the keys to your unique offerings; & where to focus your passions to bring forth these precious gifts to the collective. Melissa will be sharing the fascinating story of how The Oracle of Initiation deck emerged from her own resurrection after the death of her husband. Melissa took all of The Painted Body images within the deck alone, in the ancient desert landscape of arroyos, canyons, caves, & tunnels surrounding Santa Fe, New Mexico. Melissa Weiss Steele is an artist and an adventurer having spent two decades immersed in Norse, African & Native American sacred traditions, cross-cultural divination, indigenous dream-work & Archetypal Psychology. Copies of the premier Limited Edition of 88 Oracle of Initiation decks are available on her website. She also offers readings, Initiatory Counseling, ritualistic quests on the land & fine-art prints of her images. She currently lives in Santa Fe, New Mexico. www.OracleofInitiation.com www.Facebook.com/OracleofInitiation www.MelissaWeissSteele.Wordpress.com

item.title: The Deviant Moon Tarot with Patrick Valenza - Mar 06,2011
item.description:
Handout: www.tinyurl.com/deviantmoon Patrick Valenza is the creator of the acclaimed deck, The Deviant Moon Tarot, voted the "#1 Top Deck of All Times" by the members of the Aeclectic.net forum. Patrick will be sharing updates and secrets from the companion book he has been working so hard to create this past year. We'll also get a whisper about his new deck that is on the way, called "111." Patrick writes: "When I created the Deviant Moon, it felt as if I was intuitively guided. “I” was merely the spectator to the inspired work that passed through my body. Many things in the deck were made totally subconsciously, but now, that I am writing the companion book, I have to CONSCIOUSLY explain what I otherwise could not. At first it was tough, but then it clicked, and I swear the same muse who fed me the Deviant Moon is whispering into my mind once again, and she has revealed insights into the deck that I had no idea were being incorporated. ‘She’ has also revealed so many connections to the SISTER that I could only have dreamed of, one of which just exploded in my mind before me….she wasn’t whispering, she was SCREAMING the secret! Looking forward to sharing this all with you as soon as possible!" Learn more about Patrick Valenza and his work at: www.deviantmoon.com

donnaleigh | deviant moon | patrick valenza | tarot | psychic

item.title: Anna K Tarot - with Anna Klaffinger - Feb 27,2011
item.description:
Class Handout: www.tinyurl.com/annakhandout Anna Klaffinger joins us tonight from Melbourne, Australia. She'll talk about her Anna K Tarot deck and we'll work with it together to experience it in a reading. Anna started making her own deck at the age of fourteen, because she was unsatisfied with the decks available then - she felt they were either pretty but colourless and meaningsless, or so overloaded with symbols that she got dizzy looking at them. The realistic style of Anna'a cards, coupled with some mystic elements, is owed to both her love of human faces and of telling stories. Also, it was one of Anna's main concerns that the people depicted -- and their emotions -- look real. As soon as Anna put up a website showcasing her yet unpublished cards, she received a great number of inquiries from people all over the world about where her deck could be purchased. So she finally decided to self-publish in December 2009. This first edition was sold out only a year later. So many people asked when "the second edition" could be purchased, so Anna was finally persuaded to take the risk and self-publish again. The second edition was released in June 2010 and has been selling amazingly well. Anna says, "I love to watch people and their funny ways of acting. I try to take everything as seriously as possible while not thinking it more important than it is and keeping a good sense of humour. In general, I live my live doing my best to full-heartedly accept everything that happens: the good and the bad, the beautiful and the ugly, the happy and the sad." Visit Anna's website at: www.annak-tarot.at

Anna klaffinger k | tarot | georgianna boehnke | donnaleigh | psychic

item.title: Sasha Graham - Tarot Diva - Feb 24,2011
item.description:
Guest co-host tonight, Mike Hernandez. Unleash your inner diva and grow into your divine self with the tarot! Sasha Graham joins us as we dive into her hot new book, Tarot Diva: Ignite Your Intuition Glamorize Your Life Unleash Your Fabulousity! In this fun & fresh book, professional tarot reader Sasha Graham unveils the magic & mystery of a tarot deck. She reveals that the tarot is much more than a deck of cards—it's a fantastic tool for enhancing your life & setting free your fabulousity. Kick-start your tarot practice by unlocking each card's unique energies through an assortment of enjoyable and creative meditations, exercises, recipes, spells, and charms. Invoke the "nutty" vibe of the Fool by making Raspberry Roasted Nuts. Channel the abundance theme of the Ten of Pentacles by splurging on a luxurious gift. Embrace the Temperance card's domestic goddess style by donning comfortable jeans. We'll take a journey through the 4 worlds (cups, pentacles, wands and swords) ... you may shed a few tears. We'll talk about exercises Sasha suggests for each card, and discuss more about the content of her new book and what it can offer you. For Sasha Graham, Tarot is Life. She incorporates the beauty, mystery & magic of the deck into her every breath. With the help of the cards, she's learned to empower herself by helping you. Sasha Graham is The Tarot Diva of NYC. She works with the transformative power of Tarot via writing, readings, classes and workshops and is available for private readings at her midtown Manhattan office & for exclusive gatherings & parties. Learn more about Sasha at her amazing website: www.SashaGraham.com

item.title: Reader's Studio 2011 Preview - Ruth Ann & Wald Amberstone - Feb 21,2011
item.description:
Are you ready for the largest and most exciting Tarot convention in the world? Join us as Ruth Ann and Wald Amberstone rev us up for what to expect at the April 29 – May 1, 2011 Reader's Studio in NYC. Ruth Ann & Wald Amberstone are co-founders of The Tarot School, and together they teach, write and publish about Tarot on all levels from divination to psychology to esotericism and magical practice. Between them, Ruth Ann and Wald have amassed more than 80 years of experience as Tarot practitioners. They were each awarded the honorary rank of Certified Tarot Grandmaster in 1998. More than a thousand students have taken live classes at The Tarot School since it opened its doors in 1995. Hundreds more from around the country have participated in Tarot Telecourses (an innovative program of classes given on the telephone), and students from all over the world have purchased recordings from The Tarot School Audio Course Series and study The Tarot School Correspondence Course. Tarot Tips, the Tarot School's email newsletter, has thousands of subscribers worldwide. The Amberstones are the authors of Tarot Tips: 78 Practical Techniques to Enhance Your Tarot Reading Skills, and have contributed articles to Llewellyn's Tarot Reader almanacs for 2005, 2006 and 2008. Their second book, "The Secret Language of Tarot" was published by Weiser Books (April 2008). Learn more about Ruth Ann & Wald at www.TarotSchool.com And learn more about The Reader's Studio at www.ReadersStudio.com

donnaleigh | tarot school | ruth ann wald amberstone | readers studio | tarot reader

Tarot Tips, the Tarot School's email newsletter, has thousands of subscribers worldwide. The Amberstones are the authors of Tarot Tips: 78 Practical Techniques to Enhance Your Tarot Reading Skills, and have contributed articles to Llewellyn's Tarot Reader almanacs for 2005, 2006 and 2008. Their second book, "The Secret Language of Tarot" was published by Weiser Books (April 2008). Learn more about Ruth Ann & Wald at www.TarotSchool.com And learn more about The Reader's Studio at www.ReadersStudio.com

item.title: Johanna G. Sherman -Elemental Power Spread - Feb 20,2011
item.description:
Tonight's Hand-out: www.tinyurl.com/elementalspread Tonight, join Johanna G. Sherman on a journey through her Elemental Power Spread. Johanna Gargiulo-Sherman the artist/author of The Sacred Rose Tarot© and its companion book Guide to the Sacred Rose Tarot©. She is an acclaimed psychic whose gift was discovered by noted parapsychologist Prof. Hans Holzer. Johanna holds degrees in art and education from NYC's HS of Art & Design and Pratt Institute. In childhood, after seeing her first Tarot and reading Prof. Holzer's writings she "knew" she would someday create a deck, and work with him. Years later, her precognitions came true. After viewing some of her promotional artwork she was contacted by Stuart R. Kaplan, President, U.S. Games Systems (Read letter), to create a Tarot, and (through a friend) was introduced to Prof. Holzer. To Johanna's amazement, creating the deck honed her psychic abilities even further. The Sacred Rose Tarot incorporates many elements that facilitate development of psychic talents. After Johanna began writing down her findings in her newsletter Your Psychic Connection, it laid the foundation for her book and workshops on Tarot and Psychic Development. Johanna has been a featured guest on National TV and Radio. She has been heralded in print media: The Psychic Yellow Pages, and The Directory of Psychics, both authored by Prof. Holzer; and Woman's Own magazine, in its article entitled Top 5 Psychics. Her Tarot art has been featured in the series "Baywatch" and "Baywatch Nights." For upcoming events, workshops and to contact Johanna visit her website at: http://johannagsherman.com

item.title: Tarot Spreads & Layouts with Jeanne Fiorini - Feb 14,2011
item.description:
Jeanne’s new book is out! Tarot Spreads and Layouts/A User’s Manual for Beginning and Intermediate Readers, provides useful information and practical tools for honing the art of reading Tarot cards. Complete with interpretation guidelines and an index of basic card meanings, the book is chocked full of reading tips, simple and efficient card methods, and easy-to-use spreads and layouts designed for and organized by the specific nature of the query. During this radio broadcast we’ll review some of the book’s major themes and utilize the call-in questions from listeners as a means to demonstrate some of the book’s methods and principles. Jeanne Fiorini brings nearly 20 years experience to her work as a Tarot practitioner, teacher, and author, offering a unique blend of knowledge, wisdom, and wit. She offers monthly reading circles, provides readings to groups and individuals (in-person and by phone), and hosts a variety of Tarot-related special programs throughout the year. With formal training in both mediation and psychosynthesis counseling, Jeanne brings practical guidance and useful information to all her readings, classes, and groups. She has been a guest presenter at the C.G. Jung Center in Brunswick, Maine, the University of New England, the Whole Health Expo, and numerous fundraising and special functions in Maine and New Hampshire. In addition to her work as a Tarot reader and teacher, and with the help of an artist friend, Jeanne designed and created a special line of Tarot-themed gift wrapping papers. The gift wrap, a fabulous Tarot card wrap bag & other Tarot-related products, as well as a listing of upcoming classes/events, can be seen at: http://www.tarotworks.com

item.title: The Tarot Art of Beth Seilonen - Feb 13,2011
item.description:
Handout: www.tinyurl.com/bethtarot Beth Seilonen, an artist who hails from Maine, USA, creates a wide variety of art from watercolors to abstract oil paintings, and from stained glass panels to suncatchers to tarot cards. With 64 tarot deck creations to her name, Beth's custom tarot decks are instantly lovable, with a variety of styles in limited edition decks that can be viewed at the bottom of this webpage: www.catseyeart.com/id31.html or at the links on this page: www.catseyeart.com/id25.html Her blog: www.bethseilonen.wordpress.com Learn more about Beth at: www.catseyeart.com

item.title: Marcy Currier - "The Tarot Within" & The Mystical Frog Tarot - Feb 07,2011
item.description:
Handout: http://tinyurl.com/frogtarot Marcy Currier will share the Tarot Within, a channeled system for understanding the tarot & for healing and intuitive development. She'll also talk about The Mystical Frog Tarot, to be published by US Games. Through energetic exercises & other experiential techniques, the Tarot Within offers a direct relationship with the energies of the Tarot. Marcy is a visual artist, tarot reader, reiki master, & professional intuitive consultant. She established Metamorphosis Healing & Intuitive Arts in 2005, & through the use of archetypal imagery, channeled artwork, & a range of energetic techniques, she helps people to identify & transcend limiting belief systems, transform relationships, & catalyze creative potential. Marcy offers intuitive Tarot readings & empathic energy healing as well as classes & workshops on Tarot, intuitive development, creativity, & personal transformation throughout the East Coast. She has been employed by the Omega Institute for Holistic Studies since 2007, where she teaches a variety of workshops for staff & guests, & provides readings & healing sessions through the Omega Wellness Center. In her practice & through her art, Marcy invites an awareness of the universal principles of Truth & Love as she encourages clients & students to access and develop inner wisdom. Her work is infused with humor, imagination, & a sense of adventure. Facebook page for her healing practice: www.facebook.com/MetamorphosisHealing Mystical Frog Tarot, which Marcy is currently working on, to be published by US Games: www.facebook.com/FrogTarot Website: www.metaMarcy.tumblr.com.

item.title: Lyn Birkbeck - Sabian Symbols & Astrology, with Marcus Katz on Tarot - Feb 05,2011
item.description:
Join Sabian Symbol Expert, Astrologer and Author, Lyn Birkbeck as we delve into the mysteries of Sabian Symbols. Lyn is an accomplished author, having written: Understanding The Future - 2007-2020; Do It Yourself Astrology, which was republished as The Watkins Astrological Handbook; The Astrological Oracle; Astro-Wisdom The Instant Astrologer - with CD ; & Divine Astrology - with Cards. Lyn believes astrology is one of the true great descriptors and liberators of human potential – and his style of astrology is geared towards achieving these very ends. He interprets charts with the aim of helping people to become more aware of negative patterns of behavior that attract pain and difficulty – manifesting mainly in relationship, work or health problems. At the same time, he identifies & reaffirms strengths & positive potential, those qualities that ultimately take one forward and upward, and help to find an individual’s rightful place in this world. He sees astrology as not only a tool for personal guidance and uplift, but additionally as aiding the evolution of the human spirit. He is also a musician, poet, and a trained hypnotherapist. Lyn is currently working in close association with Tarot Professionals, and on the republication of The Astrological Oracle in eBook and i-application formats,and as the Sabian Fountain at www.tarot-town.com. He lives in the Lake District of England with hiswife Talia. See Lyn's website at: www.lynbirkbeck.com
