item.title: Crafting with Tarot Decks! - Jan 30,2011
item.description:
Handout: www.tinyurl.com/tarotcraft Creatively Inspired! A special 2-hour episode tonight to ignite your tarot passion! Three Great Artisans share their secrets on how to make things with actual Tarot Decks. Great year-round gift ideas for yourself, or for those you love who love tarot! 1) Beth Seilonen of www.catseyeart.com is a gifted Tarot deck artist who has made over 60 different Tarot decks. Beth will share how to make your own, personalized, home-made deck from scratch, from start to finish. 2)Cindy Ciglar Gordon Seavert will be teaching us how to decoupage with Tarot -- from furniture to tarot boxes to vases, this makes a beautiful collage of Tarot beauty. Cindy has collected playing cards since she was a kid, and collecting Tarot has become a natural extension of her love for cards. 3)Ellen-Mary Keough O'Brien will demonstrate how to make beautiful, wearable Tarot charms! Wear your favorite Tarot cards as jewelry! 4) Learn to make a fabric Tarot Bag in 20 minutes or less. 5) Learn to make your very own set of runes(and now you'll know how to make a bag to put them in)! 6) Mini Magic Mojo Bags! Easy craft with a touch of magic!

Ellen-Mary Keough OBrie | Cindy Ciglar Gordon Seavert | craft crafting jewelry decoupage | tarot deck decks furniture | Beth Seilonen cards

Cindy has collected playing cards since she was a kid, and collecting Tarot has become a natural extension of her love for cards. 3)Ellen-Mary Keough O'Brien will demonstrate how to make beautiful, wearable Tarot charms! Wear your favorite Tarot cards as jewelry! 4) Learn to make a fabric Tarot Bag in 20 minutes or less. 5) Learn to make your very own set of runes(and now you'll know how to make a bag to put them in)! 6) Mini Magic Mojo Bags! Easy craft with a touch of magic!

item.title: Mike Hernandez & Unconventional Reading Systems - Jan 24,2011
item.description:
Handout for tonight's episode: http://tinyurl.com/mikestarot Mike Hernandez, a favorite of Beyond Worlds listeners, returns to provide a tarot tutorial on: * Seeing cards in context – how they relate to each other, especially when a card doesn’t seem to make sense where it sits in the spread * Storytelling – learning to tell the story the cards present * Non-positional readings ("Dynamic Readings") Mike comes from a family of psychically-gifted individuals who read the Tarot, perform energy healing, & speak with departed souls. He has been a Shaman/Medicine Man in four previous lifetimes. His main gift, specialty and area of most interest is the Tarot. Mike is the Co-Consul of the Tarosophy Tarot Association (USA), joining fellow Consul Shannon Ritchie, developing and promoting the Tarot Professionals vision and lending support to Tarot students and professionals in the USA. Mike is available for live readings tonight to demonstrate technique. See Mike Hernandez' website at: http://justenoughtarot.com and his blog at http://mikehernandeztarotblog.spaces.live.com

item.title: Julie Cuccia-Watts & The MAAT Tarot - Jan 23,2011
item.description:
Julie Cuccia-Watts is the creator of four multicultural tarot decks: The Ancestral Path Tarot (1996), the Blue Moon Tarot (1998),the Maat Tarot (2006) and forthcoming Journey into Egypt Tarot. Julie is also the sole proprietor of New Moon Trading Co.,http://www.newmoontradingco.com/ where you can find Julie's tarot cards and related original paintings, posters and books. Julie has painted well over 250 original oil paintings over the past 25 years specializing in portraits. However her passion has been bringing new life into tarot symbolism. Julie began painting with oils at the tender age of 8 and has been at it pretty much ever since. Julie's interests include all things paranormal and metaphysical which she blends with her interests in history, astrology, mythology and experimental archeology. Julie enjoys visiting ancient sacred sites has been to Egypt twice. She paints dreams and visions that come from these places as well as teaching her unique approach to the tarot. Julie and her husband of 25 years, Peter Watts author of The Closet Shaman, live in historic Watertown, Wisconsin. Julie is also the mother of three grown children. Learn more about Julie's work at: www.newmoontradingco.com or contact her at: Contact: newmoon@netwurx.net

item.title: "Pop Goes the Timing" with Anna Cook - Jan 17,2011
item.description:
Handout: www.tinyurl.com/annatiming Delightful tarotist Anna Cook joins Beyond Worlds again to talk about timing in Tarot. We'll discussed those cards that jump or pop out of the deck when we shuffle, and their significance to timing. Anna Burroughs Cook has been reading & interpreting the Tarot for 30 years and has developed a wide base of clients across the United States as well as the U.K. & Ohio in the Lorain County area where she currently resides with her hubby Rick. Over the years she has appeared on television and radio programs and taught private classes including Tarot and Psychic development classes in Adult Education programs. In May, Anna delivered the first lecture of her series entitled Bringing The Tarot Into The 21st Century at the Midwest Astrologers Conference at the Doubletree Inn in Cleveland, Ohio. See her website: www.tarotdynamics.com

item.title: The Hezicos Tarot with Mary Griffin - Jan 15,2011
item.description:
Handout: www.tinyurl.com/hezicos Mary Griffin is the creator and artist of the self published tarot deck THE HEZICOS TAROT. Mary has painted since a child and art to her, in all its forms, is wonderful, enlightening & very spiritual. Mary was fortunate to come from an artistic family and was always encouraged to expand her imagination. Mary's artistic style is very unique and unusual and her artwork has plenty to explore. She specializes in paintings of animals & fairy folk as well as also “Trompe l’oeil” and painted furniture. She has completed many private commissions as well as exhibited in the UK, selling my work to France, Spain and India, also teaching art and tarot. For many years Mary has been working privately, one to one, as a psychic clairvoyant specializing in tarot but she could never find a deck that connected to her personally. So she decided to create her own. THE HEZICOS TAROT was launched in January 2010 and is available to purchase on her website www.hezicostarot.com. At present, Mary is working on a children's story book which she have written and will illustrate herself. It is very magical! Mary lives in Cornwall, UK with her wonderful family and animals. View The Hezicos Tarot cards at her website: www.hezicostarot.com

item.title: The Tarot Game - with Jude Alexander - Jan 10,2011
item.description:
Once in awhile a brilliant and unique idea hits the world by storm, and we're excited tonight to introduce to you a hot new way to interact and learn from the Tarot. Tonight we explore The Tarot Game by creatrix Jude Alexander! What is The Tarot Game? Come play along to get a taste of some good social Tarot fun! A great idea for your next party! This cooperative game takes you on a personal journey of transformation, through storytelling, laughter, and the wisdom of the Tarot. It is with continued practice and repeated play of the game that you gain understanding of the cards, benefit from their insights, and obtain the inspiration to act upon their teachings. Jude Alexander is a professional reader, life coach, and teacher of intuitive Tarot card reading. She is a Theater Arts graduate from Rutgers University and has long been interested in entertainment as a form of education. She began her Tarot studies in 1998 in northern California. From then until now, Ms. Alexander has developed and refined The Tarot GameTM through play at various events and parties. Jude says: “I often refer to myself as the skeptical Tarot reader. Each time they astound me with their accuracy and their ability to pull from me a story or point of view that assists in resolving a current problem and achieving direction in life.” Learn more about Jude and The Tarot Game at: www.TheTarotGame.com

item.title: Robert Place - Chakras: The Western System of Soul Centers - Jan 09,2011
item.description:
We're honored to welcome back a favorite guest of Beyond Worlds, Robert M. Place! Tonight, a topic about which Bob is writing a book: the Western System of soul centers, what we can call the "chakras" in English. We will use the Tarot to analyze & heal the centers. Most people believe that the chakra system is something we borrowed from India in the 20th century, but we have had similar systems since ancient Greece. It is connected to common sevenfold aspects of our culture, such as the seven days of the week, the seven notes of the scale, the seven virtues, & seven vices. Bob gave a workshop on this at the Readers Studio and an advanced workshop on it in New York last November. He will be repeating that workshop on Saturday, January 29. And congratulations, Bob, for being invited to be the main presenter at the World Tarot Conference in Chicago in July 2012! Robert M. Place is designer, illustrator, & co-author, with Rosemary Ellen Guiley, of: The Alchemical Tarot & The Angels Tarot, and the designer, illustrator, & author of The Tarot of the Saints, The Buddha Tarot, & The Vampire Tarot. He is the author of The Tarot: History, Symbolism, & Divination, which Booklist has said "may be the best book ever written on that deck of cards decorated with mysterious images called the tarot." He also the author of Astrology & Divination, Magic & Alchemy, & Shamanism, & Unexplained Phenomena series. Bob is currently working on his 6th deck, The Tarot of the Sevenfold Mystery. Robert can be reached through his websites: www.thealchemicalegg.com www.alchemicaltarot.com Find products by Robert at: http://tinyurl.com/robertplace

item.title: The Secret of the Tarot - Robert Swiryn & The Marseilles' Secrets - Jan 03,2011
item.description:
Episode handout at: www.tinyurl.com/secrettarot Robert Swiryn graduated from the University of Hawaii in 1979 with a Bachelor of Arts Degree in Religion and is currently a practicing chiropractor on Kauai. In 2010, Robert Swiryn released his new book, The Secret of the Tarot, How the Story of the Cathars was Concealed in the Tarot of Marseilles. The book took over five years to complete, and was the product of a synthesis of Swiryn’s long-time interests in art and religion. In the thirteenth century, the Cathars, a group of Christian heretics, became the target of the Roman Catholic Church. The pope enlisted the help of the King of France, and together they began a campaign of brutal persecution which started during the Albigensian Crusade and ended in the formation of the Inquisition. The efficiency of those programs led most scholars to believe that the Cathars were all but annihilated. However, evidence points to the survival of some refugees who fled to areas like Lombardy, in Italy, where they were sheltered by more sympathetic religious sects. In The Secret of the Tarot, Robert Swiryn offers a glimpse into the background of the Cathars and their medieval world, and how it was turned upside down by the political and religious powers of the time. But the unique factor of this thought-provoking book is found in Swiryn’s interpretation of the imagery of the tarot cards within this historical context. In Part II, he describes how the tarot provides a visual account of the personalities, events and spiritual ideals of the Cathar faithful. Each card in turn becomes part of a deeper, hidden message, as the images come to life. Learn more at: www.thesecretofthetarot.com

In 2010, Robert Swiryn released his new book, The Secret of the Tarot, How the Story of the Cathars was Concealed in the Tarot of Marseilles. The book took over five years to complete, and was the product of a synthesis of Swiryn’s long-time interests in art and religion. In the thirteenth century, the Cathars, a group of Christian heretics, became the target of the Roman Catholic Church. The pope enlisted the help of the King of France, and together they began a campaign of brutal persecution which started during the Albigensian Crusade and ended in the formation of the Inquisition. The efficiency of those programs led most scholars to believe that the Cathars were all but annihilated. However, evidence points to the survival of some refugees who fled to areas like Lombardy, in Italy, where they were sheltered by more sympathetic religious sects. In The Secret of the Tarot, Robert Swiryn offers a glimpse into the background of the Cathars and their medieval world, and how it was turned upside down by the political and religious powers of the time. But the unique factor of this thought-provoking book is found in Swiryn’s interpretation of the imagery of the tarot cards within this historical context. In Part II, he describes how the tarot provides a visual account of the personalities, events and spiritual ideals of the Cathar faithful. Each card in turn becomes part of a deeper, hidden message, as the images come to life. Learn more at: www.thesecretofthetarot.com

item.itunes:subtitle: The Secret of the Tarot - Robert Swiryn & The Marseilles' Secrets

item.title: Lon Milo Duquette - Low Magick & More - Dec 19,2010
item.description:
Join the Master Magician of our time, Lon Milo Duquette, as we journey through his new book, Low Magick: It's All In your Head...You Just Have No Idea How Big Your Head Is. Gifted with both humor AND intellect, Lon has an extraordinary talent of writing that brings wit to every wisdom. Join us tonight as we enjoy an icon of our time who describes himself as: Husband, father, brother, author, songwriter, esoteric raconteur, magician, archbishop, Freemason, solar myth. You will be sure to have a smile on your face. Lon's magical credentials are impeccable. Since 1975 he has served as a national & international administrative officer of Ordo Templi Orientis, one of the most influential & controversial magical societies of the 20th century. He is an acknowledged authority on the life & magical work of Aleister Crowley, the O.T.O.’s most celebrated & notorious leader, & since 1994 has served as the Order’s United State Deputy Grand Master. He has authored numerous magical texts including The Magick of Aleister Crowley, Understanding Aleister Crowley's Thoth Tarot, & Angels, Demons, and Gods of the New Millennium. Hs most popular work is the story of his own life as a practicing ceremonial magician, My Life with the Spirits. He travels extensively world-wide and speaks on a broad range of esoteric topics including Qabalah and the Tarot. He is on the faculty of the OMEGA INSTITUTE in Rhinebeck, New York where he teaches ‘The Western Magical Tradition. Learn more about Lon Milio Duquette at his website: www.lonmiloduquette.ning.com

item.title: Asteroids, Goddesses & Queens in Tarot - Dec 12,2010
item.description:
Handout: www.psychicfriendslive.com/beyondworlds.htm To receive your own (free) personalized Astrological Goddess chart, go to: http://www.astro.com/cgi/genchart.cgi and at the bottom, where it says "Additional Objects," hold down the CTRL key on your computer and choose: Ceres, Pallas, Juno & Vesta. This show contains adult language and adult content and is for listeners over the age of 18 years. Tonight, enjoy a completely original technique using the astrology of Asteroids as we dress up Tarot's Queens in the clothes of asteroid energy. Learn which Goddesses embody which asteroids, and how they impact us personally. This episode features Storm Cestavani, Georgianna Boehnke, and Theresa Reed (The Tarot Lady) for in-depth analysis of these Queens, Asteroids, and Goddesses.

item.title: Jordan Hoggard - Psychic and Creative Triggers in the Land of Mystereum - Dec 12,2010
item.description:
Handout: www.tinyurl.com/jordantarot Jordan Hoggard showcases Imagination Tools from The Land of Mystereum! Psychic & creative triggers form the basis for his Tarot deck + Imagination Primer book package "Tarot in the Land of Mysterem." Each card in Mystereum speaks in their own voice, speaks in the first person to unfold their story to you as they gift you Imagination Tools: psychic & creative triggers to further enhance & strengthen your creativity & problem-solving skills. Open up new paths of mastery that lead you to exciting further discoveries! Jordan Hoggard has been involved in Tarot since he was 4 1/2 years old, & offers Tarot, Architecture, Art, & Feng Shui consultation services for strengthening the temple of your imagination & creativity to further open the portals of your intuition. He feels that the spaces between things have an energy potential to expansively awaken creativity, & Tarot in the Land of Mystereum provides an enthusiastic way to open up these spaces between to literally unleash your creativity. His upcoming release from Schiffer Books: Tarot in the Land of Mystereum: An Imagination Primer introduces a 78-card Mystereum Tarot deck + 192-page Imagination Primer companion book where the 78 cards each speak directly to you in their own, individual voice & extend wholehearted gifts in support of your creative soul. These gifts called Imagination Tools provide catalysts and creatively actionable form-givers to facilitate implementing the objects of your focus more fluidly. Visit Jordan's website at: www.JordanHoggard.com www.cafepress.com/mystereum Hear Jordan on The Tarot Connection: wwww.tarotconnection.net/category/year-2/ (Episode 84)

item.title: Christiana Gaudet & Fortune Stellar - Dec 06,2010
item.description:
If tarot is your passion, this book is for you! Fortune Stellar: What Every Professional Tarot Reader Needs to Know, is Tarot Grandmaster Christiana Gaudet's first book, now available from Jupiter Gardens Press. It is available in soft cover print copy or as an Ebook. This is an important book for serious tarot students, tarot professionals and other dedicated metaphysical practitioners who count tarot amongst their tools for introspection. In eight easy lessons you will learn how to be a success part time or full time tarot professional. Best of all, tarot will guide you as you create a tarot business that is a perfect fit for you! Follow your bliss, and help others do the same with Fortune Stellar! Christiana Gaudet is a Certified Tarot Grandmaster. From her office in West Palm Beach, Florida, she serves a worldwide clientele with Tarot readings and Tarot instruction. Christiana’s Tarot study group, Tarot Circle, has been functioning since 2000 and meets monthly in Connecticut, Pennsylvania and Florida. As a Tarot professional, Christiana entertains at private parties, corporate evenings and nightclubs, as well as offering insight and guidance to private clients. Over Christiana’s career she has appeared on many radio and television shows, and has been featured on Inside Edition and Fox News. Christiana is a popular speaker at festivals and conferences nationwide. See Christiana's website at: www.tarotbychristiana.com Phone - toll free 866-99TAROT Direct -561-655-1160

item.title: Dreams & Tarot with Paula Chaffee Scardamalia - Part 2 - Dec 05,2010
item.description:
Tonight: Using Dreams, Tarot and Journals for Empowered Creativity. Handout: www.tinyurl.com/pauladreams Learn how to use your journal to record both dreams and tarot readings in order to discover patterns and rhythms in your creative cycle, develop creative resource material, break through blocks and fears, and access your inspiring Muse. Dream expert Paula Chaffee Scardamalia joins us again on Beyond Worlds and weaves together her creative and intuitive experiences as a dream traveler, tarotist, author, and professional weaver. Paula shows women how to decipher their dreams and then tell their stories. Paula is a book coach and creative mentor, and leads workshops, seminars, and group and individual retreats, at her home, online, and across the country. Recently, she’s appeared at destination spas speaking on different aspects of dreams, tarot, and creativity. She also publishes a weekly newsletter with tips and tools for the creative life, called Divine Musings. Visit Paula's website at: http://diviningthemuse.com

item.title: Coming out of the Tarot Closet - Host Show - Nov 27,2010
item.description:
Feeling alone? Isolated? Using a pen name to do your work so you can "keep it personal?" Afraid to tell your family or friends about your passion for tarot? Tonight we focus on coming out of the Tarot Closet. You are not alone, that closet is pretty full! All 4 Beyond Worlds hosts gather tonight to talk about tarot freedom, and we hope you'll call in and share your Tarot coming-out stories.

item.title: Scott Grossberg - Secrets in the Deck of Shadows - Nov 22,2010
item.description:
Hand-outs from Scott's blog: www.tinyurl.com/foolsjourney http://tinyurl.com/scott-oz http://tinyurl.com/ozpart2 Critically acclaimed author and oracle creator Scott Grossberg joins us again tonight for another fun and entertaining evening of predictions, open talk about Tarot, oracles, and intuitive readings. Let's mix things up a bit by adding this deck to Tarot. And what are the secrets behind the Deck of Shadows? He'll share the secrets in the symbols and the secrets in the words. And you'll love his Wizard of Oz spread that will give you great personal insight! Check out the spread here: http://tinyurl.com/scottwizard This man has done it all! Scott is a magician, an attorney who has served for more than 20 years as lead trial counsel, advisor, & coach for political and business leaders, & government agencies. He holds degrees in Philosophy and Theatre Arts and has also obtained his Juris Doctorate. Scott has released two critically acclaimed books, "The Masks of Tarot" and "Bauta: Betraying the Face of Illusion," in addition to his oracle/divination cards, "The Deck of Shadows." He is also a produced playwright and director, a songwriter/musician, and an exhibiting photographer. He is a professional member of the National Speakers Association, The Academy of Magical Arts/Magic Castle in Hollywood, the International Brotherhood of Magicians, and the British Society of Mystery Performers. item.title: Tarot Mentoring: Theresa Reed & Storm Cestavani - Nov 21,2010
item.description:
This show is a merge of two shows. The first 30 minutes is a Beyond Worlds episode where the guest did not make it, but Theresa and Donnaleigh did a tarot tip, a reading, and then we flowed into second section that was recorded on Psychic Friends Live on Wed. 11/17/10 with Theresa Reed and Storm Cestavani. Theresa Reed is a professional Tarot Mentor, who has an exceptional reputation for helping others improve. She's a natural teacher, and she'll share with you what a Tarot Mentor is. Whether you want to start a Tarot business and are not sure how, whether you want to become better at tarot, or if you want to get your groove back if you're burnt out, Theresa Reed is the expert to get you there. She explains how in tonight's show.

item.title: Rachel Pollack - Tarot Midrash & Hidden Secrets in the Cards - Nov 15,2010
item.description:
We're honored to have Rachel Pollack join us again tonight, this time to talk about unusual tarot interpretations and Tarot stories, or midrash. So what is Tarot Midrash? A midrash is a story that expands on a moment in the Bible. the story of Adam and Eve is very short in Genesis, but thousands of pages have been written about it. the official meanings for any Tarot card are actually very limited, but we go very deeply into the picture, into possibilities, speculations, details, and so on. Rachel explains, "In some ways, the idea of odd interpretations is a midrash idea, that is, meanings that are not part of the original design or concepts, but are a meaningful and valuable extension. Some of the myths I cite in Tarot Wisdom are midrash, both originally (that is, not in the Bible) and for Tarot, since it's unlikely that say, Rapunzel was in the mind of the Tarot creators. But even more narrowly, when we talk about how the woman on the Rider 8 of Swords can walk away from the swords that is not strictly in the picture and so is a kind of midrash. So--here you are at the birth of a big idea (well, maybe)." Tonight, let's join a true Grand Master and find the unusual in the cards together. Learn more about the amazing Rachel Pollack at: www.Rachel.Pollack.com

Midrash bible story stories | storm cestavani | tarot stories story | rachel pollack | unusual interpretations

item.title: Katrina Wynne - The Art and Magic of Transformation & Change - Nov 14,2010
item.description:
Tonight we learn "The Art and Magic of Transformation & Change" with counselor Katrina Wynne, M.A. Katrina Wynne, M.A., offer us a class tonight with a combination of theory and practice that dives into counseling skills and the value of supporting awareness and change for your tarot clients. Katrina Wynne, M.A. known for her unique Tarot Counseling style, brings 36 year's experience with Tarot combined with 22 years of teaching and professional counseling to her work . She is the creator of the "Tarot History" poster & chart and her most recent book is complete: "Transformative Tarot Counseling™". See Katrina's website at: http://TarotCounseling.org And her weblog at: http://MySacredJourney.org And Katrina's amazing response to the show's lead-in question: "What is Tarot" is at: http://tinyurl.com/whatistarot

item.title: Stephanie Arwen Lynch - Questions & Spreads - Nov 08,2010
item.description:
Hand-out of Arwen's Chakra Spread: www.divinewhispers.net/arwen.htm Tonight Stephanie Arwen Lynch joins Beyond Worlds to talk about two important topics in Tarot: 1) How To Create A Spread, and 2) Phrasing A Question for Tarot. Arwen became the President of The American Tarot Association in 2007 and currently serves as the Organizer for her local Austin Tarot Meetup. She has been reading the Tarot since 1979 & professionally since 1982. Arwen has taught workshops on "Tarot for the Professional Fiction Writer" as well as "How To Create Your Own Spread." She reads for everyone but specializes in reading for the writing community as well as the GLBQT community. She reads online as well as in person & over the phone. Arwen is also a published romance writer. You can learn more about Arwen at: http://tarotbyarwen.com

item.title: Diane Wilkes & The Jane Austen Tarot - Nov 06,2010
item.description:
The handout for tonight's show is at: www.tinyurl.com/janetarot Diane Wilkes is the author of both the the Jane Austen Tarot and The Storyteller Tarot. In addition to being the webmistress of Tarot Passages, she has conducted tarot workshops throughout the United States and teaches tarot in the Philadelphia, PA area. She also maintains an astrological and tarot practice. Diane has a Master's Degree in English, has been published in numerous magazines, and has been reading the cards for over 40 years. She is a Certified Tarot Grand Master. Tonight we will discuss Diane's Jane Austen Tarot, share Diane's Bildungsroman Spread and do readings! You can find Diane at her very well-known tarot website: www.TarotPassages.com which includes 807 Tarot Deck Reviews and 164 Tarot Book Reviews!

item.description:
The handout for this class is at: www.tinyurl.com/foolmagician Join us for the 2nd in our series of "Beyond Tarot" Intensive Classes. These classes will feature all 4 Beyond Worlds cohosts (nearly a century of cumulative tarot experience between us), and we will journey through the deck together in a fun, interactive class-like format with a modern twist. item.title: Paul Quinn - Shadows & Power Imbalances in Cards - Oct 24,2010
item.description:
Paul Quinn, tarot reader & author of the highly acclaimed book, "Tarot for Life" writes, “You don’t need to have special psychic abilities to read Tarot cards effectively. But you do need to be curious about who you are & about the opportunities for growth in your day-to-day life experiences. The Tarot becomes a way of deep listening.” Paul joins us tonight to talk about: 1)the shadow sides of the good cards, and 2) Power imbalances & relationship dynamics depicted in the RWS deck. Did you miss Paul's last show with us when we discussed his incredible book, Tarot for Life? You can check it out here: http://tinyurl.com/paul-quinn There will be no live readings tonight: all content and all class tonight for those delving into the craft of Tarot. Come learn with us! Learn more about Paul and his work at http://tarotforlife.net/

item.title: Ferol Humphrey - Sex, Love, Money, Power...the Living Tarot Way! - Oct 17,2010
item.description:
For listeners over 18 years of age, tonight we get a little wild! Delightful Ferol Humphrey, Director of Living Tarot Network & Originator of Living Tarot Method, returns to Beyond Worlds tonight with all 4 cohosts and a surprise visit from Thalassa Therese. Ferol is awesomely inspiring, and she will help us get wild with our cards! Let's strip .... off the meanings we know and learn to blurt our truths. Ferol's method is fast and perfect for beginners just learning tarot, yet fun for those with experience looking to drop the logic and get more right-brained! Forget the suits, forget the elements, and lets get to the core of what's in our deepest psyche! We'll use tarot for language deconstruction (great fun!) using a technique that is great for meet-ups, learning, and even parties (yes, for people who don't usually "do" tarot)! We may also discuss a little about "guerilla tarot." What is it? It's leaving a little bit of tarot for someone to find! Tune in and find out! Ferol is a positively inspiring tarotist and mentor who specializes in Alternative Health and Intuitive Development: Chakra Hoops, Blue Lotus Heart Chi Gong, Trinity Table stress reduction, and both private and group Tarot instruction, by phone and in person, for the development of the intuition and liberation of the personal spirit. She also brought tarot knowledge to a new level with the world's largest tarot meet-up group. Learn more about Ferol at: www.Facebook.com/ferolhumphrey www.facebook.com/LivingTarot www.facebook.com/FerolHumphrey Or her wordpress blog at: www.ferolhumphrey.wordpress.com

item.title: Scott Dodson - Tarot Systems: Numerology, Astrology & Elements - Oct 16,2010
item.description:
Handout: www.divinewhispers.net/scott.htm Scott Dodson joins us tonight as we learn about his personal yet unique way of using numerology to enhance your readings. We'll also discuss Astrology as it pertains to Tarot, and the elemens. Scott's system will bring more insights, and he's share how other systems are connected to the Tarot (Astrology, elemental dignities, using combinations). Tonight we will put together different pieces of the puzzle to understand what the cards are saying to you. How? By making a quick look over the spread, adding up the important factors, and adding the missing factors which are equally important. Scott Dodson is a tarot reader and owner of www.hermitsvision.com and has been studying metaphysics, occult, and divination for 17 years. Scott became interested in search for personal meaning and questioning why his personal views were different than traditional understanding Scott has had the ability to communicate with the non living since childhood,is a very strong empath, with clairvoyant, clairaudiant abilities, but kept his secret to himself for the majority of his life as have many Scott began his studies in the early 90's became a professional astrologer and worked as such into the beginning of 2000. Getting into tarot at this time, he quickly saw how the two systems connected, along with other systems, being certified in hypnosis and study of numerology brought the world of tarot in his life to stay. Scott's main goal in life is to use what he "knows" to help others along their path in life, along with teaching those who want to learn. Visit Scott's website at: www.hermitsvision.com

item.title: Quantum Physics & Transcending the Speed of Light with Marc Seifer - Oct 03,2010
item.description:
Did you ever wonder if there a reason certain cards land where they do in a reading? Marc J. Seifer, Ph.D. author of the new book Transcending the Speed of Light: Quantum Physics & the 5th Dimension, makes the difficult easy-to-understand as he discusses such intriguing topics as synchronicity, quantum physics, higher states of consciousness, & connectedness with a Universal Consciousness that can be accessed. And he tucks tarot in his books! A college teacher for over 30 years, Dr. Seifer has taught courses on dreams & consciousness at Providence College, & currently teaches Psychology at Roger Williams University. With an international reputation as a Tesla expert, and also a handwriting expert, Dr. Seifer has worked as a consultant for 60 Minutes concerning the signatures of Al Gore & George Bush, & has appeared on the History Channel on the Howard Hughes Will, AP International TV on Osama bin Laden’s signature & Coast to Coast Radio. He has lectured at West Point Military Academy, United Nations, City College of New York, LucasFilms Industrial Light & Magic, Federal Reserve Bank Boston, Brandeis University, in Jerusalem, Zagreb, Belgrade, Toronto, Vancouver & in England at Oxford University & Cambridge University. Featured in The Economist, Cosmopolitan, Scientific American, The Washington Post, & his publications have appeared in Cerebrum, Civilization, Psychiatric Clinics of North America. Listed in Marquis’ Who’s Who in the World, his multiple works include The Definitive Book of Handwriting Analysis, the video short Tesla: Mad Scientist of the Gilded Age,& acclaimed biography Wizard: The Life & Times of Nikola Tesla. Learn more about Dr. Seifer at www.MarcSeifer.com

item.title: Nancy Antenucci - Honing Your Natural Psychic Abilities - Oct 02,2010
item.description:
Tonight's hand-out is at: http://www.divinewhispers.net/nancy.htm Nancy Antenucci joins us to share how to use our psychic abilities naturally. At or before age 7, we all had a complete way of seeing/sensing things. Nancy will guide us on how to create that condition within ourselves to claim our own creative authority. We'll discuss the Initial Image, a technique Nancy developed that allows a reader to really hone the core direction at the beginning of the session. Nancy Antenucci is a seasoned tarot reader as well as a teacher of intuitive and creative strategies. She brings 25 years of hard-earned wisdom, practical know-how and unending passion of the creative unknown to her clients, students and colleagues. She is an avid practitioner of the Celtic way of life … mostly digging the seasons. Nancy has been a sought-after reader, mentor and teacher for the Twin Cities area for the last few decades. Nancy regularly teaches tarot and intuitive development classes in Minneapolis and St. Paul. She is also a regular presenter at the annual Women’s Spirituality Conference in Mankato, Minnesota. Recently, the Twin Cities Metro Magazine named her one of the Twin Cities’ best psychics. Nancy is soon to be a published author! Her book, "Psychic Tarot, Using Your Natural Psychic Abilities to read the Cards" will be published February 2011. It is a down to earth culmination of her teaching and mentoring over the many years. Nancy is the founder of Pagan Babies Productions, which brings mythological stories to life theatrically. She lives with her husband, son, and fat Siamese cat in St. Paul’s Midway area. Nancy’s website is http://betweenworlds.us.

item.title: Mary Greer & Blogging Tarot - Sep 25,2010
item.description:
The incomparable Mary K. Greer joins us again to talk about the fun subject of blogging tarot! Mary's blog is a superb resource for the tarot community, and many of the blogs present today present some unique, fresh content. What is the difference between writing books and blogging? What type of blog posts get the most hits? Mary K. Greer is a revolutionary, breaking all the rules regarding methods of learning and using tarot cards. She has forty years tarot experience and, as an author and teacher, emphasizes personal insight and creativity. As a tarot reader, she works as a ‘midwife of the soul,’ using techniques that are interactive, transformational and empowering. Mary is a member of numerous tarot organizations and is featured at tarot conferences and symposia around the world. She is the proud recipient of the 2007 International Tarot Lifetime Achievement Award and the 2006 Mercury Award from the Mary Redman Foundation for “excellence in communication in the metaphysical field.” The author of eight books on tarot and a biography of four female magicians, her latest book is Mary K. Greer’s 21 Ways to Read a Tarot Card (Llewellyn, 2006), which won the COVR award for best divination book. Three of her books placed in the “Top Five Tarot books” survey by the American Tarot Association, which polled members of the major tarot discussion lists, while two of her books are in the top five of Aeclectic Tarot’s 2005 poll. See Mary's website and blog at: www.MaryGreer.wordpress.com.

item.title: Kris Waldherr - The Goddess Tarot & Lover's Path Tarot - Sep 19,2010
item.description:
Hand-out for show: www.divinewhispers.net/goddesscircle.htm Live tarot readings tonight! Join us tonight for a trip with Goddesses & Lovers, as we learn about tarot through the wisdom of Kris Waldherr. Kris Waldherr is an author, illustrator and designer of numerous books including Doomed Queens, The Lover's Path and The Book of Goddesses. She has created 2tarot decks, the Goddess Tarot & the Lover's Path Tarot & a new oracle deck, the Goddess Inspiration Oracle. She is also the illustrator of the brand new Anubis Oracle. Kris began her publishing career as a children's book illustrator and designer 20 years ago. The Book of Goddesses was a One Spirit/Book-of-the-Month Club’s Top 10 Most Popular Book. The Book of Goddesses inspired Goddess, a Narada music CD, several illustrated calendars, & The Goddess Tarot, which has over 200,000 copies in print. She also has a picture book retelling of the Persephone myth, Persephone and the Pomegranate, praised by the New York Times Book Review in a full page review for its “quality of myth and magic.” Her illustrations have been published as greeting cards, book covers, and in magazines. Her art has been exhibited in galleries and museums throughout the United States and England, including the National Museum of Women in the Arts. The strangest thing she has ever heard about her work? That The Goddess Tarot was the most shoplifted item at the Union Square Barnes & Noble! Kris currently lives in Brooklyn, NY, where she has a small gallery that doubles as her workspace. It is open to the public for exhibitions and events. Visit her website at: http://www.kriswaldherr.com

item.title: Keeping a Beginner's Mind - With Barbara Moore - Sep 12,2010
item.description:
Handout for tonight's class is at: www.divinewhispers.net/beginnersmind.htm The journey through the tarot is one of cycles, which means our paths will,at times, lead us back to role of beginner. How does a seasoned tarot practitioner recognize the need for adopting a beginner's mind? And what does she do then? Barbara Moore shares her experience. The Importance of Having a Beginners Mind when doing tarot is key, no matter how many years you have practiced tarot. Barbara candidly writes: As you know I've been doing this for a long time. However, last summer I got in a kind of funk and felt lost in terms of what I believe about tarot. I spent so many years not taking a stand. The whole "there are no right or wrongs ways" etc. thing. In the fall I started listening to blog talk, where I found The Tarot Lady. I noticed that she took apprentices. I contacted her, explained my situation, and she apprenticed me for 3 months. It was just what I needed to wade through all the piles of ideas and opinions I'd been carrying around and getting to the bottom of my own core beliefs. Tonight, Tarot author Barbara Moore joins Theresa Reed (The Tarot Lady) to remind us of the importance of getting back to basics and finding the core of tarot, leaving opinions and biases behind.

donnaleigh de LaRose | psychic | tarot class beginners mind | barbara moore | theresa reed the tarot lady

Handout for tonight's class is at: www.divinewhispers.net/beginnersmind.htm The journey through the tarot is one of cycles, which means our paths will,at times, lead us back to role of beginner. How does a seasoned tarot practitioner recognize the need for adopting a beginner's mind? And what does she do then? Barbara Moore shares her experience. The Importance of Having a Beginners Mind when doing tarot is key, no matter how many years you have practiced tarot. Barbara candidly writes: As you know I've been doing this for a long time. However, last summer I got in a kind of funk and felt lost in terms of what I believe about tarot. I spent so many years not taking a stand. The whole "there are no right or wrongs ways" etc. thing. In the fall I started listening to blog talk, where I found The Tarot Lady. I noticed that she took apprentices. I contacted her, explained my situation, and she apprenticed me for 3 months. It was just what I needed to wade through all the piles of ideas and opinions I'd been carrying around and getting to the bottom of my own core beliefs. Tonight, Tarot author Barbara Moore joins Theresa Reed (The Tarot Lady) to remind us of the importance of getting back to basics and finding the core of tarot, leaving opinions and biases behind.

item.title: Robert Place & The Minor Suits - Sep 11,2010
item.description:
We're honored to welcome back a favorite guest, Robert M. Place! And tonight we focus on the four minor suits. How deep do you think we can go? We'll also talk a little Anne Rice...! Robert M. Place is designer, illustrator, & co-author, with Rosemary Ellen Guiley, of: The Alchemical Tarot & The Angels Tarot, and the designer, illustrator, & author of The Tarot of the Saints, The Buddha Tarot, & The Vampire Tarot. He is the author of The Tarot: History, Symbolism, & Divination, which Booklist has said "may be the best book ever written on that deck of cards decorated with mysterious images called the tarot." He also the author of Astrology & Divination, Magic & Alchemy, & Shamanism, & Unexplained Phenomena series. He is currently working on his 6th deck, The Tarot of the Sevenfold Mystery, & he is the curator of The Fool's Journey, an exhibition on the art and symbolism of the Tarot, at the Craft & Folk Art Museum in Los Angeles. Robert can be reached through his websites: www.thealchemicalegg.com www.alchemicaltarot.com Find products by Robert at: http://tinyurl.com/robertplace

item.title: Free Classes! New BW Tarot Intensives! - Aug 14,2010
item.description:
You asked for it and we're bringing it to you! Beyond Worlds - Your Tarot Tribe will be providing monthly TAROT CLASSES (yes, free!) to the world.


Your 4 friendly hosts will each bring forward parts of cards as we walk through the wonderful deck together in a tarot intensive! Stay tuned for updates, we begin in September and will continue each month as long as it takes to get through the entire deck. Calls welcome if you want to share what YOU see in the cards we discuss.

This will be great for beginners, and very in-depth for advanced readers. We have something for everyone. More info to come, so stay tuned!

item.description:

Let's go to the Other Side with tarot to learn how to connect with those we have loved & lost. Join us for a special 2-hour show tonight. Did you have an experience? Call us! item.title: A King's Journey with Chanel Bayless - Aug 04,2010
item.description:
Hand-out for class: http://tinyurl.com/akingsjourney Chanel Bayless brings 16 years of experience as a Tarot Consultant & is known for her down-to-earth no-nonsense style of reading. She takes complex issues & makes them simple & easy to understand. Chanel is the author/designer of the recently released "A King's Journey Tarot, " which can be viewed & ordered, through: www.akingsjourneytarot.com. She is the author of The Lovers Spread, published by Rethinking Education Conference in 2008. Tonight we will incorporate maturity as seen through tarot and we'll discuss the Spirit Suit (virtues associated with the Sephira on the Tree of Life). A unique feature of this deck, is that the Spirit Suit can also be used as a separate oracle if the reader chooses to do so. Known for the way she reads with lines of energy, allowing her to often to see 'more' into the cards, Chanel will share this technique. Also, she offers a more advanced way of reading 'time' & money, which can be used with any deck! We will demonstrate this using a RWS deck. As if that is not enough, Chanel will also discus how her cards are wrapped around a theme called a Celtic Cross Model, where the cards are reordered & not seen as flowing in growth from A-10 of each suit, but instead uses a system with an outer rim & inner rim, moving into the core. Where ever you are on this journey, you can look to other cards to see how you need to balance the energy you're in, or look to the next card to see how you need to move forward or what to expect. The cards then have other associations that become apparent. Readings can be arranged with Chanel at: www.tarotreadingsite.com

item.title: Douglas Gibb - TarotEon and a Smorgasboard of Tarot - Aug 01,2010
item.description:
Today we delve into learning everything from court cards, to doubling up cards for meanings, to using timing with tarot, to wacky card meanings! Douglas Gibb is a rising tarot star, and his ultra-creative blog has caught the tarot world by storm! Doug started with Tarot when he was a teenager and took it up seriously when he was about 20 years old. He went pro several years later and has been working as a pro tarot reader ever since. Doug set up Tarot Eon as a way to help him overcome the, "Tarot is just a job" feeling that developed directly after burning out. Doug realized that he'd forgotten the reasons why he loved the Tarot. He wanted to remember! Over the years Doug has changed his mind on many different areas of Tarot - "I'm forever contradicting myself. However, I think this is a sign of a healthy attitude. I'm constantly looking to re-evaluate." Check out Doug's website and incredible, educational blog at: www.taroteon.com

item.title: Tarot of the Crone with Ellen Lorenzi-Prince - Jul 31,2010
item.description:
Class Handout: http://www.divinewhispers.net/crone.htm Join us to learn about The Tarot of the Crone & share a mini-class on using these cards. We will also do an activity that can be applied to any deck, so bring your favorite deck & join us for some good, modern tarot fun! Ellen Lorenzi-Prince, creator of Tarot of The Crone, demonstrates a spread that should speak to our souls while at the same time teach us about the concept of the crone in our lives & the hidden gems in her deck. Ellen's deck is new vision inspired by ancient Greek art, religion & myth. The Crone is the ancient holy one. She is grandmother, witch and hag. She has been ignored, trivialized, blamed & feared, for she holds powers that others deny. Powers of time & transformation. Powers we may fear, but would do better to understand. In a magical moment 25 ago, Ellen was given her first tarot deck. It has been an integral part of her spiritual path ever since. Her own deck, Tarot of the Crone, was created as an offering to her goddess, as a path to strength during a dark time, & as a way to delve more deeply into what tarot meant to her. Since discovering power & healing through that process, Ellen's focus has shifted from reading & teaching to creation & imagination. In addition to using tarot for plot & character development in her writing, she has designed & produced the Pandora Tarot, Tarot Paper Dolls, & the upcoming Minoan Tarot. Open your decks tonight & we'll work on connecting with our souls together. Ellen's Website: www.croneways.com/tarot.html Purchase her deck at The Tarot Connection: http://tarotconnection.net or http://tinyurl.com/tarotofcrone

item.title: Enrique Enriquez - The Marseille Deck, Poetry, and more - Jul 30,2010
item.description:
The hand-out for tonight's episode is at: http://www.divinewhispers.net/enrique.htm Join us to meet Enrique Enriquez, taroist and premiere blogger/interviewer, as we learn about the connections between the Marseille tarot and poetry, embodied semantics and the language of the birds. See the Marseille Deck at: http://tinyurl.com/marseilledeck Enrique Enriquez (born April 23, 1969 in Caracas, Venezuela) is a visual thinker and tarot reader. His interest in the tarot began in his early twenties, while studying Graphic Design at the Instituto de Diseño de la Fundacion Neumann, in Caracas. Between 1987 and 2001 he explored a wide array of expressive media, like painting, drawing, writing, performance art, animation and radio broadcasting, before setting on the tarot as a tool to explore the way images work and the dynamics of meaning-making. In 2000 he moved to New York, where he currently works as a tarot reader. In 2009 his ‘Gestural Keys to the Tarot’ were published as a prologue for the Jean Dodal tarot, re-edited by Jean-Claude Flornoy. Besides being an active member of the tarot international community, he is currently conducting a series of “Conversations Around and About the Tarot” with several well known authors within the tarot’s world: historians, artist, poets, readers, magicians, publishers, etc.(www.enriqueenriquez.me)The British Society of Mystery Entertainers described his work as one that “challenges many preconceptions about the tarot”. Visit Enrique's website at: www.enriqueenriquez.me His e-book can be purchased at: http://www.mindseyeview.com/marseilles-tarot.html

Visit Enrique's website at: www.enriqueenriquez.me His e-book can be purchased at: http://www.mindseyeview.com/marseilles-tarot.html

donnaleigh | georgianna boehnke | tarot psychic | Enrique Enriquez | poetry marseille marseilles
item.itunes:summary: The hand-out for tonight's episode is at: http://www.divinewhispers.net/enrique.htm Join us to meet Enrique Enriquez, taroist and premiere blogger/interviewer, as we learn about the connections between the Marseille tarot and poetry, embodied semantics and the language of the birds. See the Marseille Deck at: http://tinyurl.com/marseilledeck Enrique Enriquez (born April 23, 1969 in Caracas, Venezuela) is a visual thinker and tarot reader. His interest in the tarot began in his early twenties, while studying Graphic Design at the Instituto de Diseño de la Fundacion Neumann, in Caracas. Between 1987 and 2001 he explored a wide array of expressive media, like painting, drawing, writing, performance art, animation and radio broadcasting, before setting on the tarot as a tool to explore the way images work and the dynamics of meaning-making. In 2000 he moved to New York, where he currently works as a tarot reader. In 2009 his ‘Gestural Keys to the Tarot’ were published as a prologue for the Jean Dodal tarot, re-edited by Jean-Claude Flornoy. Besides being an active member of the tarot international community, he is currently conducting a series of “Conversations Around and About the Tarot” with several well known authors within the tarot’s world: historians, artist, poets, readers, magicians, publishers, etc.(www.enriqueenriquez.me)The British Society of Mystery Entertainers described his work as one that “challenges many preconceptions about the tarot”. Visit Enrique's website at: www.enriqueenriquez.me His e-book can be purchased at: http://www.mindseyeview.com/marseilles-tarot.html

item.title: Tarot Dynamics - Beginner's class with Anna Cook - Jul 25,2010
item.description:
Hand-out for the class: http://tinyurl.com/tarotdynamics1 Do you collect Tarot decks, but find it almost impossible to read a deck other than the one on which you learned? Have you been curious about learning to read the Tarot, but worry that it will be too time-consuming or complex? Have you ever taken a Tarot class only to decide that Tarot was too confusing for you? Have you tried to teach yourself the Tarot from one book after another only to become annoyed and frustrated? Tonight Anna Burroughs Cook helps you discover just how “reader-friendly” Tarot Dynamics really is. With 5 simple keywords, accompanied by explanations & definitions that apply to today's situations, Tarot Dynamics brings the Tarot into the 21st century for everyone, enabling adept readers, intermediate students and teachers to quickly and easily blend the old with the new to round out the accuracy and scope of their readings while taking the guesswork out of learning to read the Tarot for beginners. Anna Burroughs Cook has been reading & interpreting the Tarot for 30 years and has developed a wide base of clients across the United States as well as the U.K. & Ohio in the Lorain County area where she currently resides with her hubby Rick. Over the years she has appeared on television and radio programs and taught private classes including Tarot and Psychic development classes in Adult Education programs. In May, Anna delivered the first lecture of her series entitled Bringing The Tarot Into The 21st Century at the Midwest Astrologers Conference at the Doubletree Inn in Cleveland, Ohio. See her website: www.tarotdynamics.com

item.title: Dan Pelletier and Mike Hernandez - Mulitple Decks - Jul 24,2010
item.description:
Hand-out for this class: http://tinyurl.com/danmike Join pro Tarot readers Dan Pelletier & Mike Hernandez for a discussion on using multiple Tarot decks. What are reasons why you might consider using more than 2 or 3 Tarot decks in general? How do differences in artwork & symbolism among various decks can open up new perspectives & meanings for the cards? Why might you use more than 1 or 2 decks even for a single reading? How can some decks lend themselves to specific types of issues? Tonight, we'll introduce you to “The Rosetta Stone Method”, a fascinating way of using multiple decks to clarify, enhance & resolve communications issues between two individuals. Dan Pelletier is the author of ‘The Process–The Way of the Tarot Reader.” He has written articles appearing in The Association for Tarot Studies Newsletter, Timeless Spirit Magazine, Tarot for Life website newsletter “Seeker’s Journey,” & has interviewed deck creators on the tarotgarden.com website library. He has been reading Tarot for himself & others for close to four decades. Dan is co-owner of The Tarot Garden, a highly respected resource for tarot decks & related information on the Internet. Mike Hernandez uses the Tarot to provide you with knowledge, Spiritual guidance, and peace of mind that can help you with issues such as relationships, travel, work, & your inner self. Mike does readings at venues such as bookstores and psychic fairs, and is available for various events and functions such as bachelorette parties, birthday parties, conventions, corporate parties, festivals, & fund raisers. Visit Dan's website at: http://tarotgarden.com Visit Mike’s website at www.JustEnoughTarot.com

donnaleigh storm cestavani | multiple decks | tarot garden | mike hernandez | dan pelletier

item.title: The Science of ESP - ESP Enigma author Diane Hennacy Powell, M.D. - Jul 21,2010
item.description:
Dr. Diane Powell, a Johns Hopkins-trained neuroscientist, has brilliantly reassessed the meaning and nature of consciousness by exploring research on the workings psychic phenomena. If you've ever doubted that ESP exists, listen in tonight. Dr. Powell speaks with us about scientific proof research has found that helps us understand how the human mind works and how we can better understand ESP and psychic phenomenon. Over the past few decades several well-designed and rigorously supervised experiments have documented the existence of telepathic interconnection, clairvoyance, precognition, psychokinesis, and out-of-body experiences. Building upon these experiments, Powell constructs a new theory of consciousness. Integrating concepts from physics, neuroscience, and other disciplines, she offers an insightful and intriguing explanation of ESP, and regards psychic abilities as expanding our understanding and appreciation of consciousness. ABOUT OUR GUEST: After an undergraduate education in neuroscience, Diane Powell received her medical degree from the Johns Hopkins University School of Medicine, where she also completed training in medicine, neurology, and psychiatry. She obtained additional training at Queen Square and The Institute of Psychiatry, both world-renowned medical institutes in London. She has been on the faculty at Harvard Medical School, was a member of a part-time think tank on consciousness at the Salk Institute in La Jolla, CA, and the Director of Research for the John E. Mack Institute. She currently is a member of the Board of Directors of the Jean Houston Foundation. Her website is at www.dianehennacypowell.com

donnaleigh georgianna boehnke | the esp enigma book | diane hennacy powell | psychic phenomenon | research tarot

item.title: What to do when you feel professionally violated-Tarot by Misha - Jul 17,2010
item.description:
On 7/8/10, Donnaleigh was a honored to be a guest on the Tarot by Misha show at The Mix Talk (www.themixtalk.com). Donnaleigh & Misha discussed a professional reader's responsibilities to other professionals, discuss what a professional violation is, and what should we do when we feel we are professionally violated by someone. This is a much unexplored topic,and comments are welcome. This show is being shared through the Beyond Worlds RSS feed with the permission of Misha. Thanks, Misha!

item.title: Interpreting Dreams through Tarot with Paula Chaffee Scardamalia - Jul 07,2010
item.description:
Did you ever have a dream that left you confused? Let's learn about how to go deeper into our (or our clients') nightly dreams by using tarot! The Hand-out for tonight's class is at: http://tinyurl.com/dreamstarot Paula Chaffee Scardamalia weaves together her creative & intuitive experiences as a dream traveler, tarotist, author, & professional weaver, to show how to decipher dreams & then tell your stories. She is a book coach & creative mentor, & leads workshops, seminars, & group & individual retreats, at her home, online, & across the US. Paula began studying dreams in the early 80’s. In the early 90’s, she became part of author & dream teacher Robert Moss’s dream circle. In 1999, she taught her first workshop on shamanic dreaming & writing at the Internat'l Women’s Writing Guild, & has taught at the conference ever since. In the last 3 years she has woven together both the dream work & the tarot as powerful intuitive tools for writers. In 2004, she released her CD, The Tower in the Woods: Dreaming Your Creativity Awake, a recording of four different conscious dream journeys with drumming. Paula is the award-winning author of Weaving a Woman's Life: Spiritual Lessons from the Loom, a book she wrote after almost 15 years as a professional weaver who sold luxurious wares across the country and the globe. As a professional freelance writer, Paula has written feature articles for publications as diverse as Faery Magazine, Beliefnet.com, First30Days.com & Crafts Business Magazine. She also writes book reviews for Broadsheet, a publication for women who love to read & write about fantasy, & for Foreword Magazine. See Paula's website at: www.diviningthemuse.com

item.title: Rachel Pollack & James Ricklef - Difficult Cards - Jul 05,2010
item.description:
Tonights handout is at: http://tinyurl.com/confusingcards Did you ever get a new tarot deck and suddenly freeze because some of the cards dont match your known meanings or traditional meanings of that card? Tarot luminaries Rachel Pollack and James Ricklef join us tonight to share a technique where you can get more comfortable understanding confusing cards. Well take some cards that are sly and tough to understand, and ask tarot about what we need to know. See James delightful technique described in his blog about the MAAT tarot: http://www.jamesricklef.com/DeckRev_MAAT.html And James also uses this technique to clarify the 4 of Cups in a self-reading that needed more insight on that particular card: http://jamesricklef.wordpress.com/2010/06/13/four-of-cups-redux/ Tonight, lets learn from two Masters while having a tarot-good time with hinky cards and wasy to unravel them! Rachel Pollacks website is: www.RachelPollack.com James Ricklefs website: www.JamesRicklef.com His Blog: www.jamesricklef.wordpress.com

item.title: Thalassa! Bay Area Tarot Symposium & more.... - Jul 03,2010
item.description:
BATS, Myth-busting, & The Majors, and court cards with Thalassa! Thalassa is producer of the San Francisco Bay Area Tarot Symposium – the oldest established, permanent floating Tarot Symposium in the world (actually, the longest continuouslyy produced Tarot event) & founder of the Daughters of Divination (DOD). She has been living, working & playing with the Tarot for more than 40 years (she was an infant prodigy). She is also active in the production of Pagan & Divination events across the country, & her writing has been published in a wide range of publications, including the Llewellyn Tarot Reader almanacs since their inception. She has been involved in standup comedy, choreography, and stage management, & currently teaches improvisation and physical characterisation for performers of Renaissance & Victorian festivals. Her other interests include historical recreation, needlework, and plotting global domination. Thalassa lives in San Francisco with her long-suffering husband, a herd of semi-feral dustbunnies, a sword collection, & more Tarot cards than is safe to assemble in one place. She is working on a book (on Tarot, of all things). And tonight, we talk about BATS! What is BATS? A chance to schmooze and socialize with fellow Tarot enthusiasts & BATSmaniacs. Inter-active entertainment provided by the metaphysically oriented interactive theatre troupe LILAC - Explorers of the Antique Unseen plus games, oracular operations, and other surprises! Who will be at BATS? Mary K. Greer, Rachel Pollack, Marcus Katz, Emily Carding, James Wanless, Leisa ReFalo, Ellen Lorenzi-Prince (Tarot of the Crone), and more! Learn more about BATS at http://www.dodivination.com/sf_bats

item.title: The Gaian Tarot's Joanna Powell Colbert - Jun 27,2010
item.description:
Joanna Powell Colbert ~ artist, writer & teacher of Tarot and earth-centered spirituality ~ is one of “the most accomplished & well-loved artists in the Goddess-spirit community.” Her work has appeared in many publications since the mid-1980s, including SageWoman & Circle Magazine. The Gaian Tarot, nine years in the making, combines Joanna’s love of symbolic, archetypal art with the mysteries of Mama Gaia, the natural world. The limited edition Majors-Only deck sold out before it was released in 2004. The deck is featured in US Games’ Encyclopedia of Tarot, Volume 4. A mass market version of the Gaian Tarot will be published by Llewellyn Worldwide in 2011. The Collectors (Limited) Edition is currently available for order from the Gaian Tarot website. The Gaian Tarot was created during the decade Joanna lived on a small island near Bellingham, Washington. Today she lives in the woods outside Bellingham with her husband, musician Craig Olson, in a house called “ Learn more about Joanna at: www.GaianTarot.com www.GaianTarotircle.com

item.title: Catherine Chapman - Beyond the Celtic Cross - Jun 26,2010
item.description:
Have you ever wondered how you can bring greater depth and clarity to your Tarot readings? Have you struggled to understand just what is exactly going on in your card readings, and how the cards relate to the object of the reading? For the first time, a book shows how the professionals use secret techniques that take Tarot readings to new and exciting levels. It goes beyond the surface levels of the Tarot spread and explores the hidden depths. Catherine's system explains how to decode those parts of a Tarot spread that seem to make no sense and how to break out of readings that seem to have become "stuck". Using the power of the elemental symbolism of the cards combined with numerological techniques, this book cracks the "Celtic cross" spread wide open to reveal exciting new levels of insight. Join Catherine tonight in an advanced tarot class, using the Golden Dawn's "card counting" technique, and we'll talk about elemental dignities & their impact on a reading. View the cards from the reading in this episode at: http://tinyurl.com/beyondthecross Catherine was also featured on Storm Cestavani's Psychic Friends Live on 5/21/10, and you can hear that episode to learn more about Catherine by going to: http://tinyurl.com/catherinechapman Visit Catherine's website at: http://www.tarotelements.com

item.title: Corrine Kenner - Getting Creative With Tarot - Jun 20,2010
item.description:
Let's get creative with Tarot! How can you write a story using tarot to spur the creative process? Devise a plot? Create characters and situations? Corrine Kenner specializes in bringing metaphysical subjects down to earth. She has written 12 books & edited 4 anthologies, including Tarot for Writers, Simple Fortunetelling with Tarot Cards, The Ma'at Tarot Workbook, Tarot Journaling, The Symbolist, & Crystals for Beginners. One of her books, Tall Dark Stranger: Tarot for Love & Romance, was a COVR Visionary Award finalist, marking it as one of the top 3 divination books of 2006. Corrine created the Epicurean Tarot & the Christmas Tarot, & she is currently working on a beautiful book & deck set called the Wizards Tarot. Her work has also been featured in the Encyclopedia of Tarot. Her completely downloadable Christmas Tarot at: www.christmastarot.com In her home state of Minnesota, Metro magazine called Corrine one of the best psychics in the T

item.title: Ciro Marchetti - Tarot Artist and Visionary - Jun 19,2010
item.description:
Join us as we roll out our softest royal red carpet for Donnaleigh's favorite tarot artist, Ciro Marchetti! Creator of The Gilded Tarot, The Tarot of Dreams, and The Legacy of the Divine tarot decks, Ciro is a prominent leader in tarot artistry. Soon to be released is his exciting, mysterious new deck called The Oracle of Visions. Pictures of that deck can be viewed at: http://ciromarchetti.com/tarotzodiac_o.htm Ciro will be sharing with us many secrets found within his cards, what's new and coming, and he'll tease us with details on his new iPhone app for The Legacy of the Divine tarot, with revolutionary new capabilities and flexibility never before seen in an app! (See below video for more details). Learn more about Ciro's work at his website: www.CiroMarchetti.com

item.title: Crone Stone Creator, Carol Campbell Returns! - Jun 13,2010
item.description:
We welcome back to our show one of our favorite guests, Crone Stone & Epona Stone creator, Carol Campbell! Crone Stones are a meditation and divination tool used by maidens, mothers, and crones worldwide: Crone Stones! Crone Stones are 33 hand-crafted porcelain stones, each depicting an image of the human life journey. Like tarot or runes, Crone Stones can be very easily used Carol will be joining us again for live readings with her amazing stones, so call in for your powerful reading at (646) 200-0765. Her beautiful stones can be viewed at Carol's website, along with a free sample reading at: www.CroneStones.com Carol also created the beautiful Epona Stones, which are semi-precious stones engraved with various depictions of horses, also used in divination. http://www.eponastones.com/

item.title: Jeanne Fiorini - More Quantum Physics & Tarot - Jun 12,2010
item.description:
Join us for a Quantum Tarot Spread of Intention & Manifestation! Jeanne Fiorini, one of our most popular show guests & author of the 5-Star Tarot book "Invitation to Wonder" will be joining us again to delve into the mysteries of how Tarot Works. Jeanne Fiorini brings nearly 20 years experience to her work as a Tarot practitioner, teacher, and author, offering a unique blend of knowledge, wisdom, and wit. Jeanne offers monthly reading circles, provides readings to groups and individuals (in-person and by phone), and hosts a variety of Tarot-related special programs throughout the year. With formal training in both mediation and psychosynthesis counseling, Jeanne brings practical guidance and useful information to all her readings, classes, and groups. She has been a guest presenter at the C.G. Jung Center in Brunswick, Maine, the University of New England, the Whole Health Expo, and numerous fundraising and special functions in Maine and New Hampshire. Jeanne is currently working on a second book, to be published by Schiffer Publishing Ltd. Fall 2010. In addition to her work as a Tarot reader and teacher, and with the help of an artist friend, Jeanne designed and created a special line of Tarot-themed gift wrapping papers. The gift wrap, a fabulous Tarot card wrap bag & other Tarot-related products, as well as a listing of upcoming classes/events, can be seen at: http://www.tarotworks.com

item.title: Marcus Katz - Teaching & Learning Tarot (History & Systems) - Jun 05,2010
item.description:
Join Marcus Katz in a tarot class! With actual examples & unique teachings, Marcus will cover 3 particular exercises, a beginner, an intermediate and an advanced! The class will include covering Court cards. Not to be missed! Tonight's spreads are at: http://www.tarotprofessionals.com/tarotarticles.html (scroll down to our show). Marcus Katz, M.B.A., M.A., is the founder of the Far Away Centre, teaching Tarot, Witchcraft, Kabbalah, Thelema, Alchemy and Spellcrafting in the heart of the Lake District (England) and Online. He is founder and co-Director of Tarot Professionals, which offers innovative teaching courses & unique Tarot experiences. His forthcoming Tarot book, Tarosophy®, has been described by Rachel Pollack as a “major contribution” to Tarot & by Mary K. Greer as “a work of intelligence & depth”. He publishes Tarosophist International, a quarterly Tarot magazine featuring the world’s leading Tarot authors & teachers. He has possibly one of the largest libraries of occult books in the UK, gathered over 30 years, including full collections of magazines & teaching material from many private groups. He has been reading & studying the original hand-written materials of Aleister Crowley and the members of the Golden Dawn for over 15 years, including many unpublished materials. See his websites: http://www.farawaycentre.com http://www.tarotprofessionals.com http://www.tarosophy.com http://www.everlastingday.org

item.title: Barbara Moore - Publishing Decks or Books - May 23,2010
item.description:
Have you ever thought of writing your own tarot book or creating your own deck? Tonight, get an insider's look of what happens behind the scenes at a publisher's office and what catches a publisher's eye. Tarot has been a part of Barbara Moore¹s personal and professional lives for nearly twenty years. Right from the start, tarot intrigued her with its marvelous blending of mythology, psychology, art, history, mystery, and magic. She has studied under renowned tarot scholars such as Mary K. Greer and Rachel Pollack, and continues to work with some of the brightest lights in the tarot world. Currently, she consults for both Llewellyn Worldwide and Lo Scarabeo and is one of the founders of the Minnesota Area Tarot Symposium (http://minnesotatarot.com/). Barbara enjoys the challenge of giving a voice to tarot cards and oracle decks. She has had the good fortune to write books and booklets for several decks, including A Guide to Mystic Faerie Tarot, The Gilded Tarot Companion, The Hip Witch Tarot, The Enchanted Oracle, The Mystic Dreamer Tarot, The Pagan Magical Kit, The Vampires of the Eternal Night Tarot, The Tarot of the Sweet Twilight, The Dream Enchantress Tarot, and Shadowscapes Tarot (forthcoming spring 2010). She has written a new edition of Llewellyn¹s Tarot for Beginners (forthcoming fall 2010). In July, she will attend the Tarot Association of the British Isles Conference as their keynote speaker. Meanwhile, she is working on designing several new tarot decks. Her blog can be found at: http://www.llewellyn.com/blog/tarot/ Her website is: http://www.practicaltarotreadings.com

item.title: Bonnie Cehovet - Flash Fiction, Tarot Reviews, & Intuition - May 22,2010
item.description:
Bonnie Cehovet is a CTGM, a professional Tarot reader and Reiki Master. She reviews Tarot related material (decks, books and software), and has interviewed several authors and artists about their work in the Tarot field. (Bonnie’s reviews and interviews can be seen at www.aeclectic.net/tarot.) “Women In Tarot”, an e-book compilation of reviews of prominent women in the Tarot world can be seen here - http://bonniecehovet.com/WomenInTarotebook.html. “Tarot In Review”, a compilation of older deck reviews can be seen here - http://bonniecehovet.com/TarotInReview.html. Bonnie also has an upcoming POD book presenting of a wide variety of her interviews with Tarot authors and artists. She is also working on a book on Tarot Birth Cards that is due to come out in fall of 2011. Tonight we'll be talking about three topics: 1) Flash fiction using tarot: what it is, and where you can go with it. 2) What makes a successful review 3) Using intuition in a reading (when to say something, and when not to). What is Flash Fiction? Go to: http://www.fictionfactor.com/guests/flashfiction.html Donnaleigh's attempt at Flash Fiction before the show is here: http://tinyurl.com/sampleflash We will do live readings for callers during the last 30 minutes of the show. Bonnie’s professional site is http://bonniecehovet.com. Her Tarot blog is http://bonniecehovet.wordpress.com. She can be contacted at bonniecehovet@gmail.com.

item.title: Mike Hernandez - Tarot's Rising Star - May 19,2010
item.description:
See tonight's "State of Being Spread" at http://tinyurl.com/miketarot You know how in a crowd of 200 people, one person can stand out above the others & you know there is something unique, wise, different, & powerful? That is Mike Hernandez. When I visited this year's Reader's Studio, he stood out above the rest. Mike has the knack of summarizing difficult questions we had about tough reading situations, & succinctly narrowing the answer down to 1 or 2 brilliant sentences that left the rest of us nodding our heads in agreement thinking, "yeah, THAT!" Mike comes from a family of psychically-gifted individuals who read the Tarot, perform energy healing, & speak with departed souls. He has been a Shaman/Medicine Man in four previous lifetimes. His main gift, specialty and area of most interest is the Tarot. Mike performs a "State of Being" Reading, which gives you a point-in-time snapshot of where the Universe says the querent is at that very moment and requires no question at all from the querent. We will work with that spread tonight. When doing this reading, Mike asks no questions at all & you do not provide him with any intro information. LIVE READINGS TONIGHT with Mike! See Mike Hernandez' website at: http://justenoughtarot.com and his blog at http://mikehernandeztarotblog.spaces.live.comx

item.title: Robert Place & The Vampire Tarot - May 15,2010
item.description:
NOTE: The Vampire Tarot spread Robert uses in this episode can be viewed at: http://tinyurl.com/vampiretarot Vampires! Vampire legend, history, and the Vampire Tarot! Bring your garlic and enter if you dare tonight! Robert Place re-joins Storm & Donnaleigh by popular demand, this time to dive into the Vampire Tarot. We'll discuss the evolution of Vampires in history, and learn the back story to many of his beautiful cards in The Vampire Tarot. View or purchase this deck at: http://thealchemicalegg.com/VampTarot.html Robert M. Place's award winning works have been displayed in galleries and museums in America, Europe, and Japan & graced the covers & pages of numerous books & publications. He is designer, illustrator, & co-author, with Rosemary Ellen Guiley, of: The Alchemical Tarot & The Angels Tarot, and the designer, illustrator, & author of The Tarot of the Saints, The Buddha Tarot, & The Vampire Tarot. He is the author of The Tarot: History, Symbolism, & Divination, which Booklist has said "may be the best book ever written on that deck of cards decorated with mysterious images called the tarot." He also the author of Astrology & Divination, Magic & Alchemy, & Shamanism, & Unexplained Phenomena series. He is currently working on his 6th deck, The Tarot of the Sevenfold Mystery, & he is the curator of The Fool's Journey, an exhibition on the art and symbolism of the Tarot, at the Craft & Folk Art Museum in Los Angeles. Robert can be reached through his websites: www.thealchemicalegg.com www.alchemicaltarot.com Find products by Robert at: http://tinyurl.com/robertplace

donnaleigh donna | storm cestavani | robert place | tarot physic readings | vampire

item.title: Animal Communicator Lynn MacKenzie - May 09,2010
item.description:
Got pet problems? Want to know what's on your pet's mind? Is your pet hurting or depressed and you're not sure where or why? You’ve come to the right place! We are honored to have returning to Beyond Worlds the talented Lynn McKenzie, Animal Communicator. Lynn uses her gifts as an Animal Communicator, Horse Whisperer, Flower Essence Practitioner, and Medical Intuitive to do just that. Call in for readings and learn about the furred and feathered friends in your life through Lynn's powerful intuition! Lynn will be teaching us tonight about animal chakras and how they differ from (or are similar to) to human chakras. She will then launch into powerful live readings about your pets! Call in for your live reading tonight from one of the world's best! (646) 200-0765. Check out her website at http://animalenergy.com.

item.title: Claire-France Perez - Marketing for Readers - May 08,2010
item.description:
Public Relations Veteran and former fashion editor, Claire-France Perez has also been a long-time practicing astrologer. In the last couple of years Claire-France has become focused on the combination of the two, bringing her Public Relations skills to her colleagues in the starry arts. She has the "Marketing the Astrologer" page on Facebook/MarketingAstrologer devoted to this effort. Lately she has been hosting a seminar series for the solo entrepreneur, especially astrologers, to help bring more clients and visibility to their practice. "What is marketing to some other profession is simply not applicable or effective for astrologers. It's a problem deciding on what works. Many have started with Twitter, and now move into the proper tools for broadcasting The Message of Astrology. Claire-France hopes to solve the marketing problem for the one-person-consulting business with events, seminars and a book!" See Claire-France's website at www.AncientSky.com
