item.title: Joseph LoBrutto III, Psychic Medium - May 02,2010
item.description:
Internationally Renowned Joseph LoBrutto III Named as one of the best Psychic Medium in Florida. Joseph is a loving channel connecting you with your loved ones on the other side. As a mental medium he will sometimes take on the personality of the deceased person by mimicking mannerisms you may remember from when they were alive. He is an extraordinary Psychic and Medium. One of Joseph’s greatest accomplishments as an author is to publish one of the most enlightening books available in the New Age market; Is There More To Life Than What We Know? A Spiritual Journey and Awakening in Finding God. “The book was so captivating and alluring I could not put it down. The anticipation of intriguing topics kept my interest at peak throughout the whole book. *Tested as Legitimate**-reviewed and featured on The “Best Psychic Mediums" list on Medium Channel My reading with Joseph was like no other mediumistic reading I have had. Joseph LoBrutto is listed as one of the best Psychics on Medium Channel, a featured psychic on American Association of Psychics, and the Bob Olson Best Psychic Directory. Joseph is truly a legitimate certified psychic medium, he is becoming known world-wide and has appeared on television and radio. For more information on Joseph, see: www.ourjourneyoflife.com Call in for your live readings tonight.

item.title: Robert Place and Alchemy - Apr 17,2010
item.description:
Robert M. Place is an internationally known visionary artist & illustrator, whose award winning works, in painting, sculpture, & jewelry, have been displayed in galleries and museums in America, Europe, and Japan & graced the covers & pages of numerous books & publications. He is designer, illustrator, & co-author, with Rosemary Ellen Guiley, of: The Alchemical Tarot & The Angels Tarot, and the designer, illustrator, & author of The Tarot of the Saints, The Buddha Tarot, & The Vampire Tarot. He is the author of The Tarot: History, Symbolism, & Divination, which Booklist has said "may be the best book ever written on that deck of cards decorated with mysterious images called the tarot." He also the author of Astrology & Divination, Magic & Alchemy, & Shamanism, & Unexplained Phenomena series. He published a reprint of The Alchemical Tarot & recordings of his classes on the Tarot & on dreams. He is currently working on his sixth deck, The Tarot of the Sevenfold Mystery, & he is the curator of The Fool's Journey, an exhibition on the art and symbolism of the Tarot, at the Craft & Folk Art Museum in Los Angeles. Robert has appeared on the Discovery Channel series Strictly Supernatural & his work has appeared on The Learning Channel, Animal Planet, and A&E, & he has been a guest on numerous radio shows. Tonight, Robert talks with us about Alchemy & Tarot, and will give live readings to callers using his Alchemical Tarot. Robert can be reached through his websites: www.thealchemicalegg.com www.alchemicaltarot.com Find products by Robert at: http://tinyurl.com/robertplace And twice the fun: Storm Cestavani co-hosts tonight!

item.title: Nadine, medium and psychic - Apr 11,2010
item.description:
A sought-after Psychic and Medium and Donnaleigh's personal psychic, Nadine has been aware of her intuitive capabilities since the age of 12. She offers astonishingly accurate readings with details that can reveal aspects of your life, both known and unknown. Without any prompting, Nadine is able to translate messages from the Universe into a language that is very understandable to her clients. Her readings provide specifics about people and places from your life with a focus that is very much on future events. In addition, there will be validations of your present and past communicated to you without bias or judgment. People seek Nadine for all types of matters, including relationships, divorce, business, college and career choices, health issues, and pet concerns. Particularly attractive for some people is the fact that Nadine can work with little or no information, questions or prompting. If there is not any pressing information on you when you come, she may get a reading on someone you know. Nadine prefers the energy that is generated when the client visits in person, however, her sessions can be just as effective by phone. She now works with her natural, strong psychic energy for: Mediumship Health scans Psychic energy healing Palmistry Crystals/lithomancy Guidance Counseling Animal Communication Nadine's website is at: http://thecosmiccat.com

item.title: Lisa Powers, Psychic Medium & Animal Communicator - Apr 10,2010
item.description:
Meet Lisa Powers: Intuitive Medium, Animal Communicator & Angel Reader, and one of Massachusett's hidden gems! About five years ago Lisa had a spiritual awakening. It was then that she embraced her oversensitivity and healing abilities that she had since a child, but that she never fully developed or engaged. Lisa has now returned to her connection with spirit and higher self, and she has come to listen more fully to her intuition, her inner voice, and the voice of spirit. In following the voice of her soul's purpose, Lisa started offering Intuitive Angel Readings a few years ago to her existing Esthetician & Nail Tech business, and has been on a wonderful journey ever since. One of Lisa's goals & purposes is to help others reconnect to their higher self through different healing modalities: channeling healing & readings, prayer, meditation, & in various ways just to help people on their own journey and spiritual awakening. Please come join Lisa on that journey.... Feel free to visit Lisa on her website: www.AngelstouchbyLisa.com.

item.title: Chrissie Astell, Author & Angel Deck Creator - Apr 03,2010
item.description:
Traveling around the UK over the last decade, Chrissie Astell has brought the message of angelic love and healing to thousands, and has taught successful courses on the many varied aspects of spirituality in today's world. She has written several books and recorded guided meditations with composers Llewelyn and Mark Hughes, as well as appearing on BBC's Kilroy "I believe in Angels", ITV's Christmas special "Angels are Everywhere", BBC's Everyman documentary on Angels and as a guest speaker on several local BBC chat shows. She also recently published her latest project with Duncan Baird Publishing, the Angel Insight Pack. This is based on a traditional angel card set, but with a difference. As well as a beautiful set of angel cards illustrated by Rene Milot, the pack contains a book featuring explanations, techniques and meditations and will be supported by its own website to further enhance the angel experience. Chrissie sees clients on a one-to-one basis offering Spiritual Development Facilitation helping people to find their way through the confusion of spiritual beliefs available, and is training others to become Angel Workshop facilitators. Her website is at: http://angellight.co.uk and updates,announcements and her blog are at: http://angelslighttheway.blogspot.com

item.title: Erin from Self-Insights with live Tarot & Intutive Readings - Mar 28,2010
item.description:
Intuitive since a child, Erin knew information that was never taught to her or spoken in her family while growing up. Erin would receive perceived thoughts that would come true. As an adult, Erin would have precognitive dreams which would perceive the future. She later found out that her mother, Grandmother, and Great Grandmother had the same gift. As Erin matured, her abilities seemed to grow stronger, and in her 30’s she would perceive things regarding friends or family members which would later come true. Join us tonight for live psychic and tarot readings with Erin, and call in at (646) 200-0765 with your questions. Learn more about Erin at: www.self-insights.com

item.content:encoded:
Intuitive since a child, Erin knew information that was never taught to her or spoken in her family while growing up. Erin would receive perceived thoughts that would come true. As an adult, Erin would have precognitive dreams which would perceive the future. She later found out that her mother, Grandmother, and Great Grandmother had the same gift. As Erin matured, her abilities seemed to grow stronger, and in her 30’s she would perceive things regarding friends or family members which would later come true. Join us tonight for live psychic and tarot readings with Erin, and call in at (646) 200-0765 with your questions. Learn more about Erin at: www.self-insights.com

item.title: Twin Psychics Sunhee & Chinhee - Mar 27,2010
item.description:
Chinhee and Sunhee Park are Korean identical twins and are both psychics who were born in Korea and adopted by an Italian and Irish family at the age of two. Chinhee and Sunhee recognized their gifts of clairvoyance, empathy, telepathy, and mediumship at a young age. At 15 years old, they both had the same dream of their mother dying from Cancer. Their prediction came true shortly after. At 19, they started to exercise their abilities in the entertainment industry and were spotted in the streets of Manhattan by an NBA basketball player and talent agent. This talent agent sent them on auditions for small parts in Law & Order, MTV, TBS, Independent Films as psychics, Marie Claire Magazine, Book of Twins, Time, People, and many other international magazines and newspapers. Eventually, their talent agent handed his company over to them, and was amazed at how they intuitively knew which actors & models were going to book a project and make it big. The twins managed actors and models for 10 years. They have hosted their own radio show for over 2 years as well as being guests on Mothership Radio, CBS with Barbara Mackey and many others. Their NY Style is direct, and to the point and they specialize in helping people who have suffered from all forms of abuse. People who are in denial, or date a person who is stuck in their past can benefit from a reading with Sunhee. Sunhee picks up on your negative physical ailments and Chinhee can feel your negative emotions and sees clairvoyantly what you look like. Learn more about them at: www.twinpsychics.ning.com www.twinpsychics.ning.com

item.title: Numerology in Tarot with Ed Peterson - Mar 21,2010
item.description:
Ed Peterson fasted (no food, only water) twice for 20 days in 1995. At that time he also read the book Numerology and the Divine Triangle by Faith Javane and Dusty Bunker. Receiving amazing insights during his fast, he put pen to paper and recorded what he received in his book, "Numerology." This book will bring profound insights to the connections between *all* the numbers in Tarot as well as their opposites. You will learn more about numerology's correspondences to tarot here than ever before. Join us tonight for live numerology readings through tarot, ...AND we have a massive give-away tonight of several copies of Ed's book! You will find this a valuable resource! More given away on Storm Cestavani's Psychic Friends live on BTR. Learn more about Ed Peterson tonight, or by visiting his website at: www.LearnTheNumbers.com

item.title: Sacred Geometry with Charles Gilchrist - Mar 20,2010
item.description:
Sacred Geometry Expert and Artist, Charles Gilchrist joins us tonight to talk about sacred geometry in The Universe. What is sacred geometry? Sacred Geometry is the eternal visual language wrapped around the root concepts of the manifest universe. The archetypes and icons of geometry are absolutely perfect, unchanging, and timeless realities springing directly from God Mind. The Universe is Vibration, and the principles of Sacred Geometry are directly correspondent to ALL wave form phenomena . . . ALL vibration. Science agrees, the Universe Is Vibration, and geometry IS vibration manifest on the visual, time/space planes. Sacred Geometry defines the nature of Space and Time.Sacred Geometry is THE ARCHITECTURE OF THE UNIVERSE. Learn more about Charles' work and the theories of sacred geometry at: www.charlesgilchrist.com

item.title: Shamanic Healer & Author, Wendy Stofan Halley - Mar 14,2010
item.description:
Join us tonight on a shamanistic journey.... Wendy Stofan Halley is a psychotherapist and a student of indigenous healing methods. Wendy has over 12 years of experience as a therapist and workshop facilitator. She received a Master of Arts degree in Clinical Psychology from Pepperdine University in California and a Bachelor of Arts degree in General Studies (Creative Writing, Psychology and Media Arts) from the University of Arizona in Tucson. Driven by a desire to explore healing possibilities beyond the scope of contemporary practices, Wendy became involved in the study and practice of shamanic healing. For the last eight years those studies have focused on the study of Hawaiian mysticism and healing methods. Wendy is also the author of Slaying the Mouse: A true story of healing in the spiritual realms and the children’s book Inside Out (Illumination Arts, Inc.). Her book, Slaying the Mouse: A true story of Healing in the Spiritual Realms, describes the true story of 19-year-old Jason, who mysteriously slips into a deep coma. Family members and doctors are baffled, and seeking answers, the family contacts author and shamanic healer Wendy Halley. Using the ancient practice of shamanic trance, Wendy begins a 9-month odyssey into the 'dreamtime' world, where she and Jason will connect in a healing journey that transcends geography, distance, and the conscious world. This amazing book invites the reader into the intimate inner world of a young man struggling to understand his circumstances, and the otherworldly allies that join him in his fight. Visit Wendy's website at: http://www.lucidpath.com

item.title: The Tarot School's Ruth Ann & Wald Amberstone - Mar 14,2010
item.description:
Are you ready for the largest and most exciting Tarot convention in the world? Join us as Ruth Ann and Wald Amberstone rev us up for what to expect at the April 23-25 Reader's Studio 2010 in NYC. Ruth Ann & Wald Amberstone are co-founders of The Tarot School, and together they teach, write and publish about Tarot on all levels from divination to psychology to esotericism and magical practice. Between them, Ruth Ann and Wald have amassed more than 80 years of experience as Tarot practitioners. They were each awarded the honorary rank of Certified Tarot Grandmaster in 1998. More than a thousand students have taken live classes at The Tarot School since it opened its doors in 1995. Hundreds more from around the country have participated in Tarot Telecourses (an innovative program of classes given on the telephone), and students from all over the world have purchased recordings from The Tarot School Audio Course Series and study The Tarot School Correspondence Course. Tarot Tips, the Tarot School's email newsletter, has thousands of subscribers worldwide. The Amberstones are the authors of Tarot Tips: 78 Practical Techniques to Enhance Your Tarot Reading Skills, and have contributed articles to Llewellyn's Tarot Reader almanacs for 2005, 2006 and 2008. Their second book, "The Secret Language of Tarot" was published by Weiser Books (April 2008). Learn more about Ruth Ann & Wald at www.TarotSchool.com And learn more about The Reader's Studio at www.ReadersStudio.com

item.title: Human Design Reading - Peter Roe reads Robin Richardson - Mar 08,2010
item.description:
Human Design is an intersecting point between modern science, ancient cultures and several metaphysical arts. It is the assimilation of Eastern and Western Astrology, Quantum Physics, the Chinese I’Ching, the Kabbalah and the Hindu Chakra system. How does it work? As the major planetary bodies orbit the earth, they affect the crystaline energetic structure of the physical bodies that we are born with. By using your birth date, time and location, we can mathematically calculate the effects of the planets and produce a chart called the Rave body graph. This chart is a road map to your successful expression of your energy in life. By understanding your chart, you can learn where you have consistent energy and where your energy is lacking consistency. Human Design speaks to your characteristics of intuition, emotions, physical vulnerabilities and sense of self. With knowledge of this vast array of information, you can form strategies to optimize your energetic return in your life and put your energy to work for you! Human Design Expert, Peter Roe, does a live Human Design reading on radio personality, life coach, and intuitive, Robin Richardson! A picture of Robin's chart, which we will be discussing tonight, can be viewed at: http://tinyurl.com/robin-chart Robin Richardson's website is at: www.YourPsychicGirlfriend.com Donnaleigh's Chart is at http://tinyurl.com/donnaleigh-HD Ronnie's chart: http://tinyurl.com/ronniehd Peter Roe's website is at: www.LoveYourHumanDesign.com Call in for your mini-reading!

item.title: James Ricklef - Tarot Author & Deck Creator - Mar 07,2010
item.description:
James Ricklef: Certified Tarot Master, Tarot reader, teacher, lecturer, tarot deck creator and freelance writer joins us tonight. James has been a regularly scheduled workshop presenter at the annual Los Angeles Tarot Symposium (LATS) since 2001. In May of 2005 he was one of the featured speakers at the New York Tarot Reader's Studio, which is an annual three- day event hosted by the New York Tarot School. James' book, "Tarot Tells the Tale," which features sample readings for well-known historical, mythical, and fictional characters, won 1st Runner Up in the General Interest category in the 2004 Coalition of Visionary Resources (C.O.V.R.) Awards. His writing has been praised for being clear, insightful and easy to read. James also wrote: "Tarot -- Get the Whole Story" “Tarot Affirmations,” Tarot: Get the Whole Story: Use, Create & Interpret Tarot Spreads Knighthawk's Tarot Readings: A Guide to the Art of Tarot Reading Using Subjects from Literature, Mythology, and History and The Original Tarot Coloring Book James also created the deck "Tarot of the Masters" and its accompanying book: Uncovering The Tarot Of The Masters: An Instruction Book For The Tarot Of The Masters Deck James also reads Tarot cards (individually and for parties, as well as via telephone) & teaches workshops on the subject. James' "Tarot of the Masters" deck has had two printings that have sold out. Learn more about James Ricklef at www.jamesricklef.com

donnaleigh dawn | free | tarot psychic readings | tells the tale of the masters | James Ricklef affirmations

James also wrote: "Tarot -- Get the Whole Story" “Tarot Affirmations,” Tarot: Get the Whole Story: Use, Create & Interpret Tarot Spreads Knighthawk's Tarot Readings: A Guide to the Art of Tarot Reading Using Subjects from Literature, Mythology, and History and The Original Tarot Coloring Book James also created the deck "Tarot of the Masters" and its accompanying book: Uncovering The Tarot Of The Masters: An Instruction Book For The Tarot Of The Masters Deck James also reads Tarot cards (individually and for parties, as well as via telephone) & teaches workshops on the subject. James' "Tarot of the Masters" deck has had two printings that have sold out. Learn more about James Ricklef at www.jamesricklef.com

item.title: Diana Cooper, Angel Communicator - Feb 27,2010
item.description:
Join us for live angel readings with Diana Cooper, calling live from the UK! Diana received an angel visitation during a time of personal crisis, which changed her life. Author of 17 books in over 20 languages, she has inspired thousands of people to fulfill their spiritual potential. Well known for her work with angels, ascension and the wisdom of Atlantis, she was asked by the unicorns to write her new book The Wonder of Unicorns. She was then guided to write about the phenomenon of Orbs, and the extraordinary energies they offer and has completed Enlightenment Through Orbs as well as Ascension Through Orbs. Through her guides and angels she enables people to access their spiritual gifts and psychic potential and also connects them to their own angels, guides, Masters and unicorns. Diana is the Principal of The Diana Cooper School, a not for profit organisation which offers certificated spiritual teaching courses throughout the world. Diana has also created Angel Cards, Orb Cards, Unicorn Cards, and meditation CD's. Diana will be joining us for live readings for listeners tonight so you can experience her cards. Diana Cooper’s inspirational book about 2012 reminds us that 2012 offers the greatest opportunity for spiritual growth that there has ever been. She takes us through the ancient prophecies for 2012, what is expected to happen in that year and the incredible changes the world will see in the twenty years beyond. She offers forecasts for 2032, the time when new Golden Cities will arise and everyone will live in the fifth dimension. Visit Diana's website at: www.dianacooper.com

item.title: Georgianna Boehnke from Tarot Talk - Feb 22,2010
item.description:
Georgianna, from Toronto Canada, works as a tarot reader incluings one-on-one readings in person and on the phone. She also regularly reads at home parties and corporate events and does Tarot Coaching for individuals and small groups. She illustrated "Georgie's Deck" and is presently in collaboration with Los Angeles illustrator, Ivan Minsloff, in the creation of a exciting new deck, soon to come, which we will discuss on tonight's show. Georgianna became a major online presence when she joined Raven Mardirosian to co-host a weekly talk radio show "Tarot Talk," where her true skills fully came to light and tarot readers from around the globe began tuning in to learn from George's amazing and deep insights to the cards. Learn more about Georgianna at: www.thetarotroom.com/

item.title: Cinnamon Mancini - International Spiritual Medium - Feb 21,2010
item.description:
Cinnamon Mancini is an International Spiritual Medium, Psychic Counselor, and Teacher of the Intuitive Arts. She founded the Center for Progressive Movement in Virginia Beach, Virginia and travels throughout the United States, Scotland, and the Bahamas’s bringing love, guidance, and spiritual understanding through her connection to Spirit. Psychic from birth it wasn't until a stroke threatened to take her life at a young age that she agreed to embark on a path that would bring spiritual healing, and understanding to others. It is her greatest joy to reunite people with their loved ones in Spirit. Cinnamon also believes that everyone is psychic, and that anyone can learn to become an accurate evidential medium. It is at her center in Virginia Beach, as well as throughout her travels that she teaches others how to tap into their gifts of the Spirit. You can contact Cinnamon by going to www.centerforprogressivemovement.com Please join Cinnamon for a show full of private readings filled with love, inspiration, and connection.

item.title: Beyond Worlds & Lizzy Star, gifted psychic medium - Feb 15,2010
item.description:
What better night to connect with those you love than Valentine's Day? Join us tonight for powerful mediumship connections with Lizzy Star as your bridge to the Other Side. Tonight, Live readings with amazing and compassionate psychic medium, , Lizzy Star! Born and raised in England, Lizzy knew from a very early age she had a gift she didn't understand at the time. As time passed, she and her family she knew it was time to pursue what she calls the Gift. Lizzy attended as many places of learning as she could, and was very blessed to have attended the Arthur Findlay College in England. Attending and teaching at many spiritual churches around the world, Lizzy gained knowledge among like-minded people. Lizzy will tell you this is the best sort of experience for anyone wanting to learn. Her love for her work and the love she has for the spirit drove her to become what she is today, a person that is full of Respect and Gratitude for each and every living thing. Lizzy is now in the process of writing a book of her journey with the spirit. Her goal is to help as many people that are open and wanting to understand more to find the love within themselves their higher self, sharing that knowledge with as many people as they can. She will tell you laughter in itself is a healer, it gives you hope and a sense of purpose. Lizzy's website is at http://www.lizzystarinternationalmedium.com Join us tonight for live mediumship reading full of love. Lizzy is now living in the United States using her gift to help people.

item.title: Elinor Greenberg - Psychologist & Tarot Expert - Feb 08,2010
item.description:
Dr. Elinor Greenberg is a licensed psychologist and an internationally respected Gestalt Therapy writer and trainer. For the past thirty-five years, Elinor has explored a variety of therapeutic approaches to personal growth and integrated their methods into her practice of psychotherapy. After studying Tarot intensely, she became convinced that Tarot insights have long been undervalued and could be useful additions to the practice of psychotherapy. Elinor developed an integrated approach called Tarot Counseling that combines elements of both Tarot and psychotherapy and can be used by practitioners of each system. In a first, she gave workshops on Tarot Counseling at two different psychotherapy training institutes and made it a condition that both the tarot community and the psychotherapy community be permitted to attend and work together.

item.title: Beyond Worlds & Premier Psychic, Lorrie Kazan! - Feb 01,2010
item.description:
Lorrie Kazan was chosen as one of the top psychics in a worldwide audition for the Edgar Cayce Institute. She is known for her skill in telepathy, clairaudience, clairsentience and clairvoyance. She also holds a Master’s degree in Writing and regularly lectures and writes on a number of topics, including Psychic Development, Tarot, Shamanism and Dream Interpretation. Her work has frequently appeared in The Whole Life Times and Intuitive Connections. She is also a presenter at the annual Los Angeles Tarot Symposium. You can access Lorrie’s articles or even sign up for her free newsletters (Prosperity Meditation, and Psychic Thought) by going to www.ilovemypsychic.com. You can also check out her blog: www.lorriekazan.blogspot.com Or arrange an appointment with Lorrie by calling her at 310/376-5742

item.title: Runes for Transformation with Kaedrich Olsen - Jan 31,2010
item.description:
Kaedrich Olsen has studied the runes and Northern mysteries for over 20 years. He also studied spiritually based hypnotherapy and Shamanism in order to become a transpersonal hypnotherapist. Within this practice, he applies runic wisdom to develop powerful techniques his clients use to transform their lives. The author of the book Runes for Transformation: Using Ancient Symbols to Change Your Life, Kaedrich brings revolutionary ways to teach us modern ways of connecting with this ancient system of divination. Kaedrich lives in Boulder, Colorado with his wife and two daughters, where he is an accomplished leader in the Nordic spiritual community. Join us tonight for rune history, how-to's and in-depth information on using the Elder Futhark rune system, the oldest form of the runic alphabet. How old is it? How can it help our modern lives? Kaedrich will do live rune readings for callers tonight to help us dig into the ancient meanings of runes. Call for your free reading tonight and connect with ancient mysteries. Don't miss Kaedrich's fabulous, educational website at: www.AmongTheRunes.com The following Rune diagram may be helpful to you during the show: www.tinyurl.com/rune-diagram Kaedrich's website is at www.amongtherunes.com

item.description:
Tonight, Beyond Worlds meets Native Soul/World Music Artist :: Healer :: Speaker, Brenda MacIntyre! Medicine Song Woman Brenda MacIntyre is a Juno Award-winning Native American world music artist, energy and sound healer and motivational speaker based in Toronto Canada. item.title: Rachel Pollack & James Wells: Wisdom Readings & Hidden Tao in Tarot - Jan 24,2010
item.description:
Join our special show tonight as two of tarot's greats join us for an amazing night of learning and wonder. Rachel Pollack - one of the world's foremost authorities on tarot, and James Wells - Canada's shining tarot gem and one of the tarot community's most creative practitioners, will join us tonight. Rachel devised a tarot method called "Wisdom Readings," where the BIG questions are asked. "What is a Soul?" "What Nourishes My Soul?" These are the types of questions we'll be entertaining through tarot tonight, digging deep into the psyche. And Rachel-- always a pioneer -- is studying the Tao Te Ching and is integrating its wisdom into Tarot. This is a first time this is being discussed in a podcast forum and there is much to learn! Tao Te Ching is the basic text of Taoism, attributed to a master named Lao Tsu, who was said to be of the generation before Confucius. Rachel says: The scholar hears of the Tao and studies it every day. The ordinary person [or student] hears of the Tao and thinks of it from time to time. The fool hears of the Tao and laughs. Without laughter the Tao would not be what it is. Join us tonight as we dig into the big questions with the expertise of Rachel Pollack and James Wells, two of Tarot's best.

beyond worlds tarot | james wells | rachel pollack | wisdom readings | psychic

item.title: Beyond Worlds ~ Mary K Greer returns - Jan 18,2010
item.description:
NOTE: The cards discussed in the reading for Ronnie in this episode can be viewed (so you can follow along) at: http://tinyurl.com/ronnie-cards We are honored to roll out the red carpet again for none other than the legendary Mary K. Greer! For those in the tarot community, she needs no introduction. We'll be talking about the 4 basic Hermeneutic levels of meaning in tarot (Literal, Allegorical, Moral, and Anagogic/Spiritual). Mary will be doing a live reading, so we can learn about her technique and the psychological "aha" moments an interactive tarot reading can bring. Mary has been working with tarot for 40 years and has authored numerous books on tarot, led workshops, and teaches tarot.The author of eight books on tarot and a biography of four female magicians, her latest book is Mary K. Greer’s 21 Ways to Read a Tarot Card, which won the COVR award for best divination book. Three of her books placed in the “Top Five Tarot books” survey by the American Tarot Association, which polled members of the major tarot discussion lists, while two of her books are in the top five of Aeclectic Tarot’s 2005 poll. She is the proud recipient of the 2007 International Tarot Lifetime Achievement Award and the 2006 Mercury Award from the Mary Redman Foundation for “excellence in communication in the metaphysical field.” As an author and teacher, Mary emphasizes personal insight and creativity. As a tarot reader, she works as a ‘midwife of the soul,’ using techniques that are interactive, transformational and empowering. Mary's Tarot Blog is at http://marygreer.wordpress.com/

item.title: Beyond Worlds & Crone Stone Creator, Carol Campbell! - Jan 11,2010
item.description:
Introducing, a meditation and divination tool used by maidens, mothers, and crones worldwide: Crone Stones! Crone Stones are 33 hand-crafted porcelain stones, each depicting an image of the human life journey. Like tarot or runes, Crone Stones can be very easily used Tonight, meet Carol Campbell, artist, counselor, and mythologist ... and creator of Crone Stones, to talk about these amazing tools as well as to do live readings with them. Carol has twenty years of experience in women’s health education and counseling, including empowering women through her Crone Stones, a meditiation tool which uses sacred stories and goddess mythology. Combining counseling with her love of mythology Carol says, “I created Crone Stones while going through a healing period. I experienced a type of energy that channeled itself into the images on the stones. Crone Stones reflect the energy patterns I had recently been witness to.” Crone Stones have received notice from such national media as The Washington Post, SageWoman Magazine and New Age Retailer. She lives in Oakton, VA, with her husband, David, and daughters,Devon and Demi. The stones can be viewed at Carol's website, along with a free sample reading at: www.CroneStones.com Carol also created the beautiful Epona Stones, which are semi-precious stones engraved with various depictions of horses, also used in divination. http://www.eponastones.com/

beyond worlds tarot | divine whispers donnaleigh | angels dawning dawn | crone stones epona | carol campbell

item.title: Beyond Worlds - Tarot & Quantum Physics with author Jeanne Fiorini - Jan 10,2010
item.description:
Jeanne Fiorini, author of the 5-Star Tarot book "Invitation to Wonder" will be joining us to delve into the mysteries of how Tarot Works. Could it be Quantum Physics? Jeanne Fiorini brings nearly 20 years experience to her work as a Tarot practitioner, teacher, and author, offering a unique blend of knowledge, wisdom, and wit. Jeanne offers monthly reading circles, provides readings to groups and individuals (in-person and by phone), and hosts a variety of Tarot-related special programs throughout the year. With formal training in both mediation and psychosynthesis counseling, Jeanne brings practical guidance and useful information to all her readings, classes, and groups. She has been a guest presenter at the C.G. Jung Center in Brunswick, Maine, the University of New England, the Whole Health Expo, and numerous fundraising and special functions in Maine and New Hampshire. Jeanne is currently working on a second book, to be published by Schiffer Publishing Ltd. spring 2011. In addition to her work as a Tarot reader and teacher, and with the help of an artist friend, Jeanne designed and created a special line of Tarot-themed gift wrapping papers. The gift wrapping papers, a fabulous Tarot card wrap bag and other Tarot-related products, as well as a complete listing of upcoming classes and events, can be seen by visiting the TarotWorks website: http://www.tarotworks.com.

item.title: Beyond Worlds & Shamanistic Practitioner Gene Coderre - Jan 04,2010
item.description:
Join us tonight with Gene Coderre, a Shamanic Practitioner, followed by live readings by Dawn & Donnaleigh! Gene Coderre is a Certified Master Practitioner of Energy Medicine & Authorized Instructor/Trainer of the Dying Consciously; “The Greatest Journey” Program. Both are offerings of the Institute of Energy Medicine & the Healing the Light Body School of the Four Winds Society founded by Alberto Villoldo, PhD., internationally known healer, instructor, author and mentor. Gene is also a Full Mesa Carrier in the Laika Traditions. Located in Forestville, CT, Gene offers dynamic in-office or distance healing sessions in Shamanic and Indigenous Traditions. He works at the original source of wounding in the Luminous Energy Field releasing imprints of personal and ancestral memories, traumas and injuries. Gene is also an authorized instructor with the Dying Consciously; “The Greatest Journey” Program. The message of “The Greatest Journey” is that we can come to the end of a life with grace. He offers Private Sessions, Introductory Talks, Weekend Experiential Workshops and 5-Day/Week-long Experiential Training Seminars of the program for a more in depth, proficient understanding of the process steps available at www.DyingConsciously.org. Gene notes, “In the West, we no longer remember how to die with grace and dignity. We shuttle the dying off to hospitals where death is considered a ‘disease’ and extraordinary measures are taken to prolong life at all costs. Families do not know how to come to closure with the passing of a loved one. Many people die in fear, with unresolved issues, that would be so healing for them and their families.” Visit Gene at www.EarthkeeperWay.com

item.title: Beyond Worlds - James Wanless Rings in the New Year! - Jan 03,2010
item.description:
Happy New Year! James' high energy and tarot expertise will get your 2010 off to a whoppingly wonderful New Year! Creator of the timeless Voyager Tarot Deck, and now with his new Green Man Wisdom Cards, James will take you on a journey for a "New You!" JAMES WANLESS, PH.D. (Columbia University Political Science) was a distinguished university professor in the Middle East when he experienced a life-threatening disease which led to a spiritual transformation. He relinquished his academic career and began to share his new found wisdom and inspiration by teaching groups how to live happy, healthy, holy, and wealthy. He is a pioneer of new thinking recognized for weaving timeless wisdom into modern life with intuitive tools and symbolic systems. With his magical blend of personal charisma, humor, and pragmatic enthusiasm, this prodigious explorer of consciousness engages his audience in a transformative experience that inspires and enlightens.

item.title: Storm Cestavani Returns - Astrrology New Year's Live Readings - Jan 01,2010
item.description:
Happy New Year! Join us on New Year's Eve with the incredible Storm Cestavani! Storm was on our show last month (11/28) and introduced us to the marriage between tarot and astrology. Definitely check out that episode to learn about how astrology creates a powerful layer to tarot. Tonight, we put that information to practical use and do live readings for callers and tie in the astrological attributes to our readings, a great way to learn! Storm's website is at http://www.psychicfriendslive.com and he has a wildly successful show on Blogtalk Radio, The Storm Cestavani Show. http://www.blogtalkradio.com/stormcestavanishow

item.title: Dan Pelletier of The Process & The Tarot Garden - Dec 30,2009
item.description:
Dan Pelletier has been reading tarot for himself and others over 30 years. He is also co-owner of The Tarot Garden (www.tarotgarden.com), a highly respected internet center for tarot decks and related information and products. He is also author of the audiobook, The Process, an ideal learning tool for beginner, intermediate, & advanced tarot readers alike. The Process can be purchased through www.TarotConnection.net, The Tarot Garden, or Amazon.com. The Process is an audiobook (available in 6 CD's or MP3 download); a personal journey with Dan through the garden of each reader's spirit without "canned approach" books, or tables or lists of meanings. Dan helps dispel the myths that hinder a reader's progress, replacing them with solid, no-nonsense advice for building skill and confidence. Dan will be discussing new and upcoming decks, some old favorites, and his audio, The Process. Dan will also be doing live tarot readings for callers tonight.

item.title: All Hallow's Deck Creator, Robyn Tisch-Hollister - Dec 29,2009
item.description:
Robyn Tisch Hollister is the creator of the edgy new All Hallow's Tarot deck, published and sold through The Tarot Connection. Tonight, Robyn will talk about her deck and do live mini readings for callers with her cards so you can experience them first-hand. Robyn is an artist and long time professional tarot reader, who has been creating divination systems for a number of years. She has several small limited edition tarot decks completed as well as a couple of oracle sets, and is always working on one more! Her decks include: The All Hallows Tarot Tarot of the Masquerade The Minute Tarot And she also created Crow Stones & Dreamstones oracle systems! She also creates puppets and masks, and works for her husband's theatre company as a writer and performer. Her website can be viewed at www.ste4fun.com/robynpage The All Hallow's Tarot can be purchased at the Tarot Connection Shop at www.TarotConnection.net Donnaleigh recently wrote a review of this deck with some pictures and a mini-reading at: http://tinyurl.com/allhallows-review Pictures of The All Hallows cards can be viewed here: http://tinyurl.com/allhallowspics

item.title: Beyond Worlds & Lizzy Star, gifted psychic medium - Dec 28,2009
item.description:
Live readings with amazing and compassionate psychic medium, , Lizzy Star! Lizzy Star, a Medium and a healer, she calls herself the Happy Medium ... Born and raised in England, Lizzy knew from a very early age she had a gift she didn't understand at the time. As time passed, she and her family she knew it was time to pursue what she calls the Gift. Lizzy attended as many places of learning as she could, and was very blessed to have attended the Arthur Findlay College in England. Attending and teaching at many spiritual churches around the world, Lizzy gained knowledge among like-minded people. Lizzy will tell you this is the best sort of experience for anyone wanting to learn. Her love for her work and the love she has for the spirit drove her to become what she is today, a person that is full of Respect and Gratitude for each and every living thing. Lizzy is now in the process of writing a book of her journey with the spirit. Her goal is to help as many people that are open and wanting to understand more to find the love within themselves their higher self, sharing that knowledge with as many people as they can. She will tell you laughter in itself is a healer, it gives you hope and a sense of purpose. Lizzy's website is at http://www.lizzystarinternationalmedium.com Join us tonight for live mediumship reading full of love. Lizzy is now living in the United States using her gift to help people.

item.title: Mary K Greer & Ferol Humphrey on the Tarot by Misha Show - Dec 27,2009
item.description:
This show is a bit of a surprise. We are featuring an interview of Mary K Greer that was given by tarot mentor, Ferol Humphrey, on December 17, 2009 on the "Tarot by Misha" show. This show would have disappeared in a week or two as there are no archives. So with the permission of Misha & Ferol, it is being posted here so that many many enjoy it for years to come. To learn more about Misha and her work, visit www.TarotByMisha.com To learn more about Ferol Humphrey, see: http://ferolhumphrey.wordpress.com To learn more about the legendary Mary K Greer, see: http://marygreer.wordpress.com We hope you enjoy the show.

item.title: Beyond Words & Face Reading with Lynn Scheurell! - Dec 21,2009
item.description:
Lynn will be doing live face readings, including 2 historic tarot creators (A.E. Waite & Aleister Crowley). Lucky listeners will get their faces read. Did you know that your face contains information about yourself? Face reading is a 6000 year old ancient art & science from China. Who we are and what we’ve experienced & where we’re going is reflected in our face. By understanding your face, you become more aware of your own decision-making, relationship to personal power, & how you perceive the world, amongst a whole lot more. Lynn Scheurell is a professional face reader & a catalyst. She teaches soul-driven entrepreneurs how to use the tools of intuition to increase their awareness, one of which is the ancient art of face reading, to help you use your own natural tools to move forward in business & in life. Faces/pictures to be discussed on our show: http://tinyurl.com/mjackson-face http://tinyurl.com/crowley-pic http://tinyurl.com/crowley-pic2 http://tinyurl.com/waite http://tinyurl.com/dawns-pic http://tinyurl.com/donnaleigh-pic http://tinyurl.com/erins-face http://tinyurl.com/steven-face http://tinyurl.com/vals-face http://tinyurl.com/angela-face http://tinyurl.com/paul-face Lynn's websites: www.LynnReadsFaces.com www.mycreativecatalyst.com She has a CD on Business Intuition Mastery at www.mycreativecatalyst.com/pages/cd.html See her live face readings on YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/user/facebookfacereader Also see her videos: "Where are you Unconscious" http://tinyurl.com/where-unconscious and Know What you Know: http://tinyurl.com/know-know

Faces/pictures to be discussed on our show: http://tinyurl.com/mjackson-face http://tinyurl.com/crowley-pic http://tinyurl.com/crowley-pic2 http://tinyurl.com/waite http://tinyurl.com/dawns-pic http://tinyurl.com/donnaleigh-pic http://tinyurl.com/erins-face http://tinyurl.com/steven-face http://tinyurl.com/vals-face http://tinyurl.com/angela-face http://tinyurl.com/paul-face Lynn's websites: www.LynnReadsFaces.com www.mycreativecatalyst.com She has a CD on Business Intuition Mastery at www.mycreativecatalyst.com/pages/cd.html See her live face readings on YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/user/facebookfacereader Also see her videos: "Where are you Unconscious" http://tinyurl.com/where-unconscious and Know What you Know: http://tinyurl.com/know-know

item.title: Beyond Worlds - Scott Grossberg, "The Deck of Shadows" - Dec 20,2009
item.description:
Critically acclaimed author and oracle creator Scott Grossberg joins us tonight for a fun and entertaining evening of predictions with his new oracle/divination deck, "The Deck of Shadows!" Tonight Scott will be giving live on-air readings while demonstrating his technique of reaching into our shadows through these cards, whether used alone or in tandem with other oracle systems like tarot. Call in for your live readings! Scott is a magician, an attorney who has served for more than 20 years as lead trial counsel, advisor, & coach for political and business leaders, & government agencies. He holds degrees in Philosophy and Theatre Arts and has also obtained his Juris Doctorate. Scott has released two critically acclaimed books, "The Masks of Tarot" and "Bauta: Betraying the Face of Illusion," in addition to his oracle/divination cards, "The Deck of Shadows." He is also a produced playwright and director, a songwriter/musician, and an exhibiting photographer. He is a professional member of the National Speakers Association, The Academy of Magical Arts/Magic Castle in Hollywood, the International Brotherhood of Magicians, and the British Society of Mystery Performers. Visit Scott Grossberg's website at http://thinkingmagically.com

item.title: Beyond Worlds & James Wells, Tarot Reader & Mentor - Dec 14,2009
item.description:
We are VERY excited to feature on of Donnaleigh's favorite tarot readers, the amazing James Wells! JAMES WELLS is a Toronto-based motivational listener, consultant, teacher, and facilitator who is dedicated to merging soul and strategy. From childhood, he has been curious about what makes people and the Universe tick. Through tools and processes such as tarot, reiki, journal writing, and circle methodology, James and his clients and students are inspired to remember their creativity, resourcefulness, and wholeness. Whether at home or abroad, whether in personal sessions or in workshop settings, he provides an experience of council mind. In his “me time”, James enjoys reading, writing, music, walking, close friends, and good food. James will be doing live tarot readings tonight and will be sharing some great tarot tips for us tonight. You won't want to miss this episode....have a piece of paper ready for notes...he has TONS of ideas and you won't want to miss a thing! You can book workshops and appointments with James by visiting him online http://jameswells.wordpress.com/

item.title: A Message to All Psychics, on BTR & Beyond.... - Dec 09,2009
item.description:
What do we as intuitives bring to our community? There has been some very difficult energy on the internet from people who have professions indicating that they do healing work and intuitive work that is meant to come from the Highest Good. Are we representing what we think we're representing? When people disagree, is it acceptable to be destructive and sadistic? Let's go on an inward journey together to learn what our real purpose is as intutives. When does the ego come in, and when do we leave it at the door? Can we be passionate without being dark? When is the time when we step back and realize that there is something bigger than us at play? Today's show is the heart of ethics that was not discussed during our recent episode on ethics, and we hope you will join us on a gentle journey when our angels and tarot bring forth messages on how we should represent our community.

item.title: Lon Milo Duquette & Georgianna Boehnke - Dec 09,2009
item.description:
This show has been heavily edited to correct for volume differences in phone lines. So if you heard it and couldn't get through it due to volume, this one is much more comfortable. Lon Milo DuQuette's rare combination of common sense & self-effacing humor has in the last 15 years secured him a unique & highly respected position in the world of esoteric literature. Tonight, Lon debunks Myths about Aleister Crowley, the legend behind the famous Thoth Deck! Joining us as special co-host to help interview: Georgianna Boehnke, host of Tarot Talk & major Thoth deck enthusiast! Lon's magical credentials are impeccable. Since 1975 he has served as a national & international administrative officer of Ordo Templi Orientis, one of the most influential & controversial magical societies of the 20th century. He is an acknowledged authority on the life & magical work of Aleister Crowley, the O.T.O.’s most celebrated & notorious leader, & since 1994 has served as the Order’s United State Deputy Grand Master. He has authored numerous magical texts including The Magick of Aleister Crowley, Understanding Aleister Crowley's Thoth Tarot, & Angels, Demons, and Gods of the New Millennium. Hs most popular work is the story of his own life as a practicing ceremonial magician, My Life with the Spirits. He travels extensively world-wide and speaks on a broad range of esoteric topics including Qabalah and the Tarot. He is on the faculty of the OMEGA INSTITUTE in Rhinebeck, New York where he teaches ‘The Western Magical Tradition. Lon Milo Duquette's website is at www.lonmiloduquette.com

item.title: Beyond Worlds & Paul Quinn, author of "Tarot for Life" - Dec 07,2009
item.description:
Paul Quinn, tarot reader & author of the newly released book, "Tarot for Life" writes, “You don’t need to have special psychic abilities to read Tarot cards effectively. But you do need to be curious about who you are & about the opportunities for growth in your day-to-day life experiences. The Tarot becomes a way of deep listening.” Paul transforms the Tarot from fortune-telling into the ultimate Self Help tool for intuitive guidance, empowerment & well-being. Discover how the Tarot, as a vibrant way to access inner wisdom, can be applied to gain meaningful, practical insights into your relationships, career, family, and personal growth. Quinn explains how the Tarot can offer soul-directed advice to help you make wiser choices, and he shows how even the cards that look most troubling can convey support. His book includes: * Spiritual, psychological, & practical meanings of the 78 cards, with engaging casebook stories for each * Guidelines for conducting Tarot readings with love and integrity for yourself or others * Self-Reflective questions to deepen and integrate your understanding of the universal archetypes of the Major Arcana * Approaches for interpreting reversed cards and cards that offer advice * Self Care: When not to give readings for yourself or others * Thoughts on prediction, free will, and the Law of Attraction * Tips for asking the right questions, creating your own Tarot spreads, performing collaborative readings, handling difficult disclosures, and more! Paul will be doing live readings for callers tonight using his techniques. Learn more about Paul online at http://tarotforlife.net/

item.title: Tarot Ethics with Leisa ReFalo & Rev. Paul Nagy - Dec 06,2009
item.description:
Join us tonight for a discussion about tarot ethics. Leisa ReFalo of The Tarot Connection and Rev. Paul Nagy will join us tonight for a discussion every reader should hear. We'll discuss: * Ethics for readers * Ethics those getting readings should seek * And ethics within each of the cards. Paul Nagy has been reading tarot for well over 40 years. He is an ordained minister who has a spiritual friendship ministry. Spiritual friendship is the mutual practice of conversation to clarify who we are and what we want in life. It is a form of collegial self-inquiry as a quest for spiritual roots and coming to balanced relationships with our self, and those around us in our personal and professional lives. Paul's website is at www.tarothermeneutics.com Leisa ReFalo is well-known for her exquisite podcasts done through The Tarot Connection, which also contains a shop for unusual tarot decks and products. Leisa also served as a contributor to the companion book for Ciro Marchetti's Legacy of the Divine Deck. (Book title: "Gateway of the Divine.") Also a statistician, Leisa brings intellect and groundedness to her tarot readings. Leisa's website is at www.TarotConnection.net Both Leisa and Paul will be doing live readings for callers tonight as well. Call in to dig into the tarot with us! The American Tarot Association's Code of Ethics statement can be found here: http://ata-tarot.com/images/members/ethicaltarot4.pdf

item.title: Beyond Worlds & Ferol Humphrey - Tarot Mentor & Intuitive Teacher - Nov 30,2009
item.description:
WOW! You are going to love this amazing guest! We have with us the amazing Ferol Humphrey tonight, who teaches tarot and intuition classes, and she has the most amazing, vibrant, positive personality! Come along and learn a bit about psychic protection & creating your own tarot community. Ferol is a wellness provider through her business, "Ferol Humphrey The Art of Wellness, Alternative Health and Intuitive Development." She teaches Chakra Hooping (fitness hooping: sexy & modern http://www.meetup.com/ChakraHoops/), and stress reduction along with other wellness work. Her wellness work is centered around building the wholeness of the person, with the idea that health doesn't occur unless we are in touch with our intuition and moving our bodies around in space. Ferol is the Organizer of Living Tarot, one of the largest topic-specific Tarot Meetups in the world. http://tarot.meetup.com/LivingTarot. Her favorite thing is teaching Beginner and Advanced Intuitive Tarot in Dallas, on the internet, and by phone in Teleclasses. You are bound to feel good after today's show! She will also be providing us excellent information on psychic protection. Ferol can be found online at www.facebook.com/LivingTarot http://ferolhumphrey.wordpress.com http://www.facebook.com/FerolHumphreywww.myspace.com /ferolhumphrey The hooping video we discuss can be found here: http://tinyurl.com/ykzq2ur Ferol's YouTube vids at: http://www.youtube.com/ffferol Call in for an amazing reading or to ask questions on building your own intuition by Ferol at (646) 200-0765.

Her favorite thing is teaching Beginner and Advanced Intuitive Tarot in Dallas, on the internet, and by phone in Teleclasses. You are bound to feel good after today's show! She will also be providing us excellent information on psychic protection. Ferol can be found online at www.facebook.com/LivingTarot http://ferolhumphrey.wordpress.com http://www.facebook.com/FerolHumphreywww.myspace.com /ferolhumphrey The hooping video we discuss can be found here: http://tinyurl.com/ykzq2ur Ferol's YouTube vids at: http://www.youtube.com/ffferol Call in for an amazing reading or to ask questions on building your own intuition by Ferol at (646) 200-0765.

item.title: Beyond Worlds - Storm Cestavani: Astrology in Tarot - Nov 29,2009
item.description:
Tonight, Storm helps us learn about the marriage between astrology and tarot and how these two modalities intersect. Storm is well-versed in both astrology and the mystical tarot in addition to many other incredible metaphysical gifts. Storm Cestavani burst onto the psychic scene in 1992, (although he began doing psychic readings professionally in 1988 with the Psychic Advisor Network) appearing in several infomercials for Psychic Friends Network, in which he read for Dionne Warwick on the show! Since then he has hosted a syndicated radio show. In addition, he was the most frequent psychic guest on MSN CELEBRITY CHAT. Storm has appeared on numerous entertainment shows including Entertainment Tonight, Extra, E! Entertainment Television, Blind Date, Queer As Folk, Blind Date, Psychics, Howard Stern, Don and Mike Show, and a recent appearance on the real life television show produced by MTV, “The Real World!” He has also been seen in or contributed to many world-recognized magazines , & read for some of the most notable celebrities of our time. item.title: Beyond Words - Lisa Hunt, Tarot Artist - Nov 23,2009
item.description:
Lisa Hunt is an internationally known Tarot artist whose works include: * the brand new Fairy Tale Tarot * the bestselling Celtic Dragon Tarot (Llewellyn, 1999) * Fantastical Creatures Tarot (US Games, 2007), voted a Top-10 Tarot deck for 2007 by Aeclectic Tarot, * the award-winning Animals Divine Tarot (Llewellyn, 2005) which earned her a 2006 Coalition of Visionary Resources (COVR)Award. She holds a master's in interdisciplinary studies with an emphasis on Jungian psychology and art and drawing, and lives with her family in Florida. Join us tonight as Lisa talks about her gorgeous new deck full of symbolism, The Fairy Tale Tarot. Lisa will talk about her experiences with tarot, development of the deck (along with a few secrets it contains), and will do live readings for callers with her beautiful Fairy Tale Deck. You can see the cards from The Fairy Tale Tarot at Lisa's website: http://www.thefairytaletarot.com/gal

item.title: Beyond Worlds & The Tarot School's Ruth & Wald Amberstone! - Nov 16,2009
item.description:
Are you ready to talk about the largest Tarot Convention in the World: The Reader's Studio? Tonight, meet Tarot Grandmasters Ruth Ann & Wald Amberstone, co-founders of The Tarot School! Together they teach, write & publish about Tarot on all levels from divination to psychology to esotericism and magical practice. More than a thousand students have taken live classes at The Tarot School since it opened its doors in 1995. Hundreds more from around the country have participated in Tarot Telecourses , and students from all over the world have purchased recordings from The Tarot School Audio Course Series and study The Tarot School Correspondence Course. Tarot Tips, the Tarot School's email newsletter, has thousands of subscribers worldwide. The Amberstones are the authors of Tarot Tips: 78 Practical Techniques to Enhance Your Tarot Reading Skills, part of Llewellyn's "Special Topics in Tarot" series for readers and teachers. Their new book, The Secret Language of Tarot was published by Weiser Books (April 2008). The New York Tarot Festival, presented in June 2002 by Ruth Ann, Wald, and the students of The Tarot School, was the first international Tarot symposium to be held on the East Coast. The Readers Studio, also produced by The Tarot School, is an annual Tarot conference providing cutting-edge practical techniques to intermediate and advanced students, professional readers, teachers and authors. The next annual Readers Studio is scheduled for Spring, 2010. See their websites at: http://tarotschool.com http://readersstudio.com Erin from http://www.self-insights.com joins us to to readings during the last 30 minutes of the show!

item.title: Beyond Worlds - Rachel Pollack, Special Episode - Nov 15,2009
item.description:
We are SO honored tonight to feature one of the World's foremost authorities on the modern interpretation of the Tarot, the incomparable Rachel Pollack. In addition to being a legend in the tarot community, Rachel is also a poet, an award-winning novelist, and a Tarot card and comic book artist. She has published 12 books on the Tarot, including 78 Degrees of Wisdom (Thorsons, 1998), considered a modern classic and the Bible of Tarot reading. Its marriage of common sense, wide-ranging knowledge, and esoteric awareness have inspired many tens of thousands of readers worldwide to a deeper knowledge of the Tarot. She is a member of the American Tarot Association, the International Tarot Society, and the Tarot Guild of Australia. With fellow Tarot author Mary Greer, she has taught at the famed Omega Institute for the past fifteen years. She has been conferred the title of Tarot Grand Master by the Tarot Certification Board, an independent body located in Las Vegas, Nevada. As of As a fiction writer, Pollack has been bestowed many honors and awards, among them the famed Arthur C. Clarke Award for Science Fiction (for Unquenchable Fire) and the World Fantasy Award (for Godmother Night). She is a recommended member of PEN International, and has written for numerous publications. This Fall Rachel has two new books coming out, one fiction, one non-fiction, her 29th and 30th published books to date (yes, you read that right). Join us tonight as Rachel shares wisdoms from her new books, including "Tarot Wisdom," and provides live readings for callers to share interpretations of her own tarot deck, "The Shining Tribe." See Rachel's website at: www.RachelPollack.com

item.title: Beyond Worlds - Scott Grossberg, "Masks of Tarot" - Nov 09,2009
item.description:
Scott Grossberg | No One's Mind is Safe (tm) Critically acclaimed author and oracle creator Scott Grossberg joins us tonight for a fun and entertaining evening of predictions, open talk about Tarot, oracles, and intuitive readings. Scott will be discussing his book, "The Masks of Tarot," and his oracle deck, "The Deck of Shadows." Tonight he will be giving live on-air readings while demonstrating his technique of reaching into our shadows through the psychological tarot methods found in his book, "The Masks of Tarot." Dawn's cards in the tutorial onthis show are at: http://tinyurl.com/dawncards and Donnaleigh's are at http://tinyurl.com/donnacards Call in for your live readings! This man has done it all! Scott is a magician, an attorney who has served for more than 20 years as lead trial counsel, advisor, & coach for political and business leaders, & government agencies. He holds degrees in Philosophy and Theatre Arts and has also obtained his Juris Doctorate. Scott has released two critically acclaimed books, "The Masks of Tarot" and "Bauta: Betraying the Face of Illusion," in addition to his oracle/divination cards, "The Deck of Shadows." He is also a produced playwright and director, a songwriter/musician, and an exhibiting photographer. He is a professional member of the National Speakers Association, The Academy of Magical Arts/Magic Castle in Hollywood, the International Brotherhood of Magicians, and the British Society of Mystery Performers. Visit Scott Grossberg's website at http://thinkingmagically.com

item.title: Beyond Worlds -- Lauralyn, Angel Intuitive from Heaven Healing Arts! - Nov 02,2009
item.description:
Meet Lauralyn, an angel intuitive and healer with an amazing story and an even more amazing gift. Lauralyn was an investigative journalist in New York and worked in the media industry for over a decade until she had a life-changing experience that inspired her to help others heal, learn and grow. She was born with the ability to see and communicate with Angels, Ascended Masters and loved ones in Heaven and has helped individuals and law enforcement around the world with her intuitive gifts. Her healing work and inspiring story have been featured on national radio and television shows. Her down-to-earth style and practical approach to spiritual matters has made her a favorite to a whole new generation of spiritual thinkers. Lauralyn represents a fresh new look at personal growth that is young, modern and applicable to every day life. She has a knack for delivering messages with both sensitivity and a sense of humor. Lauralyn is a Medium, Angel Therapy Practitioner®, Meditation and Reiki Teacher. She is certified by Dr. Doreen Virtue, William Rand and Aura Yoga. See her beautiful website at http://heavenhealingarts.com Live angel readings during the show.

item.title: Beyond Worlds & Glenn Klausner, Psychic Medium! - Oct 25,2009
item.description:
WOW! Glenn Klausner is a nationally and internationally renowned Psychic Medium who, for fifteen years, has been reuniting thousands of people from all walks of life with their loved ones who have crossed over to the other side. Glenn has appeared on local ABC, CBS and ABC TV news, in a film documentary entitled "After Death Communication: Fact Or Fiction?", and has been featured in articles and publications such as Jane magazine, The Colorado Daily, The Colorado Dog, Natural Awakenings, The Ft. Myers News Press, Florida Weekly, The Kula Magazine, Holistica Magazine, The Washington Post, Jason Rich's book "The Everything Ghost Book," and Francine Silverman's book "Talk Radio For Authors." He has been a featured radio guest on multiple top morning radio shows. In addition to his work as a Psychic Medium, Glenn is also an accomplished musician, who has released two CD's, "Aura Of Grace" and "Satori," under his stage name, Glenn Kidd. Glenn is currently recording his third music CD to be released later this year. Glenn *will* be providing readings tonight to connect YOU with your passed loved ones. If you want evidence that your deceased loved-ones are alive and well in spirit, give him a call on our show at (646) 200-0765. Check out Glenn's website at http://www.glennklausner.com. and his music samples at http://www.myspace.com/glennkidd

angels dawning | beyond worlds | tarot spirituality | psychic medium | Glenn Klausner
item.content:encoded:
WOW! Glenn Klausner is a nationally and internationally renowned Psychic Medium who, for fifteen years, has been reuniting thousands of people from all walks of life with their loved ones who have crossed over to the other side. Glenn has appeared on local ABC, CBS and ABC TV news, in a film documentary entitled "After Death Communication: Fact Or Fiction?", and has been featured in articles and publications such as Jane magazine, The Colorado Daily, The Colorado Dog, Natural Awakenings, The Ft. Myers News Press, Florida Weekly, The Kula Magazine, Holistica Magazine, The Washington Post, Jason Rich's book "The Everything Ghost Book," and Francine Silverman's book "Talk Radio For Authors." He has been a featured radio guest on multiple top morning radio shows. In addition to his work as a Psychic Medium, Glenn is also an accomplished musician, who has released two CD's, "Aura Of Grace" and "Satori," under his stage name, Glenn Kidd. Glenn is currently recording his third music CD to be released later this year. Glenn *will* be providing readings tonight to connect YOU with your passed loved ones. If you want evidence that your deceased loved-ones are alive and well in spirit, give him a call on our show at (646) 200-0765. Check out Glenn's website at http://www.glennklausner.com. and his music samples at http://www.myspace.com/glennkidd

item.title: Beyond Worlds & Rochelle Sparrow/Cortney Kane! - Oct 18,2009
item.description:
On their previous show with us, Rochelle and Cortney's mediumship energy was so INTENSE that my land line phone barbecued right in the middle of the show AND my computer locked up! Wow...that is some energy! These ladies are absolutely dynamite. The pictures Cortney paints can be viewed at: http://tinyurl.com/cortneypaint or http://tinyurl.com/cortneyspaint Please contact Cortney if you'd like to purchase your painting, by emailing her at Cortney@CortneyKane.com. ------------------------------------ Meet Internationally renowned psychic trance-channel & former radio and television personality, Rochelle Sparrow! She has been the featured channel for Shirley Maclaine & has been featured on numerous radio and TV shows. Rochelle is joined by her friend and psychic associate, Cortney Kane, who paints pictures of callers' soul portraits live on the show during Rochelle's readings! See Rochelle's website at www.rochellesparrow.com, and Cortney's at http://www.cortneykane.com. This pair of mystical ladies can't be missed! For a live reading, call in at (646) 200-0765.

item.title: Donnaleigh on Contact Talk Radio with Veronica Drake - Oct 17,2009
item.description:
On October 14th, I guested on Veronica Drake's Contact Talk Radio Show, "Let Go and Grow!" Link to the show available as a download on this page, or directly on Constant Contact at http://www.contacttalkradio.com/hosts/veronicadrake.html LIVE READINGS with Donnaleigh! Donnaleigh of DivineWhispers.net is a psychic artist, a certified professional tarot reader through the Tarot Certification Board of America, and a crystal reader who loves to share that we all can connect with our inner intuitive, even later in life. Located in the sunny wooded hills of Woodstock, Connecticut, Donnaleigh brings wisdom to the world through her internationally-sought readings. Donnaleigh has a unique gift...she creates beautiful portraits of the angels and spirit guides that surround you, and works one-on-one in live mediumship in private readings. Her passion is tarot, a powerful for self-learning, inner development and guidance, and for connecting with our deepest inner wisdoms. She has a fun Radio Show called Beyond Worlds during which she introduces you to wonderful guests who help us expand our own inner intuitiveness and trust, and she provides live readings on the show for callers. Through gentle and honest readings through tarot, crystals, and her own intuition, Donnaleigh helps you find the answers you need in your life to raise your situation to a higher level.

item.title: Beyond Worlds & "The Tarot Lady" Theresa Reed! - Oct 04,2009
item.description:
TAROT READINGS TONIGHT! Amazing Theresa Reed, aka "The Tarot Lady," joins us tonight! A gifted spiritual advisor with tarot as her specialty, Theresa has studied tarot and astrology for many years and has read tarot as a full time profession for about 17 years. She aids clients from all walks of life on their spiritual journey, and her style is very no-nonsense and practical. With the belief that we all have the power to shape our destinies and improve our lives no matter what the current circumstances, her goal is to **empower** the client! Also an avid yogi, Theresa has been teaching yoga for 5 years. She notes that yoga grounds and centers as well as releases any negativity so that we can become a better channel for our tarot work. Visit Theresa's website at https://www.thetarotlady.com/ and her blog at http://blog.thetarotlady.com/ She's on Twitter as @thetarotlady Join us for tarot readings in 3-D as Theresa leads Dawn and Donnaleigh in reading your cards! What do the cards hold for you? Call us live at (646) 200-0765.

item.title: Beyond Words - Intuitive Artist Joyce Huntington - Sep 20,2009
item.description:
Art and Intuition brought together at their finest! Joyce Huntington faced a near-death bout with polio. No longer able to perform her love of dance, her creative spirit found new expression in painting. And while doing so, she tapped into her intuition! Always passionate about color, light and shadow, she collaborates with her husband Gerald by illustrating the children's books that he writes. Joyce prefers to paint with oils and loves doing large format pieces. See Joyce's STUNNING intuitive art at: http://www.joycehuntingtonart.com/zencart/index.php?main_page=page&id=1&chapter=6 View this beautiful slide show of her meditative art: http://www.joycehuntingtonart.com/slideshow.html And her main website is at: http://www.joycehuntingtonart.com Dawn & Donnaleigh will be providing free live readings the second part of the show, call-in number is (646) 200-0765, or join us in the chat!

item.title: Beyond Worlds and Psychic "Ask Dr. Lynn" - Sep 13,2009
item.description:
Dr. Lynn is a Premier Psychic Coach. She was born into a family lineage of Intuitives and has been healing animals, plants and humans since she has been a child. Dr. Lawrence is particularly keen in helping people realize their dreams,heal their relationships and find their purpose in this lifetime. Dr. Lynn has 3 graduate degrees, many certificates and licenses in psychology, healing modalities, spirituality, metaphysics and continues to learn and grow. Receiving a Life reading with Dr. Lynn is an incredibly useful experience and can be a powerful tool and resource for finding your way forward in your life and in your world today. The perceptions, insights and guidance you receive from this experience will also be useful in resolving current life challenges you may have as well. She hosts a live weekly call-in radio show in Austin, Texas, featuring many wonderful special guests. Call in tonight for your live reading with Dr. Lynn and find out the answers to the questions that have been brought to your life. Find Dr. Lynn on the web at http://askdrlynnnow.com http://www.facebook.com/people/Lynn-Lawrence/1273850530

item.description:
PLEASE NOTE OUR DIFFERENT AIR TIME TONIGHT to accommodate the time zone difference for our very special guest. The a*m*a*z*i*n*g Emily Carding joins us live from the UK! Emily is the creator of the stunning tarot deck that turned the tarot community upside-down with excitement: "The Transparent Tarot." This completely unique tarot deck features clear laminate cards that are meant to overlap each other to tell an interactive story. She also created the incredible, colorful Tarot of the Sidhe. Emily will also give us a sneak description of her upcoming Transparent Oracle deck...wait until you hear her unique concept, never before done! Emily has generously agreed to do readings tonight live to callers, truly an honor that won't be soon forgotten! item.title: Beyond Words -- Jack Armstrong and "Lessons from the Source" - Aug 02,2009
item.description:
Meet amazing author, Jack Armstrong. He wrote the book "Lessons from the Source: A Spiritual Guidebook for Navigating Life's Journey," but reports he is not the author. Instead, it originated from "The Source." Like "Conversations with God," or "A Course in Miracles," Jack's information is very much from an other-worldly Source. Packed with wisdom and spirituality, Jack's book is an incredible resource, channeled from a higher realm. For 30 years, Jack has received messages from The Source, kept this a secret from his family for fear they would question his sanity, and now he shares this information with readers worldwide in his amazing book. Visit his website, www.lessonsfromthesource.com to have a taste of the amazing wisdom of this modern-day prophet. You won't want to miss his inspiring life message! Time permitting, Dawn & Donnaleigh will use the last 30 minutes of this 90 minute show to do live readings for callers, once we have been inspired by Jack Armstrong's wonderful message.

item.title: Beyond Worlds - Mary K Greer - Jul 26,2009
item.description:
NOTE: The Universal Waite tarot cards used during Mary's live reading in this episode can be viewed at http://tinyurl.com/greers-cards We are truly honored to roll out the red carpet tonight for none other than the legendary Mary K. Greer! For those in the tarot community, she needs no introduction. Mary has been working with tarot for 40 years and has authored numerous books on tarot, led workshops, and teaches tarot.The author of eight books on tarot and a biography of four female magicians, her latest book is Mary K. Greer’s 21 Ways to Read a Tarot Card, which won the COVR award for best divination book. Three of her books placed in the “Top Five Tarot books” survey by the American Tarot Association, which polled members of the major tarot discussion lists, while two of her books are in the top five of Aeclectic Tarot’s 2005 poll. She is the proud recipient of the 2007 International Tarot Lifetime Achievement Award and the 2006 Mercury Award from the Mary Redman Foundation for “excellence in communication in the metaphysical field.” As an author and teacher, Mary emphasizes personal insight and creativity. As a tarot reader, she works as a ‘midwife of the soul,’ using techniques that are interactive, transformational and empowering. Tonight Mary will share with us how tarot has transformed (and transformed her) through the years, and she will share some reading techniques. Mary's Tarot Blog is at http://marygreer.wordpress.com/

item.title: Beyond Worlds meets Andie, The Rock n Roll Psychic! - Jul 19,2009
item.description:
We are very excited to have Andie Brewer join us tonight, with a surprise....his co-host, amazing psychic medium Lizzy Star joins us! Andie and Elizabeth host a fantastic Blogtalk show called the Rock n Roll Psychic. Andie demonstrates his amazing remote viewing skills that help answer life's burning questions, and Lizzy shines with her strong intuitive support! Andrew has over one hundred appearances to his credit on radio and TV, perhaps most notably as the featured psychic and co-host, along with Erik Estrada (“Chips”) and Jenilee Harrison (“Three’s Company), of “Kebrina’s Psychic Answer”, which aired throughout the United States and Canada from 1992-94. Andrew was the resident morning psychic for many years on Magic 99.7 FM—Columbus’ leading Rock station—and was also featured in a segment on “PM Magazine”. A talented writer, Andrew has published articles on a wide variety of metaphysical topics. See Andie's website at http://rocknrollpsychic.com/

item.title: Beyond Worlds - Tarot Author Janina Renee! - Jul 05,2009
item.description:
We are very honored tonight to have one of Donnaleigh's *favorite* tarot authors....prolific author Janina Renee join us tonight! Janina is the author of a multitude of books including: [*] Tarot: Your Everyday Guide [*] Tarot Spells [*] Tarot for a New Generation [*] By Candlelight: Rites for Celebration, Blessing & Prayer ....and more books are coming! What is the most important part of a tarot spread? The ADVICE card. Therein lies the free will "homework" that gets you to your Highest Good! Very empowering! Her book, "Tarot: Your Everyday Guide specifically addresses the advice position of the tarot spread. Janina continues to work on multiple books, with ongoing research projects exploring the ways folk magic and medicinal techniques can apply to modern problems, including the modulation of Asperger’s Syndrome and other neuro-sensory processing problems. Do you need advice? Live readings will be offered by Janine during the show so call in at (646) 200-0765 with your question. Janina's blog is at http://tarotmagicadventures.blogspot.com/

item.description:
Do you have a spiritual business that needs a little kick in the financial pants? Do you wonder how to get your authentic self out there so people in your community and target marketing audience will SEE the amazing spiritual work you do? Elizabeth Genco Purvis is the amazing "Marketing Goddess" and she is here to help you finally step fully into your soul purpose by working with MORE of the people you’re meant to help!
