item.title: Beyond Worlds -- Trans-channel Psychic Rochelle Sparrow & Psychic Artist Cortney Kane! - Jun 21,2009
item.description:
Rochelle and Cortney's mediumship energy was so INTENSE that my land line phone barbecued right in the middle of the show AND my computer locked up! Wow...that is some energy! These ladies are absolutely dynamite. We may be deleting this show, however, due to the technical interruptions (and the sound of a football team stomping on my cell phone after my land line fried). ------------------------------------ Meet Internationally renowned psychic trance-channel & former radio and television personality, Rochelle Sparrow! She has been the featured channel for Shirley Maclaine & has been featured on numerous radio and TV shows. Rochelle is joined by her friend and psychic associate, Cortney Kane, who paints pictures of callers' soul portraits live on the show during Rochelle's readings! See Rochelle's website at www.rochellesparrow.com, and Cortney's at http://www.cortneykane.com. This pair of mystical ladies can't be missed! For a live reading, call in at (646) 200-0765.

item.title: Beyond Worlds & Numerologist/Tarot reader Mystical Marcy! - Jun 14,2009
item.description:
Mystical Marcy is a dynamic, inspirational artist specializing in metaphysics, the science of numerology and Tarot. Marcy will reveal your life purpose, gifts and talents. With Mystical Marcy's help you will: * Make the BEST choices * Reach your HIGHEST potential * Make your DREAMS real * Find your TRUE LOVE * Be the BEST expression of who you are * Be PROSPEROUS beyond your wildest dreams * Experience ABUNDANCE * Create the JOB YOU LOVE * Maximize the LAW OF ATTRACTION * Follow your BLISS Marcy reaches out to a national audience through radio, newspaper and magazine features, teaching, workshops, private parties, entertainment and private readings. Also counted among her clients are numerous Fortune 500 companies. Marcy believes in your unlimited potential and your power to shape your own destiny. Call in tonight at (646) 200-0765 for a special reading from the amazing Marcy! Her website is at http://mysticalmarcy.com.

item.content:encoded:
Mystical Marcy is a dynamic, inspirational artist specializing in metaphysics, the science of numerology and Tarot. Marcy will reveal your life purpose, gifts and talents. With Mystical Marcy's help you will: * Make the BEST choices * Reach your HIGHEST potential * Make your DREAMS real * Find your TRUE LOVE * Be the BEST expression of who you are * Be PROSPEROUS beyond your wildest dreams * Experience ABUNDANCE * Create the JOB YOU LOVE * Maximize the LAW OF ATTRACTION * Follow your BLISS Marcy reaches out to a national audience through radio, newspaper and magazine features, teaching, workshops, private parties, entertainment and private readings. Also counted among her clients are numerous Fortune 500 companies. Marcy believes in your unlimited potential and your power to shape your own destiny. Call in tonight at (646) 200-0765 for a special reading from the amazing Marcy! Her website is at http://mysticalmarcy.com.

item.title: Beyond Worlds....Health Readings ~ The Emotional Connection - May 17,2009
item.description:
Tonight we break the rules! HEALTH readings are welcome! Dawn & Donnaleigh are excited to welcome Margaret Rivera, an amazing medical intuitive and Angelic Life Coach. Margaret is able to communicate with the angels, and often her sessions revolve around health and well-being. Margaret has also been blessed with the wonderful gift of angelic writing, a form of channeled writing, and she has been guided to share this gift with others who can receive loving guidance in writing. In addition, she is a flower essence practitioner, focused on intuitive health and healing through the guidance of the angels. Call in and ask your questions of Margaret! Do you have a question for Margaret? Give us a jingle! We're laid back and relaxed and here to serve you. Call us at (646) 200-0765. Visit Margaret'sstunning website at http://www.angelicessential.com. P.S. Later (after the show) contact with people Margaret read confirmed that what she saw did agree with diagnoses they received.

item.title: Beyond Worlds...Mothers Fostering Intuition - May 10,2009
item.description:
Happy Mother's Day! This week we feature mothers with psychic children. We honor mothers who foster their child's intuition. What do they do? What are the children experiencing? Meet 13 year-old Ivanna who is an animal communicator who volunteers at her local animal shelter to help staff understand what the animals feel, where they hurt, where they are from, and more. Then meet Sydney, an inquisitive 9 year old who is learning the ancient art of tarot! Do you have an intuitive child? Did you have a psychic experience as a child? Call us with your stories!

item.title: Beyond Worlds: ANIMAL COMMUNICATOR Lynn McKenzie! - May 04,2009
item.description:
Got pet problems? Want to know what's on your pet's mind? Is your pet hurting or depressed and you're not sure where or why? You’ve come to the right place! We are honored to be featuring the talented Lynn McKenzie, Animal Communicator. She uses her gifts as an Animal Communicator, Horse Whisperer, Flower Essence Practitioner, and Medical Intuitive to do just that. Call in for readings and learn about the furred and feathered friends in your life through Lynn's powerful intuition! Check out her website at http://animalenergy.com.

item.title: Beyond Worlds....A Shamanic Journey! - Apr 27,2009
item.description:
We are very excited to have two very special guests join us, who will I*N*T*R*I*G*U*E you! Meet Samantha Mitchell, who does fascinating Shamanistic work, and her Mentor, Ed Mortimer. Samantha is of Native American heritage and works with totem animals, but in an out-of-the-ordinary way! Did you know that each of your chakras has a totem? And how they interact with each other explains much of your personality and why you are the way you are? And your totem can either work with or against the totems of the people in your life? Ed is her gifted mentor who humbly considers himself a perpetual student, and he will join us to share information on Shamanistic work. If you like Ted Andrews or Stephen Farmer, this is all that and more! Call in to ask questions you may have about Shamanism. If time allows, Dawn & Donnaleigh will do readings at the end of the show.

item.title: Beyond Worlds - Welcome to Our Grand Opening! :::drum roll:::: - Apr 20,2009
item.description:
Tarot & Crystals & Angels, OH MY! Welcome! Our introductory show introduces you to us and how we work. You'll also hear the story of how we went from ordinary to intuitive. You can, too! We will be offering readings to callers! What is an angel reading? What is a tarot reading? How are they different? Curious about how to use these methods to access your life's purpose? Join us and learn how to manifest big changes in your life! This is our introductory show, lots more to come. Join us for fun and intuition! (Bring snacks and your favorite chair....)
